choices: Follow Sally tomorrow as she scares up her rivals.
Follow Cathrine and see what she gets up to.
Follow Kellys blind path of creative destruction.
Follow Marie to see what she does with her new device.
1.content:
Everyone had rushed over excitedly to Sally's house when Sally had said that she had a way to get back at all their rivals whom had made fun of their weight over the years.

All four of the girls had gathered in the main living room, flopped down on the floor in a circle beside the couch.

"So what's the big surprise?" Cathrine asked eargerly, her deep dark eyes shining with anticipation.

Sally smirked her quirky little smile the three other girls knew all too well. She had come up with another invention.

"This!" Sally held up a small remote device, "Will give us the edge we need to get back at our enemies who've tormented us over the years."

Kelly laughed and snatched the small black remote from Sally's pudgy hands, "What's it control? Some kinda giant mecha? A new toaster oven to make a bad batch of cookies?"

With wide eyes Sally slapped the back of Kellys hand and took the remote back. "It's a size changing device. With it, we will be able to make anyone we want see us the way they say we are. Absolutly huge! The rest is up to your imagination, if you know what I mean."

Marie pushed up her glasses eagerly and took one of the devices as Sally laid them out on the dark blue carpet. "So we can, make them small and bring them home?"

"Ha! What's that going to do? Comon Marie! I say we go on an all out stomp fest and show those punks whos boss now!" Kelly roared.

Sally grumbled, "Quit! My folks are still asleep upstairs!" She calmed down a bit. "Really, we can do whatever we want with these as long as no one sees your target get shrunk. Otherwise we could be in a world of trouble. But since it's such an unbelievable story, the remote comes with a shrink button of its own. Making it small enough to toss away and never be found again."

"So what, we just sleep over tonight and then wander out tomorrow and start shrinking people?" Cathrine questioned, looking kind of weirded out.

Smiling Sally said, "Sure! It's going to be great. As I said, you can do whatever you want really. Personally I'm with Kelly. I think they deserve to be taught a lesson, and no one else is going to do it."

"I'm not sure," Marie said, "I don't even step on bugs. Nevermind tiny people. But I do hate it when they make fun of me."

"Well sleep on it!" Sally said, laying back and grabbing everyones backpack from around the side of the sofa to toss to each of their owners. "Let's get some shut eye now, and we'll all do our thing tomorrow."
1.title: Crossroads

choices: "I'm off to the mall. I'll see everyone later today!"
"I'm going to school! I have an exam today!"
"I forgot something upstairs, I'll be back."
Join in for breakfast, with a few tiny people in your backpack.
11.content:
Sally woke up early before everyone else. It was always exciting when she got to take a new invention out into the world. It was as wild as the science fiction novels she loved so much, but her imagination made it real!

She got up and dressed into a white tee shirt and khaki shorts. After spending a few moments fixing up her red hair into it's usual pony tail but with her bright bangs still hanging over her eyes, Sally was ready to go.

Running downstairs she grabbed her backpack and looked down the hall into the kitchen. "I think I'm going to head out for a bit!"

Her mother called to her, "Sally! Get in here! Your friends are having breakfast without you. You can't leave them here alone!"

Sally replies...
11.title: Sally's first day

choices: Sally wanders into the mall.
Sally decides to patrol the back parking lot.
111.content:
Before waiting for a responce, Sally slipped on her brown flip flops and was out the door and walking down the sidewalk to the mall.

It was a nice day out, a bright and sunny summer day. The mall wasn't too far from her house. It was the perfect place to try out her remote in public, she thought. Sure there were lots of people, but no one would be paying much attention to a short nerdy fat girl. At least that was the plan, based on years of experience.

The two story mall was only remotely packed today. With several cars in the parking lot but not a lot considering it was a weekday and only around one in the afternoon.

Sally stood on the sidewalk before the parking lot, wondering what to do. Around the back of the mall there could be some people hanging out by their cars. Then again, several stores inside could have lots of isles to find a lone person in.
111.title: Sallys day at the mall

choices: To the food court! Time for some tasty little snacks.
Look around the  mall for people to shrink.
1111.content:
The mall was still pretty quiet today. Even with exams on, the halls seemed empty as Sally walked in past a few name brand clothing stores. Her eyes lit up. Besides science, the mall was her second passion.

Full of choices, Sally walked down the short enterance hall to the long corridor that made up the main section of the mall. It was an odd building. Though she had come in on the ground floor, she was on the second level. With the mall being built on a slight incline, one side gave access to the first floor, the other to the second. Of course there were stairs and escalators along the way too.

That's when Sally realized her mistake in rushing out so early this morning. Her tummy growled and she realized she hadn't eaten in quiet a bit. As the notion passed through her mind, she realized that she could cause a lot of havoc in the food court too. Patting her tummy she wondered what it would be like to eat one of the people she shrank. Most of her ideas and just been stepping on them. Usually tormenting them first a bit to get her point across on why she was doing what she was to them.

Tugging her white tee shirt down a bit over her cut off khakis, Sally considered her options as she tapped a sandal clad foot upon the polished mall floor. What to do first.
1111.title: Food court or wander the mall?

choices: Sally gets chicken nuggets so she can dunk her captives.
Sally decides to get a burger and make a people sandwich!
11111.content:
Wandering the mall could wait. Sally was hungry now. Plus the scientist in her couldn't help but wonder... What do little people taste like anyway?

The food court was a single level in a circular shape. Various vendors ringed the outside of the clusters of tables, chinese food, lots of fried chicken, and of course a few burger places.

Not too many people were in the food court. That would probably make it easier for Sally to track down a few of them. But she couldn't just sit down and start munching away on tiny struggling forms in her hands. Definatly she would need some sort of meal to cover up her extras.

Looking back and forth, Sally considered. Chicken nuggets would come with some good dipping sauce. A quick dunk in that would probably shut anyone up, or at least goop them up long enough to make the quick trip up to her mouth. Otherwise, being tossed into a hamburger would probably pin them pretty well and keep them quiet too.

With that on her mind she went off to catch her lunch. The arcade was just off to the far side of the food court, and as she hoped, had only a very few patrons. The change employee was wandering around outside and the cluttered arcade would provide more than enough coverage that the few blasts of light from Sallys remote would go unnoticed.

A few nerds from her classes were hanging out in there. "Perfect," she thought. They were always pretty bothersome. With all of Sallys interests, one would figure she would be widely accepted among this group. Sadly, even they made fun of her. A few of them had a crush on her too, and that only made the situation worse. If they were going to host a role playing game at their houses she could never come because well, they couldnt have a girl over! Not that they were sexist, but mainly because they would already stumbling over their words with her just asking to join in.

Not much of a selection. Four guys and two of their sisters were hanging out there.

A few flashes later, they found themselves staring up at Sally's impossibly huge hands as she eagerly reached down for them on the sticky floor of the arcade. None of them besides one of the girls could bring themselves to run as Sally's huge sandals landed with amazing force of each step. She smiled down over her plush tummy and breasts to her prey waiting below.

The one sister was getting annoying so she just decided to stomp her quickly. Grinding her out as she dumped her companions into her backpack. As much as Sally wanted to take the time to play cat and mouse with one person, she had a lot more people on her mind to catch today.

Gingerly wiping off her sandal against the side of one arcade machine, she left for the food court to once again go over her decisions.
11111.title: Food from the arcade

choices: Sally dunks him in, it's what she came here for!
Sally teases Ray more but has other plans for her captives.
111111.content:
Ordering some chicken nuggets and a cola, Sally wandered over to a table without anyone really nearby and flopped down. Leaning over she unzipped her backpack and reached in, a chubby hand wrapping tightly around one struggling boy.

They all gasped confused as she closed the bag and took their friend up to the top of the table. He was dropped out on the dark gray plastic serving tray, next to her food.

Ray was this ones name. A scrawny one with sandy brown hair. He laid there, looking up at the giantess hovering over him. She didnt seem to care at all as her plush arm reached over him to jam her straw into her drink. He reached up toward her soft skin, confused by what was happening.

He tried to talk to her, but nothing seemed to get her attention. He was terrible with names too, so he wasnt even sure what to call the massive girl before him. Then his heart skipped a beat. Her huge eyes looked straight down at him and she smiled.

Sally slowly licked her lips as she tore off the top to her honey mustard dip. This was going to be a lot of fun. Ray was one of the ones that Sally had a suspicion he liked her. Quietly she mumbled to herself, just loud enough so Ray could hear.

"I wish I wasn't so alone," Sally's looked down as she said that, intentionally putting a plump hand down on the edge of the tray. "No one has ever loved me and the only thing that makes me happy is using my magical powers."

Ray wasn't quite buying the bait yet. He still seemed stunned and just stared up at Sally, only looking away to see her hand land palm down on the edge of the tray. Her titanic fingers tapping down one after the other. The soft scent of her perfume or maybe some body spray wafted over to him. A light yummy vanilla flavour.

Sally continued to play upon the whole sci-fi motif she ironically knew Ray would 'eat up', "I just wish I didn't have to do this anymore. My poor broken heart. The only thing that helps me get through my days is eating people that I shrink."

That did it. Ray was up and petting at Sally's hand. As slow and lazy as the nerd was, he caught on to that quick enough.

"Oh. What's wrong little one? Do you want to leave me too?" Sally questioned, staring down at the cute little form that she nudged with her index finger.

Ray shook his head no vigorously to make sure she could see his answer.

Sally grinned, "That's good! It's comforting you know." Her lips, so soft and moist, pouted as she blinked her beautiful eager eyes, pupils wide with desire. "I won't hurt you really. My tummy may. I'll just eat you up, swallow you whole, then you can squirm in my tummy until you're all gone."

This left Ray not knowing what to do. He backed up a little as Sally grabbed a chicken nugget and looked away. She jabbed it down into the goopy sauce and brought it to her mouth. Her tongue lolled out as she brought it in and bit down, tearing it in two.

Ray fell flat down on the tray. Was that going to be his fate? He had always wanted to be near Sally's mouth, but not like this.

Laughing, Sally popped the rest of the nugget into her mouth and swallowed it whole, making a show of tilting her head back and gulping it down.

"What's wrong little one?" Sally questioned. "Look at it this way, you're going to be with me for a bit. Keeping me happy as I feel you in my tummy. Though I'll probably be sad when I can't feel you any more. Then I'll eat your friends!"

Was this horrible girl really going to do all this? Ray hoped this was all a joke, a dream, anything but reality. However, when Sally's thumb pressed him tightly to the soft wall behind him of her fingers, the pressure on his chest made it feel all too real.

Looking down at her tiny prey, Sally contemplated. Was she really going to pop a real person in her mouth and gulp him down the hatch? If so, that was it, no turning back.
111111.title: Sally debates eating her first nerd

choices: Sally gulps him down whole.
Sally starts to chew Ray up.
1111111.content:
Sally grabbed Ray between her plush fingers and picked him up slowly, pinning him safely with her thumb. She held him over the goopy honey mustard dip and dabbed him in quickly. To Ray, this was a horrible experience as he was splunked into the thick slime.

Not stopping, Sally brought him up to her mouth and absent mindedly licked some of the sauce off. Her huge thick tongue lapped along Ray's shivering body. He managed to get enough of the goopy substance out of his eyes to see the soft pink lips and lolling tongue of Sally's mouth right before he was plunged in.

Slurping the honey mustard dip off her fingers, Sally sat there with Ray in her mouth for a moment. She had options here. Should she chew? Or just swallow? This was a tough choice. She knew if she just gulped him down that he may make it into her tummy alive. That could be slow and painful in there. But she figured getting chewed up would be no picnic either. So...
1111111.title: Into Sally's mouth

choices: A big girls gotta eat
Sally invites her friends to this newfound deliciay
11111111.content:
After some thought, Sally decided just to go ahead and swallow this tasty morsel in her mouth. She wanted the tickling sensation from his struggles inside her. Plus she didn’t want all that messy blood on her perfect teeth.

Meanwhile, inside Sally’s mouth, Ray was frozen with fear. Still covered in some of the dip from earlier, he was laying face first on Sally’s massive tongue, hot breath covering him. After a while he finally started to get up when suddenly, the tongue moved to the top of Sally’s mouth and started to move back and forth. This would have crushed Ray if Sally’s tongue wasn’t so soft.

Saliva was flowing all over Ray like a river and he could have sworn he heard moaning but it was hard to tell. After a while of this, Sally’s tongue stopped moving and settled back down. Suddenly, Ray could see a light forming in front of him, Sally’s mouth was opening! Ray was so excited, he knew Sally would never really eat him; this must have been some weird way of getting his attention because she liked him.

Ray started to crawl toward the opening when he found himself slipping backwards. Sally was slowly tilting her head backwards! Ray struggled to get out but tongues surface was way to slippery to get any kind of grip. Sally kept her mouth open but Ray had no way of getting out.

Sally suddenly closed her mouth and swallowed Ray. She looked down to her belly and felt Ray struggling in it. It was like a light fluttering in her and she loved it. “Wow, if I had known these little guys had tasted so good, I would have done this a long time ago”, Sally muttered to herself. What was she going to do now, she was still hungry but did not like to eat alone.
11111111.title: Down the hatch Ray

choices: Play with him for now.
Stomach is growling, in the belly Tony goes.
111111111.content:
Sally came all the way here, she was still hungry and the setting was perfect, there was partially no one at the food court and no one close enough to see what she was doing. Sally popped open the container and plucked out another one of these meals-to-be.

Sally then closed the container and put it back in her bag and placed the tiny man in front of her. This was another one she knew. Sally was in shock for a moment because this was actually someone she had a huge crush on. In the confusion of shrinking everyone in a hurry, she didn’t see everyone who she had captured.

His name was Tony. He was a buff, especially for someone who hangs around with nerds, really good looking and he always wore black clothes. He was no goth but he certainly needed to change his wardrobe.

Sally looked down wondering if she really wanted to eat Tony. Ray was easy because she did not really care for him but this was someone she had feelings for.
111111111.title: What a Catch!

choices: Throw them in the garbage
Bring them home and let the other girls deal with them
1111111111.content:
Tony looked delicious but Sally saw this as an opportunity to make him like her. When Tony was normal sized, she was to nervous to even say hi, but like this she felt confident and thought about what this must be like for tiny Tony, he was way more scared that she was. Sally was like a mountain to him, a towering goddess who had complete control over his fate.

With this in mind, Sally smiled and talked softly to make him feel comfortable, "Hey there little guy, you look so cute all the way down there". Tony looked up and started to recognize this girl towering over him. It’s that girl who Ray keeps talking about, he thought to himself.

Tony tried to call out to her but he was so tiny, Sally could barely hear him. "Shhhhhh, don't say anything Tony, there's something I want to say", Sally said, she then took a deep breath. "I really like you, I've wanted to be with you since I first saw you, now you’re all mine". Sally then grabbed Tony between her fingers and opened the top of her tank top. Tony's heart began to race as he was being positioned over Sally massive breasts.

If Tony thought they were big before, now they seemed like buildings. Just before Sally dropped him in she said, "Make me feel sexy", and she let go of her tiny toy and snuggled Tony between her breasts. Tony was in heaven; Sally's breasts were so big and soft.

Sally was being tickled from Tony's movements, but she could tell he was enjoying himself so she kept him in there. If this wouldn’t make Tony fall for her, nothing will. After a little while she plucked Tony out and put him on the lid of her drink. Tony looked up at her enormous and flawless eyes. Sally then went on to say, "I have some friends I want you to meet". Tony suddenly finds himself in Sally's pocket. Sally starts to get up when she remembers that she has a few other tiny people in her bag
1111111111.title: Seducing Tiny Men 101

choices: Kelly with several of the tiny people hanging from her mouth.
All the tiny people on the floor running from Kelly's soft footsteps.
11111111112.content:
Walking in, Sally saw Kelly laying on the couch watching TV. The red headed scientist glowered at Kelly's dirty feet that were propped up on the couch, "What have I told you about that? If you've got anyone squished on those my folks are going to go nuts from the stains you're leaving!"

Kelly rolled over and looked at her, "Hey Sal, bring me anything from the mall?"

Sighing from being completely ignored Kelly threw the plastic container to Kelly and wandered off to the kitchen to see how Marie was doing.

"Urgh, I havn't heard anything from the lab all day, Kelly's flopped out on the couch still and the house is a mess," Sally complained as she threw her bag in the corner near the door to her backyard. Marie was sitting at the small table near the kitchen entrance, looking at a shrunken couple laying in a bowl.

Marie poked her right hand down into the bowl and swirled the tiny people around, playing with them as she looked down through her thick glasses.

Sally grumbled, "You too! No one's listening to me and Cathrine isn't even around!"

"Oh," Marie answered distantly and calmly, "She went to school. Said she had some people to pick up."

Stomping over to the table Sally grabbed up the bowl from Marie who gave an exasperated moan of disappointment, "No! Now listen up or you won't get them back," Sally looked over into the bowl she was holding away from Marie, "Where are these two from anyway?"

"He's a friend of mine. I told him it would be a bad idea for him to date this girl so I'm keeping the two of them together like he wanted. I'd only have ate her if he didn't go out with her but he decided to ignore my advice so," Marie trailed off. Saying it out loud didn't sound as good as she'd thought.

Staring dumbfounded Sally burst out, "Comon! I said have some fun not petty revenge! I brought home a few nerds from the mall to play with. Sure someone may have got squished in the process but she wouldn't stay still. You're out here getting ready to gulp these two because you don't approve of them, and Kelly... I don't know where she'd been but her feet are filthy and on my parents new couch!"

"Oh, she's been stepping on people over at the park. Like all afternoon," Marie said, looking off casually. "Come to think of it I don't think Cathrine is at school to just pick people up, she's probably shrinking a bunch too."

"I brought home a bunch! Urgh, here!" She threw the bowl back down, almost sending the couple sliding out of the far side as it rocked back and forth on the table.

Wandering back into the living room she was shocked to see...
11111111112.title: Sally brings home the arcade nerds.

choices: Gulped down the entire group of them for herself!
Spits out the bunch of them back into the container.
111111111121.content:
"Kelly!" Sally screamed as she ran into the living room, "What are you doing already?"

"Mruht?" Kelly asked, looking up with still struggling shrunken nerds hanging from her mouth. A few of them were pulled in as she tried to form the words but several were still dangling there.

Sally punched the wall and sighed furiously, "I brought them home for all of us to have some fun with! Not for you to scarf them down like a bag of chips!"

Meanwhile Kelly was in her own little world, enjoying the squirming inside her soft mouth and focusing on slurping in the others one at a time if she could. Usually they're arms would be squeezed out in front of them and they'd be sucked into the plush girls gigantic mouth, but others were already head first inside and trying to push their way out.

One had actually done so, falling down into Kelly's lap far below.

Sally marched over and grabbed him right off Kelly's leg, holding him by his shirt with three of her fingers she thrust the tiny person infront of Kelly's face, "Look!"

"Hey! Isn't he from our math class?" Kelly was getting words out a little easier now that she'd gotten all of them into her mouth. Tiny screams could be heard, and the group of them struggling inside her huge maw.

"Yes! I got a bunch from the arcade. They were the nerd group that actually liked us that I was hoping to share with everyone! Considering you're eating them, I'm sure they've moved on to thinking about other things!" Sally yelled at Kelly.

Marie called softly from the kitchen, "Can you two calm down, it's ruining my fun out here."

Both girls growled back, "No!" At least Kelly tried but managed only to growl and gulp down at least one of the tiny guys in her mouth.

"Come on Kel, spit them out! This was supposed to be fun for all of us. I can't keep shrinking more people!" Sally explained.

Kelly smiled and made up her mind as she...
111111111121.title: Kelly's already eating in the living room.

choices: Sally storms back out the front door in frustration.
Sally attacks Kelly out of frustration and tries to get the tiny people out.
Sally aims her shrink remote at Kelly.
1111111111211.content:
There had been two guys and a girl inside Kelly's mouth. Unfortunately during their conversation, Kevin had slid down the huge blonde girls throat as his sister Jane and their friend Ted watched. The three of them had struggled in vain to hold onto the girls mighty plush tongue, but Kevin had been too far back in Kelly's warm maw. It was actually pretty crowded in there which made it easier for Ted and Jane to hold on, sometimes even grasping at each other.

Sally had looked on in disappointment as she saw a lump slide down her friends throat. She had hoped it was only one that had been gulped and that Kelly would spit up the rest. Instead Sally got a chubby soft palm in her face has Kelly held her away from the meal she was enjoying. Outraged Sally struggled back against her friend, but out of the two of them there was no chance for her to overpower Kelly.

"They LIKE us you idiot! These aren't people that made fun of us, these people like us!" Sally blurted out, ignoring the fact that she herself had squashed one of the sisters back at the arcade. Obviously her mind was much more focused on the guys anyway.

Kelly stuffed the two people within her mouth into one cheek. Trapping Ted and Jane together against her teeth and inside cheek. "Look. I don't CARE Sally. You brought us this gift and expected us to just go wild with it. So what? They're shrunk now, so they're screwed anyway. Not like you can bring them back."

Looking exasperated, Sally breathlessly blurted out, "Of COURSE we can bring them back! You think I'd give you a device that could end up shrinking the group of us and doom us to be tiny sized forever without a way back?"

Leaning back on the couch and propping up her disgustingly dirty feet on the arm rests material once again Kelly grinned, showing some struggling arms trying to reach out of the corner of her mouth, "Big deal. We can shrink more then. What guy isn't going to want to be ours if we're able to do this to them?"

Sally still looked sad and frustrated but Kelly did have a point. Even though she knew her friend has just being a bully and fighting to get her way, no matter if Sally liked it or not. Did she really even care about the guys she got at the arcade? After all the world was hers now. Was she really just jealous of her friend and wanted them for herself?

"Just go do your thing. I'm going to sit back, enjoy my food, and then do whatever too," Kelly encouraged as her throat bulged with another swallow. Sally's eyes pleadingly watched, but it seemed the two remaining shrunken people were still in her friends mouth.

She did shrink them herself, so why should Kelly get to have all the fun. Still, her friend was much stronger than her. This wasn't fair at all.
1111111111211.title: Still trapped in Kelly's hungry mouth!

choices: Shove herself upside down and backwards out of Kelly's mouth.
Grasp for Ted's arm and pull him onto Kelly's tongue.
Follow Sally's storyline instead.
11111111112111.content:
Frustrated and clearly too angry with her friend to deal with the situation anymore, Sally turned around and marched out the front door in a huff. Kelly nodded, happy that she had won the argument, and nestled back on the couch to enjoy consuming her prey.

Jane had struggled past Kelly's teeth and was on her tongue again but Ted was still trapped over in a hammock like space between teeth and cheek. The two of them didn't speak much besides the occasional scream. Much of the time they were too coated in saliva to do much at all. It was actually impressive the three of them had been in Kelly's mouth together up until Kevin was accidentally gulped down during the conversation with Sally.

Horrified at the prospect of being eaten by this giant girl, both Ted and Jane were taking their time making sure they didn't upset her, or get hurt themselves. When a soft hungry moan echoed up Kelly's throat, Jane laid down flat on the thick tongue she was kneeling on. Her eyes had adjusted to the darkness and the heavy breathing of their massive captor was shivering Kelly's uvula, just a meer meter away.

There really was no room in the girls hot and humid mouth. Saliva was gushing and sloshing around them, but thankfully most of it was able to be gulped down without them being sucked into Kelly's throat with it. When Kelly breathed in through her mouth deeply Ted reached out for Jane's hand to pull him back over onto the giant girls tongue. Jane felt bad for it, but looking back behind her, she realized she could try to squirm her way free from the huge lips and just leave Ted behind. They were friends but this was definitely a helpless situation. What good would it do to be once again cuddled in fear with Ted, waiting for Kelly to get bored with playing with them and gulp them down?

Jane took a deep breath herself and considered her split second decision of what to do next.
11111111112111.title: Sally leaves, Kelly continues with her food.

choices: Kelly pulls Jane back inside to gulp them both down.
Jane is spit out into Kelly's tummy, while Ted is left inside.
Both tiny people get free from Kelly's mouth.
111111111121111.content:
Jane turned away from Ted, seeing a panicked look in his eyes as he realized what she was doing. She shoved herself out of Kelly's mouth, her back against the giant girls lower lip. Looking up at Kelly's huge nostrils and blinking eyes above, Jane felt a rush of cool air as she pulled herself free out to her waist.

Then Kelly's lips clamped down on Jane's hips and held her firmly in place. Dangling from the plush girls mouth yet again, Jane screamed in defeat, pushing with all her might against the pillow like lips. It was no use. Her hands just sunk into the soft flesh. Was there no way out of this helpless situation?

In the meantime Ted and struggled out from between Kelly's teeth and cheek and was kneeling on her tongue holding onto Jane's ankles. He didn't know what to do. Pushing or pulling did no good since Kelly's lips had formed a complete seal over poor Jane's body. The girls bare legs and feet just kicked feebly in the darkness. Ted held on tightly though in hopes that if Kelly decided to spit out Jane, he'd be dragged out along with her.

Meanwhile outside Jane had collected herself and was crying out for Kelly to let her go as she beat on the girls lips. Kelly was absent mindedly looking around the room and just focusing on controlling the tiny people with her mouth. She didn't care much at all what happened to them now and was having fun. Sally had given them up and left them with Kelly to do with as she pleased. Even Marie out in the kitchen was quiet and doing her thing with whatever tiny people she had.

Squirming furiously, Jane felt Kelly start to move her lips from side to side, rolling the poor shrunken girl around a bit between them. She screamed and pushed hard to try to break free from the big girls mouth. Finally...
111111111121111.title: Jane tries to shove herself out of Kelly's mouth.

choices: Kelly takes Sally out front to show her how much fun it is to squish people.
Marie is left alone in the kitchen and goes back to focusing on the couple.
1111111111212.content:
Kelly grumbled up at Sally, still with a mouth full of people from the mall. She finally stuck out her tongue and let them slide back down slowly into the container with just as much saliva along with them. Sally noticed one girl from the arcade still stuck on Kelly's tongue as the plush blonde slurped her up.

Looking up defiantly at Sally, Kelly gulped, letting a small bulge slip down her throat.

Sally didn't quite approve but she let it go, "Now, I've got a bunch of people from the arcade here. They're for all of us to share. Even if they're all covered in your drool now!"

"Hey, you throw a snack at me what am I supposed to do?" Kelly said standing up.

Staring wide eyed Sally tilted her head to one side, "Kel, they're people! I just gave you the shrink remote. Maybe it's not a good idea for you to do this if you're going to be this care free in such a short time."

"Oh so what. It's what you wanted us to do. What it's supposed to be better that I've been stepping on them or something? We're just having fun here Sally," Kelly complained as she wandered off towards the kitchen.

Marie was still staring into the bowl and licking her lips slowly as the tiny couple before her huddled together.

"What's with her?" Sally asked.

Kelly smiled, "She's into it! What's so wrong with that. Would you rather she just crunched them up like candy?"

Sally didn't quite know what she expected, but Marie seemed really intense. She wondered exactly what Kelly had been doing the whole time she was gone too. That was when Sally started worrying about Cathrine wandering around looking for people to shrink.

Maybe it was her scientific nature but Sally had been a lot more focused on all this. One tiny person or so at a time, and focusing on the different sentations. It seemed like her friends were enjoying this on a much bigger level.

"Aww comon Sally, we're having fun! So what if you're responsible for people getting squashed under my dirty smelly bare feet after I've rolled them around underfoot? Nevermind whatever Marie is getting up to here," Kelly put her arm around the red headed scientist and teased her explanation.

Marie didn't look up and asked, "Can you two please take this elsewhere. I'm making sure these two fully understand what is going on."

Sally looked up to Kelly who smiled broadly and shrugged, "At least we're enjoying your present!"
1111111111212.title: Kelly spits them back into the container.

choices: Stay on the porch chasing them around.
Bring them down onto the pathway or the sidewalk.
11111111112121.content:
"Where are you going?" Sally asked as Kelly drug her along by the wrist.

"I'm going to take you outside and show you what it's like to squash these guys barefoot!" Kelly said eagerly.

Sally pulled her arm free and looked at Kelly perplexed, "Shouldn't we go into the back yard then?"

Kelly rolled her eyes, "Phht, what's the point in that? I want the neighbours to see! They'll just think we're chasing bugs. See? No one cares! It's not like the lady across the street is going to get on the phone to her friends and go, 'that Sally and her friend are chasing around shrunken people!'"

"No but if someone walks by," Sally began.

"Then you plant your foot on the lil' person you're playing with and hope you didn't stomp them hard enough to squash them yet," Kelly motioned, stomping the floor and smiling at Sally.

"You're really getting into this arn't you?" Sally asked, not sure if she was concerned, or actually curious to see what was going on with her friend.

Kelly laughed, "You kidding me? This is fun! I'm always walking around barefoot in the summer. This just gives me something else to do with them rather than just getting them dirty."

That was something Sally wasn't too sure about. Playing with the tiny people was cool, but the thought of Kelly's feet stomping all around and then getting all over them seemed kinda gross.

Kelly figured out Sally's concern from her expression, "Oh sure, some of them don't like it. Maybe some do! I've been sitting around the house most of the afternoon anyway, see? They're fine." Kelly lifted her foot up behind her and showed Sally the bottom of it. As Kelly wiggled her toes, Sally saw that it wasn't as dirty as she had imagined.

Stepping out onto the porch, both barefoot plush girls looked into the plastic container.

"So on the porch or down on the front pathway?" Kelly asked.

Sally looked from one to the other. The observer in her took over and she replied, "Whatever you'd enjoy the most."

Kelly plucked one of the tiny people out between her fingers and decided what to do.
11111111112121.title: Deciding where Kelly wants to step on them.

choices: They do their best to massage the giant girls feet.
One of the guys refuses or gives up quickly.
Sally just gets into it and starts knocking Ted around with her feet.
111111111121211.content:
"Why don't we sit down on the swing and make them massage our feet first?" Sally asked as she partly tried to stall Kelly for time with this idea still making her stomach churn with the guilt of what she had done. Shrinking these guys was obviously the worst thing she could do. It wasn't a big deal with the ones she'd played with but she knew Ted especially, whom now dangled from Kelly's fingers, had a pretty big crush on her. Was she ready to put a pretty big crush on him?

Kelly tilted her head a bit and then a huge grin spread across her face, "You want to torment them first? That's so cool! Yeah let's do that. Tell you what, Ted always had a thing or something for you, so you take him and I'll take Kevin here. He's the gross one that couldn't just figure out what hygiene was."

Walking over, the two girls sat down on the swing, tiny guys in each respective grasp.

"See this isn't so bad is it Kevin? You're all disgusting and dirty anyway, so you'd probably feel at home down with my feet," Kelly explained to the tiny guy in her plush hands. He was laying in her palms, sunk down sightly into the soft skin. Looking up at Kelly's huge face above, Kevin shivered at the idea. It was actually his sister Jane that had been gulped down earlier when Sally and Kelly were talking inside. He was horrified by the fact that his sister had been eaten by the now titanic girl he adored. That didn't change the fact though that he had to try to keep her happy to save himself.

Kevin flung himself forward and hugged Kelly's fingers. The huge blonde menace couldn't help but smile and even have a trace of a tear well up into her eye. He really did like her. Or he was just trying to save his own butt, but at least he was putting on a good show.

Meanwhile on the other hand, Ted was looking up at Sally. The red head was leaning back slightly and almost studying the tiny guy in her hands. Sally did kind of like him but her friend was pretty set on them squashing these two guys. After watching Kelly do the same, Sally put her shrunken man down on the old wooden planks of the porch and extended the soles of her feet out towards Ted.

Both guys stared in awe of the massive feet before them and then exchanged a glance from across the way at each other. Ted was ready to do whatever was asked but Kevin was pretty worried. Unlike Ted, Kevin wasn't in good shape at all. He was overweight and tired easily. If Kelly was going to put him through a lot, he'd get worn down and squashed pretty quickly. Still, he couldn't just ignore her requests or he'd end up crushed even faster.

"Well go ahead!" Kelly boomed, "It's not like you two can't hear us. Sally wants you two to massage our respective feet. Get to it or we'll just stomp you like the bug sized people you are now!"

Sally's voice was soft at first and then she cleared her throat, "Y, yeah! Come on Ted. I want you to put some effort into it! It should be able to feel your hands at your size. Show me what you've got!" This wasn't going to keep Kelly busy for long. Maybe she should just go along with it. Sally had already squashed and eaten people already anyway.
111111111121211.title: Making them massage their huge soles.

choices: Sally decides to give it a go and take on Ted.
Sally is still unsure so Kelly shows her how it's done.
Sally can't stand the idea and rescues Ted.
111111111121212.content:
Ted was bewildered. He'd always adored Sally, and she had her suspicions but being shy and negative had led her to avoid asking him. After all, Sally believed that was the guys job anyway. He was quite the video game nerd with short light brown hair, and a cute anime tee shirt on with a pair of jeans. That and he was also only a couple inches tall, danging from her friends chubby fingers with the doom of being stepped on looming loudly over him.

When Kelly instead made a fist around Ted, Sally saw his arms reaching out to her eagerly. He desperately wanted to be rescued by the girl he was so interested in, but he didn't know what she was thinking.

Sally wasn't even too sure how to feel. Was this the wrong idea and had she gotten the girls far too excited with this concept? Kelly had always loved to step on bugs, and the scientist in Sally dreaded that about her friend. But this was even worse, these weren't bugs at all. If it wasn't for Sally taking the size remotes home with her they'd all be regular sized people still. On the way home from the mall she'd had almost a sleepover idea in mind. The girls would go up to Sally's room, sit around and talk about what guys they liked, and play with the tiny shrunken ones they had.

Meanwhile Kelly's fat feet were stomping down the front steps to Sally's house and onto the warm concrete pathway leading down to the sidewalk. Sally hadn't had time to mow the front lawn with her research and all, so there was a good wall of grass that ran down the length of the pathway. Was Sally really going to do this? Maybe she should take Ted. After all, at least he'd be crushed by someone he cared about. Not that it was even close to being a comfort.

Kevin, the other guy, was still in the container which Sally was holding onto. He was a bigger sized guy with blonde hair and a stained white tee shirt on with faded jeans. He'd always had a thing for Kelly and the two of them would have probably gotten along great if Kelly didn't think he was disgusting. Really if he'd just taken better care of himself Kelly would have asked him out. Not that Kelly didn't have some self esteem issues too, but she was still the tomboy of the group.

"Well, do you want me to show you how it's done?" Kelly asked, putting the squirming Ted down on the pathway and placing the pad of her foot on top of him gently. Unfortunately it was a bit more vicious for Ted as she tried to run and instead was hit with the massive ball of Kelly's foot which threw him to the ground and quickly pinned him under it's weight. He wasn't being crushed, but he wasn't going to be moving anywhere either.

Looking down at her friends foot, Sally considered her options. At least getting squashed under Sally's foot would potentially be better. Could she just leave Ted to her mean friend that would be who knows how cruel? Snapping the lid onto the container with Kevin and placing it down on the front steps, Sally padded back over to Kelly.
111111111121212.title: Getting ready to step on Ted outside.

choices: Sally stops Kelly before she can stomp down on Ted.
Kelly stomps Ted underfoot.
Ted crawls away into the grass.
1111111111212121.content:
Sally put a hand on Kelly's shoulder, "Let's have some fun with this together."

Grinning, Kelly took her foot off the tiny guy and stepped aside for Sally to take over. Looking up with fleeting hope, Ted watched as Sally raised a huge bare sole up in the air and brought it right down upon him. It wasn't the hardest of steps, but Ted definitely felt bruised. He didn't know what to think. Ted assumed they'd just smush him in one good stomp, not whatever Sally was just doing.

"Try it with just enough force to feel the ground around the sole of your foot," Sally encouraged.

Rolling over, Ted looked up as Kelly raised a big thick foot and stomped him as well. He lay there, breathing deeply and trying to regain his senses. The pressure definitely forced the air out of him and it still felt like he was being hit. Just instead it was like a very vicious pillow fight. They were using just enough strength to squash him.

The girls kept taking turns, again and again. Giggling high above and stepping on poor Ted. He even tried to rise to his hands and knees and crawl away, but was just forced back down when the next grimy footstep pressed upon his back. This was more fun than Sally could have imagined, just playing around with shrunken Ted. Sure Kelly wasn't going to just leave him alone but it was funny just knocking him over with their feet and softly squashing him against the concrete path.

Ted tried to yell up to the girls, but he was almost out of breath. It was taking a lot out of him to try to keep struggling and squirming away. Really that just made Kelly try extra hard, sometimes taking an extra turn and stepping on him twice in a row. This would make Sally laugh and take an extra turn herself.

"Aww what's wrong Ted? You always wanted to get closer to me. Now here I am and you're trying to crawl away!" Sally joked. She didn't feel too badly for him. He wasn't really hurt.

That was when Kelly licked her lips and raised her right foot up as high as she could. Sally looked up and realized she wasn't playing around anymore.
1111111111212121.title: Stomped by two plush girls.

choices: She takes Ted from Kelly physically, using force if necessary
She tries to convince Kelly to spare the two boys
1111111111212123.content:
Sally felt weird. Despite the fact she had already caused her share of bloodshed on her shrunken captives at the mall this still seemed wrong to her. Maybe she had feelings of her own for Ted that she never realized until he was about to be crushed by her friend, or maybe her cold, calculating mind had worked out that these two boys could be of much greater use to Kelly and herself over simply being stepped on for their amusement.

Regardless of her feelings she knew she had to step in before Kelly stepped on the 1 inch man cowering on the footpath before her pudgy bare feet. Quickly walking over to her, Sally thought over the best way to do this without ruining her relationship with her lifelong friend.
1111111111212123.title: Sally to the rescue

choices: Kelly agrees to spare the boys (for now)
No chance! It's stomping time!
11111111112121232.content:
"Kelly..." Sally started, joining her friend as Ted watched in both awe and fear of the two massive girls that ominously loomed over his insignificant body. "About this whole squishing thing, do you really think this is the best way to put my invention to good use? I mean come on, where's the fun in squishing someone with your bare feet? It's over in a second and then you've got to deal with their blood and guts all over your foot. It just sounds messy and tedious."

"Of course!" Kelly said with upbeat confidence in her voice. "Don't you wanna feel them struggle under your foot, completely powerless to fight off such a huge and powerful girl like us before being squashed from just the tiniest movement? Can you imagine the rush of power you'll get from completely snuffing out someone with only your bare foot?"

Sally felt a shiver shoot down her spine at Kelly's response, but ignored the feeling for now as she continued. "Yeah that does sound kinda fun I guess, but you could do that with anyone. We know these guys and we know they like us. Imagine what you could do with a tiny person who would be willing to cooperate with you rather than some random nobody. This is pretty much our one shot at getting some shrunken people who genuinely like us and it would be a waste to just squish them."

"Hmm..." Kelly mulled over what Sally was saying to her. She was right about the two boys having a pretty big crush on them and that could be used to their advantage. Still, getting to squish a guy who really liked her sounded like a saucy tale of betrayal that was just so tempting to go through with.
11111111112121232.title: Persuading Kelly to be merciful

choices: "Servants"
"Boyfriends"
111111111121212321.content:
"You know what, you're right!" Kelly said enthusiastically. "We could shrink and squish as many random people we want with your little invention there, but how many guys would we find who might actually like us? These guys had a thing for us before this whole shrinking business even started and I saw how little Ted here was reaching for you when I put him down." She prodded Ted playfully with her toe as she finished speaking, knocking him down on his ass and causing her to giggle at his feebleness.

Kelly bent down and scooped up the tiny man from the ground. Holding him in her cupped hands she tried to treat him with a bit more care as she handed him off to Sally.

"Here you go, little guy." She casually said as she dropped him into Sally's palm. "I hope there's no hard feelings about the whole trying to squish you thing!" Ted cowered in Sally's hand and seemed to find a little comfort in her embrace away from the girl who wanted to kill him just moments ago. Sally felt a ping of regret over putting him through this as well as an urge to protect the little man from any danger he would face at that size, be it from outside hazards or her own friends.

"Now then. Where's my tiny man?" Kelly asked impatiently. Not waiting for it to be given up to her she grabbed the plastic container from Sally's free hand and popped off the lid before plucking Kevin out of his translucent prison to replace Ted in her hands.

"So, you two..." Kelly said looking at Kevin, but also addressing Ted. "Since we know just how much you adore us, me and my gorgeous friend here, in our endless benevolence, have decided to spare you both." Sally rolled her eyes at this cheesy speech. Kelly always loved to be dramatic about the dumbest of things.

"Now then." Kelly continued. "Instead of being squished under our beautiful feet, you two shall be both be graced with becoming our..."
111111111121212321.title: Kelly convinced

choices: Follow Kelly and Kevin
Stay with Sally and Ted
1111111111212123212.content:
"That's right!" Kelly said triumphantly in response to the look of surprise she was getting from Sally. "From today you two are now our little boyfriends, and as your giant girlfriends it'll be our job to keep our new men safe. That means no more squishing so don't worry about that." She added with a sly wink.

"Let's get one thing clear though." Kelly continued in a half-stern half-joking tone as she brought her face closer to the tiny man in her hand. "You're gonna have to shape up if you want to make this thing work. A girl of my stature is gonna need something a little better than this!" She gave Kevin a sharp prod with her finger, knocking him clean over onto his back. "From now on you're hitting the gym, little man. And showering every single day. We'll make boyfriend material out of you just yet!" Being in control like this seemed to give Kelly a massive boost in confidence. She was always the most outgoing of the group, but even then she still shared some self-image problems with everyone else.

"But don't worry." She added calmly. "I'll be there to help you out every step of the way. At your size we'll be able to improvise and it'll be fun for the both of us. I'm already thinking of a few ways to put you to work where you'll be burning calories in no time." She licked her lips in anticipation with that last statement. "Ooh this is fun! I'm glad you talked me into this, Sally. Anyway I'm gonna take my new boyfriend here and introduce him to the rest of the girls; make sure everyone's clear on who not to squish."

Kelly left with her captive leaving Sally alone in the yard with Ted in her palm. Without her friend around controlling the situation Sally suddenly felt a lot less talkative than she did a few minutes ago. Having her partner literally in the palm of her hand seemed to work wonders for Kelly's confidence, but as she looked at the tiny man in her hand all Sally felt was embarrassment, as if she was standing in the middle of a stage with Ted being a faceless member of the staring audience. All of her body was amplified and presented to her new boyfriend and she could feel her palm starting to sweat slightly with her nerves, something Ted would notice for sure.
1111111111212123212.title: "Boyfriends"

choices: Head back home, your friends are wating for you
Walk around the mall and hunt for more tasty snakcs.
1111111112.content:
Sally couldn’t contain her hunger and Tony looked so good to eat right now. Sally picked Tony off the table and starting talking very sexually, "I've always liked you know. Now I want you to embrace me as your goddess". Tony came to a sudden realization, where was Ray? Then Sally started kissing him softly. Her lips were so huge they completely covered Tony and was starting to get spit all over him. After a while of kissing him Sally placed Tony on her tongue and slowly closed her mouth.

The little guy found himself being felt and prodded buy this huge tongue and was being pinned down on the front teeth. Then Sally moved Tony beneath her tongue and almost suffocated him under it until she finally released he and Tony just laid there in her mouth. After what seemed like forever Sally opened her mouth a little so she could laugh a little and talk, her works were muffled a bit with a tiny person in her mouth, "Do ou lek it in there"?

The voice seemed to come from everywhere to Tony and the movement of Sally tongue to form words was throwing Tony everywhere. Sally closed her mouth and used her tongue to move Tony to the back of her mouth and she slowly swallowed the little man.

He tried to struggle as best as he could to climb back but the strength of her throat surpassed him by at least ten times. When Sally finished with her man meal, she felt an incredible, almost orgasmic feeling building up in her and she felt a little dizzy from it. She thought it was time to finsh her chicken and go back home, but maybe she should walk around the mall and find some more people who she didn't like to shrink.
1111111112.title: The best meal Sally's ever had

choices: She comes up with a plan to shrink a large amount of people without being found
To hell with subtlety; she goes on a shrinking spree through the mall
11111111122.content:
Sally was hooked. The feeling of a tiny person hopelessly struggling in her mouth before being sent down a one-way trip to her stomach was indescribable. She held a hand against her large belly and could just make out the subtle movements of her two captives trapped inside of her. It wasn't nearly enough to satisfy her. Sally wanted her stomach to be filled with shrunken people, just thinking about it sent a shiver down her spine and made her mouth water in anticipation.

She got up from the table and started to walk around looking for people, sub-consciously rubbing her bloated belly as she explored the mall. It was still early in the morning so it was almost empty save for a few eager shoppers wandering around waiting for the main stores to open. Every time she passed someone she imagined shrinking them down and swallowing them whole on the spot, but Sally wasn't dumb and she wanted to do this without attracting any unwanted attention.

After about 20 minutes of walking Sally saw her opportunity. A woman who looked to be in her mid-twenties was here on her own and Sally caught sight of her heading into the ladies room. She quickly followed her inside and waited outside the stalls for her to finish her business. As soon as she left the stall Sally blasted her with the remote and smiled as she watched the woman quickly shrink down while her cries of fear and surprise rapidly became inaudible to anyone but her.

Sally picked up the snack-sized woman and carried her into a stall out of sight of anyone who may have heard her screaming before she shrank down. She sat down on the toilet and locked the door before holding up her latest prey in front of her face. She didn't want to go through all the theatrics she did for her first two victims so she kept things brief.

"I've never done this with a woman before, but I doubt it'll be any different. Bottom's up." Sally said casually as she ignored the woman's screaming and begging.

The begging turned to a high pitched scream that was immediately snuffed out as Sally inserted her newest snack into her mouth. After only a few seconds of the woman being thrown around the inside of her mouth by her massive tongue to get her into a more comfortable position, Sally closed her eyes and swallowed. She leaned back in satisfaction as she felt the tiny woman fighting a losing battle against her powerful throat muscles that dragged her down to the awaiting pit of Sally's stomach. As she felt her snack reach its destination in her stomach she finally opened her eyes and let out a drawn out sigh of relief. Another one down the hatch, she thought to herself with a smirk.

Sally stood up and left the restroom. Every tiny person she devoured just made her want more. She was always the kind of girl to play things out in a slow and smart manner, but maybe this wasn't the time for that kind of thinking. Idly rubbing her awaiting stomach she realized that she'd have to pick up the pace a little if she wanted to feel truly satiated. She racked her brain to try and think of a way to do this right.
11111111122.title: Searching for more prey

choices: Idea A (reader's choice)
Idea B (reader's choice)
111111111221.content:
Sally sighed in frustration as she ran her hand over her covered belly. All her first three victims had managed to do for her was make her desperately crave more. As she went back to wandering around the mall while thinking of a plan she was hit with a sudden realization; she still had another three little people in her backpack from the arcade. It still wasn't near enough to what wanted, but it was at least something to keep her going while she thought of a plan.

She reached into her backpack and pulled out her tiny captives, keeping them tightly held in her pudgy hand so that their pitiful screams would be completely smothered. With the three of them secured tightly Sally could simply pop them into her mouth one-by-one and to outside eyes it would look like she was just swallowing mints or some other small candy. The rush of being able to shrink people down small enough that she could swallow them whole in public and anyone watching wouldn't suspect a thing excited her in ways she never imagined before today. Also similar to small candies the shrunken people didn't last very long in Sally's clutches as she quickly sent them down into her stomach one after another.

Sally let out another sigh as her supply of shrunken snacks had quickly diminished once again. She counted out six people she had now eaten. Wow, she thought to herself, I have six real human beings alive inside of me. This is so surreal. She rubbed her belly once again, imagining what it was like for the tiny people in there. The gravity of Sally's actions over the morning had only just dawned on her. She had just taken six people; regular people who have their own lives and families and everything, and reduced them to tiny little things that were no more than snacks in her eyes. To turn a person into something she could just casually eat like that, it was indescribable. The feeling of power Sally had was immense. A massive shudder went down her spine and settled between her legs as she realized just how powerful this remote could make her.

Sally licked her lips in anticipation. All she had to do now was come up with a decent plan, and she had a few ideas swirling around in her head.
111111111221.title: Thinking of a plan

choices: She keeps the people at their microscopic size and makes quick work of them all
She takes things slow and grows groups of them at a time to really savor
1111111112211.content:
As Sally wandered aimlessly through the mall brainstorming ideas something caught her attention. There was a large advertisement in place for an upcoming football game that even herself, with her almost non-existent interest in sports and sporting events, knew was going to be the biggest game of the season. More like it was going to be the smallest game of the season, Sally thought to herself with a sinister smile as she turn around and headed back to her house to begin planning.

Just over a week later Sally stood outside her town's local stadium. The game was already a good fifteen or so minutes in so the area was filled with the deafening sound of cheering fans and, luckily for her, the outer grounds of the stadium were pretty much deserted. It was the perfect setup for her plan to be put into action, which she had meticulously gone over again and again in the days leading up to this. If her calculations were correct (and they always were) this would go off without a hitch. Perspiration began to build up as despite her overwhelming confidence of success, Sally nervously raised the remote and pressed the shrink button.

The entire stadium was bathed in an incredibly subtle glow that was almost impossible to notice in the bright sunlight. After a few seconds of suspense there was a stunning flash and it seemingly disappeared right before Sally's eyes. To anyone else watching it would have simply disappeared, but she knew better. She grinned ear-to-ear as she casually strolled towards where the center of the field would have been. In its place was the completely reduced and solely intact stadium, about six inches in diameter and still holding over ten thousand people as they continued to shout and cheer for their team in utter ignorance of what had just happened.

When Sally reached the shrunken stadium she was taken aback by the uninterrupted cheering of its microscopic inhabitants. While planning this out she expected everyone to realize what happened immediately, but this was definitely a pleasant surprise. Now she could have a little fun breaking the big news to her newest little toys. Getting down on her knees she crouched just next to the stadium and waited for her moment to strike.

"Boo!" She said loudly as she popped her head over the opening of the stadium, completely overshadowing the entire field and filling the sky with her looming face. The voice drowned out the cheering completely and left everyone in stunned silence as they stared up at her. After about ten seconds everyone seemed to process just what they were seeing and the shouting picked up again, only now instead of excited cheering and hooting it was now full of panicked fear as people fought to get to the exits. Sally smirked as she realized that everyone still believed they were normal size and that she was a giant. Boy did she feel like one right now.

Before people could actually make it out of the stadium Sally acted. She didn't want to waste any of the tiny little morsels by letting them escape into the dirt where she'd wouldn't be able to even see them. Scooping up the tiny stadium and causing the people inside to be shaken up by the worst earthquake anyone has ever experienced in human history, she quickly and gently (as gently as a girl can be when she's handling a piece of architecture that's over a thousand times smaller than it should be) placed the stadium into a plastic container she brought with her and tightly sealed the lid. There should be easily enough air inside for her to get it home.

With her prize secure, Sally quickly made her way to her mom's car she borrowed to make a hasty escape. An entire building as (formerly) big as this going missing was going to draw a lot of attention and she didn't want to be around when it did. She drove off and made it home with no problems, exactly like she planned. Sally went upstairs and placed the container on her desk before taking the lid off. I did it, she thought with confident satisfaction and a tiny hint of relief. Ten thousand people were now in her clutches and no one was the wiser. She couldn't help but start to salivate at the thought of all those tiny people before her.

This was going to be fun.
1111111112211.title: The big game

choices: She plays with them some more
She swallows them all
11111111122111.content:
Sally was usually the type of person who could be patient and pace herself when it came to her desires, but when she finally did find something that tickled her in the right way she was unable to prevent herself from truly indulging in whatever it was. She owed her rather generous physique to this kind of weakness, but it also came as a blessing in disguise at times. The size-changing device was one such example that was born from her staggering devotion to its creation to fulfill the dream that she was currently living.

She wiped a speck of drool from the corner of her mouth before placing her pudgy hands into the container and scooping out the shrunken stadium. Holding her palms as flat as possible she positioned her head so that it could be seen by the inhabitants through the large opening in the center and addressed the tiny crowd inside with a soft yet authoritative tone in her voice.

"In fifteen minutes I will grind the stadium in which you all reside into dust between my fingers. If you do not wish to meet the same fate then I suggest you make your way to the exits and onto my right hand." Sally gestured with a nod towards what was formerly the south side of the stadium. "Only use the exits on this side if you wish to escape safely." Sally was loving every second of this. Her inner comic book nerd was jumping for joy at how she sounded so much like a supervillain right now. If only there was a microscopic superhero in the crowd she could do battle with.

Once she finished talking the entire stadium erupted into panicked cries as everyone inside desperately fought to make their way to the appropriate exits. Sally watched with amusement as the mass of tiny dots slowly and steadily crossed the field and began filing out through the exits. It didn't take long for the more fortunate ones who were seated near the exits to make their way out of the building and onto the soft flesh of Sally's palm. She didn't feel anything at first but eventually started to feel the combined footsteps of the crowd as more and more took their first steps out of their shrunken shelter and into the massive, wide world of the normal-sized.

Taking occasional glances at the clock Sally noticed that the 15 minutes were almost up, however there were still a few stragglers who had yet to make their way out of the stadium and onto the 'safety' of her hand. Not out of mercy, but rather the desire to have as many little people to play with as possible instead of wasting their pathetic lives she decided to give them 5 more minutes before acting out her promise and destroying the stadium. Once the extra time was up and it appeared that the stadium had been completely evacuated Sally separated her flat palms, holding the shrunken building in one hand and its former inhabitants in the other. Then without warning she clenched her left hand into a fist as tightly as she could. The stadium instantly buckling in her grip and crumbling to dust like a dried out sandcastle. Sally closed her eyes and savored the feeling. Her city's football stadium, the most popular landmark in the entire area, capable of seating tens of thousands at a time, the tireless work of countless manhours spent in its construction, crushed into nothing in seconds between the fingers of a chubby teenage girl. The rush she was feeling right now could only be surpassed by what she held in her other hand.

Breathing heavily Sally turned her attention to the crowd gathered on her right palm. Destroying the stadium had been a thrill, but in the end all she had crushed was concrete and metal, hardly anything of true importance. Now this was something truly significant.
