Sally put her hands on her hips and looked down with confidence, "You see these lil' punk? If you're not nice to me they're going to be what ends up squishing you!"

The tiny thrashing form below slowed down a little. Obviously everything was settling in and her temper was being replaced with the fear of realizing just how much bigger this annoying customer had become.

"That's better. Now, I'm not mean. I could just leave you here and let one of the other girls wander out of the change room and splat you instead. Who knows, if they're just dropping off some clothes out here they may be barefoot. I'm pretty sure from my research you should be able to take a variety of barefoot steps without getting hurt. Though of course that's a percentage of the time," Sally explained.

Nikki's shoulders slouched. It was an hour before she was going to go off on her lunch break, and probably take the rest of the shift off because she was already fed up with all the extra stuff that had been left behind for her to do. Now she was staring at this giant plush girls toes and hoping that she wasn't really going to end up under them.

There were a few people in the back change rooms too. Knowing them they'd stumble out here and end up crushing her too. This was a no win situation. Hopefully Sally had made her point and Nikki could be returned to normal size now.

That wasn't the case as suddenly the big girls giant toes reached forward and grabbed Nikki, bringing her down into the carpet and rolling her around under the soft ball of her foot. Sally knew what she was doing. It would be uncomfortable but she was pretty sure that Nikki wasn't being hurt badly.

Meanwhile Nikki was struggling against the soft flesh that was weighing down upon her and having a hard time struggling back against the slightly sweaty soles of this giant girl. Not one to back down from a fight though Nikki was pushing and shoving with all her might. It did actually push some of the wrinkles of Sally's foot up a bit.

High above Sally was actually giggling a little. That was when Nikki realized with a sigh of exhaustion that she was actually tickling the huge customers foot instead of much else.
11112211.title: Sally slips off her sandals and has some fun.

choices: The business lady comes out of the back first.
It's the mother and her daughter arguing with each other still.
111122112.content:
"Y'know, I think it's more fitting if someone else just comes across you and doesn't even think you're a regular person. After all, who would assume a tiny creature like you was just shrunken?" Sally said, smiling down at the tiny face she let look up between her toes.

Nikki stared up in dread, back in the change rooms there was a mother with her bratty eightteen year old daughter who had been arguing through most of her shift. Besides them there was a business woman who was trying on a few skirts. She was pretty careless was in a pair of heels. That wasn't something Nikki wanted to be dodging.

The giant plush girl rolled her foot back toward her sandal letting Nikki get tossed along the floor towards her. Out of character Nikki gave it a last ditch effort and crawled weakly to Sally's foot. She was pleading too quiet for Sally to hear and almost in tears. She held on tightly to the giant girls big toe of her right foot, but Sally just smiled down.

Moving her other foot over, with a flick of her other toes she sent Nikki falling backward and staring up in fear. "You can't just leave me like this!" She burst out, but the shrunken sales associate was beginning to realize that she couldn't be heard.

Sally's huge feet reclaimed her sandals and she shuffled them on so her massive toes were gripping the thong of each flip flop. This sent a shiver down through Nikki, she really was going to leave her like this! Yet again this girl was going to leave another mess, and this one wasn't clothes to put back it was a horrible situation! She stood up again, legs weak from being under Sally's feet, and she lunged forward throwing herself onto one of the sandals.

"Aww, what'cha doing now? Trying to crawl under my foot again? Comon now. I've made up my mind. I'll leave you for someone else. Now don't bother me anymore. There's a lot more people I want to shrink and I can't be wasting my time on you," Sally explained as she tipped the massive sandal forward and let Nikki plunk to the floor.

She couldn't believe this. The giant girl really cared this little about what happened to her. Was she really this mean? Nikki could hear a change room door being unlocked back down the hallway behind the desk. It was either going to be an adventure dodging that womans heels, or the mothers sneakers. Then she remembered the girl just a few years younger than her and looked at the dirty pair of sneakers next to her. The daughter was barefoot. Just great. If torment from Sally wasn't bad enough, Nikki could go splat under that angry girls careless foot.
111122112.title: Sally leaves the tiny assistant for someone else.

choices: Choose the sandwich and crawl into it before Sally knocks her off the table.
Nikki chooses the mac and cheese before she's knocked under the table.
11112212.content:
Sally picked up the tiny girl who struggled in her pudgy hands. Holding her close to her mouth Sally said, "I bet you'd be good to eat!" Emphasised by the plush girl snapping her teeth shut on the end of 'eat'.

In a flash Nikki stopped struggling and stared at the girls huge teeth and soft lips. Looking up past Sally's cheeks she saw the giant girls eager eyes looking down at her tiny body. There was no doubt, Sally was serious. Nikki didn't want to go in there! Her huge plush warm mouth, those teeth, that saliva covered tongue, the whole idea made her feel unable to fight back she was so disturbed.

With a big happy grin, Sally pocketed her shrinking remote and then Nikki in the opposite pocket. The plush girl's pockets in her khaki's were pretty deep and Nikki just curled up and hugged her knees in fear. She hoped that the girl changed her mind but she doubted it.

After a long walk the next situation was even worse. Nikki could hear Sally ordering a meal in the food court. Images of being included in the food finally woke Nikki enough to try to squirm free. An order of a sandwich and a bowl of mac and cheese later, Sally was off to find a seat and begin her meal.

Nikki struggled back into the pocket as the huge pudgy hand entered to grab her and pull her out. There was no way to avoid those fingers and she was pulled free. The scene of the absolutely enormous food court came into view and Nikki's eyes looked around horrified. Everywhere she looked it seemed giant girls were eating food as sloppy as possible. Bits of food hung from their mouths and was slurped up with their eager tongues. Either that or a casual finger pushed their prey into their maw to be consumed.

Looking up at her plush captor Sally was grinning so happily down at Nikki. She dropped the tiny girl down onto a plastic serving tray and began rubbing her large tummy that seemed that the top of it was level with the table.

"See little store assistant, that's where you're going! I'm going to eat you up in one of my yummy food options here. Maybe I'll get you all cheesy and gooey in my mac and cheese here. I'll be nice and use a spoon to try and get you out of it and into my mouth. Or you can be put into my sandwich and I'll eat that and you can squirm around trying to avoid getting all eaten up my giant mouth!" Sally explained to the stunned Nikki.

This couldn't really be happening. Yet there she was, trapped between a sandwich and a cheesy place.

Sally grinned, "It's not like people don't drop things in the food court. I'm sure I wouldn't even notice if I squished some of my food under my bare foot. I usually slip my sandals off while sitting in here. It's nice to let my feet relax while I eat."

Nikki got what she meant. If she didn't choose one of the food items, she was going to be discarded food under the plush girls feet. None of these options sounded promising. What if she got free from the sandwich or such, would that mean she'd won the right to be changed back to normal?

There had to be some way out of this but already Sally was dipping her giant fingers deeply into the mac and cheese and licking it off them high above as she looked down at Nikki's tiny form, "I'm waiting," she said as she twirled her soft pink tongue around a few strings of cheese.
11112212.title: Sally takes Nikki to the food court to eat her up.

choices: There's no sense in struggling, Nikki just hopes for the best.
Nikki shoves herself free and drops to the serving tray below.
111122121.content:
It was a huge mess of gooey peanut butter and jelly in the sandwich that lay before Nikki and she really hoped that Sally wasn't going to force her in. Standing before the sloppy sandwich and looking between the white bread made Nikki shiver as she thought about Sally's huge mouth devouring this meal with her inside of it.

Turning around she didn't have a choice though as Sally's pudgy finger shoved her inside of the sandwich. Struggling away, Nikki managed to push up the top goopy bread layer just enough so she could move around comfortably. Not that actually moving wasn't an incredible struggle though since the peanut butter made the sandwich around her so thick.

"Thats good!" Sally commented high above, "Push the bread up so I can see the little lump that has my tasty surprise in it!"

Nikki instantly regretted her actions and tried to hunker down in the peanut butter and jelly layer. It wasn't doing any good, this was a terrible idea to go along with Sally's idea. She was going to eat her up after all! At least getting knocked to the floor would have given her a chance to survive, besides that huge fall of course.

That was when the girls huge mouth took a bite out of the bread and pulled the rest hanging from her lips in with her tongue. Nikki stared bewildered at the huge empty space where there had just been a room sized chunk of bread. Meanwhile Sally's mouth eagerly ate up the sandwich she'd bitten off and gulped it down into her tummy.

"Really! Just because I hated you being a slob in the store?" Nikki yelled out at Sally. Of course the huge girl couldn't hear a thing the tiny one was saying, but she laughed anyway and yet again a pudgy finger shoved Nikki further back into the sandwich.

Frusterated Nikki sludged forward ready to leap from the bread and tell Sally off. Meanwhile instead she found herself staring out into the huge open cavern of Sally's mouth. Struggling back she screamed as loud as she could. The teeth high above her and below, the saliva hanging in long strands down to that plush pink tongue that lashed about eagerly for it's next gulp of prey, and even worse the uvula visible in the distance showing where Nikki would eventually be swallowed down.

She had no time to think. It was either shove herself free from the bread and fall to the table below, or cover her head and hope for the best as she was taken into the giant hungry maw that was about to draw her in.

So Nikki took and deep breath and...
111122121.title: Sallys Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich With Nikki

choices: "She probably passed out. Great..."
"There you are! You thought you could get away, huh?"
1111221212.content:
Nikki closed her eyes and crawled out of the sandwich just before Sally took another bite in the sandwich. She fell for a while, but her fall was interrupted by the hard serving tray. Nikki opened her eyes and saw that she was still alive! She just had to hide from Sally as she finished her sandwich. She watched in horror as Sally eagerly gobbled up the sandwich. She thoroughly chewed it up and dispelled it to her ever-growing belly. Nikki cringed when she realized that it was almost her that was engulfed by the titaness sitting before her.

Sally let out a tiny burp when she finished with the sandwich. "Well, you might've been a terrible person, but you were a great appetizer!" Sally said to her stomach. She paused. "Hmm... I thought she would be squirming around in there..." Sally thought for a moment.
1111221212.title: Falling to Freedom

choices: Nikki hides and waits for her co-worker to take Sally's spot at the table.
Nikki makes her way down to the floor.
11112212121.content:
Nikki shivered as the giant girl above grumbled, "She probably passed out. Great..." she let her disappointment trail off and put a hand to her stomach, rubbing her belly a bit. The tiny sales assistant was horrifed. Not only did this monster want to eat her alive, she wanted to actually feel the girl squirming inside of her enormous tummy.

Slowly staying crouched behind the container Sally's mac and cheese was in, Nikki began to plan her escape. She'd have to dive over the edge of the serving tray and hide down under the rim until Sally's interest was focused once again on her food.

Meanwhile Sally was licking some jelly off her fingers with her massive tongue high above, happily lapping away. That's when Nikki broke out into a full run and threw herself over the edge of the serving tray. Fortunately Sally was looking around the food court, perhaps she was even looking for more people to eat. The thought forced Nikki on, realizing that the tiny blonde girl with blue streaked hair could survive and just hope others would be snacked on by Sally.

The fall was unexpectedly higher than Nikki would have assumed, probably not taking into account the thickness of the base of the tray. Of course after falling from the sandwich it didn't seem as painful, but it still sent the tiny assistant tumbling to her knees.

Meanwhile above the ridge, Sally's fingers wrapped around the cup of mac and cheese and brought it up to chin level. She began shoveling the goopy cheesy food eagerly into her mouth with a small plastic spoon. Nikki couldn't help but look up in wonder and she was horrified to see the soft lips drawing in Sally's food, her tongue occasionally lapping out to slurp up some cheese hanging from her maw, and all the time her powerful mouth chewing. When Nikki saw Sally's throat gulp down a lump of her meal, that was enough.

Turning Nikki looked towards the edge of the table. She could make it down to the chair and then to the floor she assumed, but then what? It didn't hurt to fall from the sandwich much and surely that had to be a similar height. There was no sense begging with Sally. All she wanted to do was experience eating the tiny associate.

Then again there were crumbs all over the table. Perhaps there was something she could hide under and hope she could get the attention of the next girl who sat down at the table. One of her co-workers was just finishing up buying a meal in the distance and the food court was packed. With any luck she would wander over to the table. Sally was almost done her food and surely had more plans for her shrink remote. Maybe getting her co-workers attention was her best chance.
11112212121.title: Nikki escapes the sandwich and isn't noticed.

choices: Go out into the foodcourt to find help from someone else.
Hop up into Sally's sandals and find a place to hide safely.
111122121212.content:
Deciding to get going while she still could, Nikki made a dash for the edge of the table and lept. Hoping that her new found light weight at tiny size would save her, she landed pretty hard but still okay with a quiet thunk on the seat of the food court table.

Gathering herself up she wandered over to the edge of the seat and looked down. The floor seemed even farther away but at least the impact was so minimal she wasn't too concerned. Dropping down another couple feet, Nikki found herself down on the floor a little worse for wear but still mobile.

Standing up and dusting herself off she looked around. Close by were Sally's feet, happily bouncing up and down on her toes on the insole of her sandals. Occasionally she'd put her big plush feet down and slap her bare soles against the floor loudly. She really was enjoying eating up there, Nikki thought to herself.

Not wanting to be a bug at this customers feet again, Nikki went to dash away and then a frusterating thought grabbed her and she spun around. Sally had the size remote. Nikki could run all over the mall, but it wouldn't do her any good if she couldn't get back to her regular size to avoid being squashed.

Cringing she looked at those scary massive feet. Just one mistake and she'd be smacked with that grimy sole of this nerdy plus sized girl. Nikki turned around again, someone else must be able to help her. Even her co-worker, she could grab Sally and get the remote off of her. That wouldn't be a challenge as long as she wasn't shrunk herself.

Yet how could she get anyones attention at this size. All she was going to do down here was get stepped on. Unless she could somehow get into Sally's sandal and safely ride with her. Eventually she'd make someone grow, if that was an option on that remote of hers. Hopefully then Nikki could get in the way and get back to normal size.

Those feet though. Sally was playing around with her sandals and slapping her feet on the floor so much, odds were Nikki would just get squished without noticed. However, Sally would probably just slip on her sandals and wander off the moment her meal was done so there really wasn't any better time for this.

Nikki looked towards the giant girls wiggling toes of her feet that now rested on the ground and she sighed. At least if her feet were out of her sandals she had a chance. So Nikki make her decision.
111122121212.title: Nikki makes her way down to the floor.

choices: Sally slides off her sandals wanting to feel them underfoot.
Sally tells them to climb up onto her sandals.
1112.content:
Jack stood next to Ryan looking in awe at the new sports car he just bought. The two had been talking for about an hour, rambling on about all the great new features of Ryans new purchase.

Needless to say, when Sally wandered around to stand beside Jack and look at the car, the two were quite surprised.

"You know, it would be easy to get a ton more horsepower out of this thing," Sally mused as the two guys exchanged glances.

Jack crossed his arms. The two auto shop junkies never did like Sally. She always thought cars were so inefficient these days in class. Plainly they both felt she wasted a lot of class time with her ramblings.

Glaring down at her, Jack responded with, "We'll thats great Sally! I'm glad you realize that if your fat butt isnt parked in my car that it'll go a lot faster. Thanks! A ton!"

Wheeling right around Sally met Jacks smart glare with a look that made even him back down. The tall blonde guy stumbled back, bumping into his shorter dark haired nerdy friend. "That's your problem Jack, you've always got a stupid comeback for everything. I'd give you one, but it's too little too late for that!"

Pulling out her remote, Sally clicked the button twice, quickly aiming it between the two guys. In a quick flash of light she stood towering over her inch tall auto mechanic classmates.

Jack stumbled back in surprise, landing on the gritty, hot ashphalt behind him. Sallys brown sandals sat before them, huge and imposing as her toes eagerly scrunched against the insole above. Red toenails digging into the soft surface that was above their view ever so slightly.

"What have you done to us?" Screamed Ryan, who took in the situation much quicker.

To Sally, the squeaks Ryan let out didn't sound like anything. She drunk in the power as her imagination flooded with what they must be seeing. Her soft feet, smooth ankles that gently blended with her calves, leading up into tan cut off khakis just below her knees. If the shadows didnt cover it up too much, they may be able to see her tummy poking over the edge of her pants under her white tee shirt hanging low over it. Finally her sparking eyes, peering down at them past her fat tummy with her red bangs hanging low over them.

"If you think I weighed a lot before, I think you'll be in for quite a surprise now Jack," Sally beamed proudly as she decided their fate.
1112.title: Sally shrinks two in the parking lot

choices: head back into the mall
11121.content:
She wanted to feel this.

Swiftly, she removed her right foot from her sandal and lifted it high (about a foot) above the two men. "You see that?" she said, "that's where you're going to spend all eternity!" The two men shuddered with fear. "Well," she pondered,"now that I think about it, until I wipe you off."

With a smile, she slowly began her foot's descent. She didn't show it, but she was amazed they didn't try to make a run for it. Then one did, one of them, she couldn't tell which, made a dart for it. He didn't last long, all she had to do was slide her foot over a few inches and SLAM it down.

When she did, she could hear a faint 'CRUNCH,' just like stepping on a bug. She then twisted the ball of her foot around, mashing the tiny man into goo. As she did this, she completely forgot about the other man, who tried to make a run for it.

She looked over and spotted him, then started for him. First, she slipped on her sandal, then, with one swift step, she brought here sandaled foot down atop him. He didn't crunch like the last one, and she could barely feel him as she twisted her foot back and forth.

When the deed was done, she stood on one leg and looked under her swuishing foot. "Ooh,' she said, as she saw the man was actually still moving, he had been compressed into the soft foam of her sandal. "Are you lucky?...Nope." With that she plucked the little man from the sandal, and ripped him in half in the process, and simply put her hand into a fist, squashing the little man.

She sighed a sigh of relief, then pulled a napkin from her pocket and wiped her hands clean. "Oh, almost forgot!" She took her foot from her sandal and cleaned underneath it, getting all the squishy remains off.

"Oh well, it was fun whole it lasted, what now?"
11121.title: Back lot crush

choices: Sally strikes her target
Sally misses and something goes wrong
113.content: Sally ran back up the spiraled stair case to her room where she had gone to retrieve her new invention. She kneeled and bent down beside her bed and pulled from beneath a special black box with a lock upon the front. Sally removed the key from her pocket and opened the box and gently removed its contents from within. "Ahhhh here it is the answer to all my problems and the key to a life filled with nothing but happiness and total power. No one will ever make my life horrible again without having the favour returned!" Sally sat examining her wonderful new creation pondering through her mind all the options this simple device will give her. "Hmmm maybe a little test run wouldn't hurt just to get it warmed up". First she started with a few simple things laying around her room like an old toy and sweater. Then she proceeded to peer out the window and spotted Jimmy the boy whom she had longed for for many years but wouldn't give her the time of day and instead would call her names and pull pranks on her in class. He was your typical jock, tall, muscular,with short brown hair and deep brown eyes and captain of the school hockey team. " Hmmm I think I've just found my first human target". Sally leaned out the window aiming the device and then....
113.title: First Victim

choices: Sally squishes him between her feet.
Sally eats him whole, so they can be together.
1131.content:
Not really thinking, Sally leaned out of her window and blasted at Jimmy. The effect was rather dull. Her custom remote had an invisible beam to lower the chance anyone would actually see what was happening.

This device was a lot more clever too. Basically, the only thing Jimmy knew, was that he was walking down the street. Next thing he knew, Sally was sitting crosslegged in front of him on her bed and he stood only about an inch tall on her fluffy blanket.

Sally's custom remote had a matter transporter in it. Since tiny people didn't have much to move, this didn't take much power. So Sally had leaned out the window, blasted Jimmy, and all anyone would have seen was him vanish.

Next she sat down on her bed, rubbing her pudgy hands together in anticipation as she pointed the remote to her blankets and pressed a button to reconstruct the tiny Jimmy before her.

With the movement of Sallys large weight, Jimmy was unbalanced and fell over, staring up at her. He was in complete shock. The transition had been flawless. He was just walking down the street and now he was here.

"Oh Jim, I always had a crush on you and all you did was make fun of me. Do you know how that made me feel?" Sally pouted a little, barely visible over her tummy and breasts until Jimmy scooted back a bit, still laying on his back.

Confused, Jimmy didn't really know what she was talking about. He never really gave Sally any thought at all. Now she sat before him, her huge body looming high above. What would she do?
1131.title: Transported into Sallys bedroom

choices: Sally wipes up and go downstairs.
Sally gets some more people from her backpack.
11311.content:
"You know what? I want you to know how I feel, little Jimmy. I want you to be dirt under my feet." Sally said cheerfully as she looked down at her bare feet, only her toes poking out from under her huge plush thighs.

This finally clued Jimmy in and he began to scramble to get away. Sally found this incredibly amusing. Where did he think he was going to go? Plunging off the side of her bed wouldnt do him much good. She tucked her knees up to her chest and extended to right leg.

Jimmy looked back and saw the huge plush sole of Sallys big bare foot looming behind him, far beyond that her wicked grin and excitement in her eyes. Her huge sole was a vast wall of wrinkles, almost making a flat rolling surface all the way down to her heel. There was hardly an arch, nowhere for Jimmy to stand any chance at all.

Unsure really of how much pressure was too much, Sally tipped her foot forward and poked at Jimmys leg with her big toe. The boulder sized toe was soft at first, but quickly the pressure shoved the tiny man into the sheets and the tension of the mattress pressed him back up into her soft skin making a quiet snap.

Reeling around, Jimmy glared up at Sally beyond the wiggling toes hovering just over his midsection. He looked like he was talking but Sally didn't hear anything really. Her bright eyes lit up under her red bangs. She had her prey trapped now. He couldnt get away now.

Sally wasn't interested in really playing games. She had all day to do that. So she began to rub her giant bare foot up and down on Jimmy, rubbing him into the cool wrinkled skin of her sole. She rested most of her weight on her heel, making sure she didnt squish him yet.

Scootching forward, Sally gathered poor Jimmy up between her feet and stared down at him, resting between her soles. It looked like his left arm was caught between the outside arch of each foot and she wondered briefly if she had broken that too.

"Now Jimmy, don't you wish you'd just been my friend? Now I'm going to have to make a yucky mess out of you all over my feet! My friends are downstairs and I'm up here wasting time with you." Sally mocked a sigh and began to wiggle her toes, forcing her soles to wrinkle and press Jimmy into deep soft folds of her foot. The pressure wasnt painful at all. Yet.

Sally moved her feet back and forth, making a soft shuffling sound as her skin rubbed together. Jimmy was forced deeper into the soft yielding flesh that sourrounded him. Her feet were rather dry and dusty, having wandered around barefoot all morning. Sally finally just tilted her head to one side and made a little kiss, her pudgy cheeks softly blushing as she pressed inward, crushing Jimmy between her thick soles.
11311.title: Sallys crush on Jimmy

choices: Go back to the others and join in whatever fun they're having
Look for more victims outside to play with on her own
11312.content:
Jimmy waits to see what happens next. There is a long, tense silence - to call it "uncomfortable" would be an understatement. He sees Sally's eyes slowly scan up and down his body before locking onto his face, and his terrified expression.

"Aww, what's wrong, baby?" she gently coos, lowering her head closer to him. He raises himself to his feet, wobbling like a piece of shoddy construction on a minute scale. Now closer to him, her voice, still uneasily gentle, is almost deafening. "Are you scared? Ohh, baby there's no reason to be scared..." Her hand begins moving towards him. By the time what's happening registers fully and his 'flight' response kicks in, her pudgy digits - normally stubby but now the size of sofas - are closing around him. Sally balls her fist completely around him. He struggles like a trapped wild animal, but in spite of the enormous girl's palms becoming increasingly sweaty by the second, Jimmy is unable to break free. He feels her hand moving, slowly but steadily, and soon his damp, soft prison opens to reveal that he is only inches from her incalculably massive face.

"...no need at all to be scared, baby, honey, sweetie, my little manly man, my little sugar-coated gumdrop..." Each word elevates a sense of bitter sarcasm in her voice to a higher level, and each word nearly blows Jimmy right out of Sally's hand.
"I love you... and now that I have you here, I never want you to leave me... I'm going to ensure that we're together forever!"

Jimmy can hear her breathing heavier. She's getting excited. If he was terrified before, he's on the verge of a heart attack now. He doesn't know what she's going to do, but he knows it can't be good.
After flashing him a big grin, Sally puckers up and begins moving her giant face towards Jimmy. Her plump, car-sized lips approaching quickly, Jimmy readies himself to jump off Sally's hand, but suddenly the slick, fleshy platform he's standing on tilts at a bit of an angle. Now he's looking almost directly up at the infeasibly large lips. He braces himself for impact as he is pressed between the palm of Sally's hand and the great cushions with a big, wet smack. She begins loudly kissing Jimmy's entire body, creating deafeningly loud squelching and sucking noises along with little moans of ecstasy as she gradually began working him with her tongue and drenching him in her thick, gooey saliva, which was now forming a small pool on her hand.

After about five minutes of this extreme French-kissing, Sally began sucking on Jimmy's tiny form. Jimmy felt a sudden great pressure on his body, as he was slowly and noisily slurped through the tight gateway into the cavern. Inside, it was pitch-black and unbearably hot. The surfaces were all slick, and Jimmy could smell the burgers Sally had eaten the previous night. Everything was still. From the pit in the back of the throat, he heard some nightmarish gurgling - the grinding and churning of this organic machine - and as he began backing away from it, a strand of saliva dripped from the roof of Sally's mouth and fell into his face. Jimmy screamed his lungs out.
Sally abruptly began sucking Jimmy's body and battering it around with her tongue like a piece of candy. She pressed him hard against the roof of her mouth, then pinned him under her tongue, briefly submerging his head in a pool of spit. Trying to get loose, he was lifted up and rammed into Sally's cheek for a few seconds before everything went still again for a few seconds. Jimmy became silent, having screamed himself raw over the past minute or two. Then he felt his whole world tilt again, and a powerful force pulling him towards the source of the gurgling noises. Realizing what was happening, he resumed screaming.

Sally gulped loudly, and, feeling very satisfied, smiled at nobody in particular. She felt a tiny flutter in her tummy, and suppressed a belch, covering her mouth. She giggled - the boy who once made fun of her enormous, jiggling belly would now become part of one of its generously-sized rolls of fat.

She'd never had so much fun in her life - her heart was beating out of her chest and she was getting moist in her lower regions.

What to do now? Should she:
11312.title: Unrequited Love Sucks

choices: She has some fun and stomps around the car.
Sally picks up the car to examine it.
1132.content:
Not being much of a markswoman, Sally ends up blasting a passing car instead! Her custom remote was designed to shrink and transport the target into the remote, all in one smooth motion. Sure enough, the green orb on the remote indicating she had caught something was glowing.

"Oh great! Now what am I going to do!" Sally grumbled as she flopped down in her computer chair at her desk, next to her window. "These people have lives, and I've got no way to make them big again yet."

Sighing Sally looked closer into the green glowing orb. The glow was caused by the tiny little particles that made up the car and it's passengers. She couldn't do anything for them now. It was either keep them as pets until she could make a remote to reverse it, and hope they wouldn't get her in trouble, or just to take care of this. For Sally, it wasn't a choice. The problem had to be eliminated.

Pointing the remote at her floor, the car popped into a miniature form at the press of a button. With a soft laugh Sally smiled at her fortune. 11322.content:
The three cheerleaders had no idea what had just happened to them. One moment, they were driving down the road, on the way to school, and the next they’re on the floor in some giant bedroom, a bedroom that seemed to go on forever.

The hardwood floor itself appeared to stretch for miles in all directions. Off in the distance, a bed larger than any of them could even fathom, sat, with a light blue blanket balled up near the foot. Directly in front of them, a computer desk rose higher than any skyscraper and in a chair that totally engulfed them in its shadow, sat a fat teenage girl who looked awfully familiar.

“What the hell’s going on?!” one of the girls yelled, as she desperately tried to open her door. Suddenly a firm hand clamped down on her wrist. It was Rebekkah, head of the cheerleading squad.

“Stop it, Michelle,” Rebekkah said, trying to calm down her friend. “We need to all stay in the car. I have no idea what just happened to us, but we can’t start freaking out.”

“Okay,” Michelle said in a small voice, as she tried to hold in her tears.

“Um, guys?” Stacy, the driver of the car, said. “I think we’ve been shrunk.”

“Oh, come on, Stacy,” Rebekkah replied. “Don’t be ridiculous. No one can--“ Suddenly, she realized what was going on and what those two large, fleshy things were on either side of them. It was someone’s ankles which were thicker than redwoods and stretched for at least 500 feet from their vantage point.

“Oh…my…God,” Rebekkah exclaimed, before a huge hand descended from far above and two chubby fingers plucked them off the floor.

All three teens screamed as the car was lifted, travelling incredibly fast, before stopping inches in front of an enormous—and incredibly pissed off—face.

“Hello, girls,” a mighty voice boomed, forcing the three terrified cheerleaders to cover their ears. “For years, you’ve taken pleasure in tormenting me and my friends with your cruel jokes and endless waves of vicious gossip. Well, now it’s time for a little payback.”

Suddenly, the car was enveloped by the fleshy walls of Sally’s palm, shrouding the shrunken girls in complete darkness. They screamed again, not knowing what was going to happen to them.

Up above, Sally pondered her next move…

"I've got something special for all of them." Sally picked up her backpack and lead her friends upstairs. They didn't quite know what to expect.

As they approached her bedroom door, Sally turned and explained, "I read this in a story once. I took it a step further though, but it's pretty sweet."

Opening the door the girls croweded into Sally's room. It was relatively clean and organized, cluttered with science and fantasy books all over. Her desk was the most messy spot, covered in rushed drawings of crazy inventions. At the foot of her bed was an aquarium.

"May I introduce, the people farm!" Sally proudly announced as she dumped the contents of her tupperware container into the glass enclosure.

The girls looked down and laughed.

"It looks like a tiny park without grass," Marie commented, looking at all the tiny assorted tables and chairs around the aquarium. Several people were in it. There must have been at least twenty or so.

"What do you plan to do with them?" Cathrine asked, kneeling before the enclosure and poking at a lone little guy with curiosity.

Sally grinned again, "Well, it wouldnt be right for me to go stomping through our city. Not like EVERYONE hates us. So I have this, the start of a tiny city I can destroy."

They all laughed a little, but the grimness of her statement slowly quieted everyone. "How?" Kelly asked. She raised her foot over the glass wall and closed one eye, "I figure I can probably get eight in one step, big deal. Only about a minute or two of fun."

"Not if I shrink them more, and make myself the size of the aquarium. I'd still be a giant to them! It's not done yet mind you," Sally motioned to some models on the back of her desk, "I've been making detailed buildings. Incase any of them want to run and hide in one or such. Should be fun."

Finally they all did burst out laughing, Kelly throwing herself on Sally's bed and looking down over the edge at the tiny world below. "Aww, you're all listening? Sally's gunna squish you all under her big plush feet!" Kelly mocked.

"Actually, I'm quite curious to eat some. I figure it will make a very ironic fate for some of them who made fun of us," Sally noted coldly. Her stare was truly a scientific one. Devoid of anything but curiosity in these experiments with her new device. "So, I figure I can get some more people and really fill up my own minature city."

Cathrine chimed in, "Then we can all join in the fun?"

"Oh you bet," Sally winked. She went to her desk and picked up some of the buildings, "We can always give it a test run."

Her last two victims at school were boys, Mark and Bob. They were in separate areas. Bob became 1 inch and Mike became 2 inches tall. Catherine always hated it when guys loomed over her, and these two were both tall. She finished putting them away and got her things. She left the school.

ON her way home, she shrunk two more people, a little boy and girl. She had seen them join groups of people when they made fun of Sally, her house was near here. She made them both 8 inches tall. She put them in her backpack and went home. When she got home, she...
12422221.title: Finaly shrinkings of pets

choices: Kellys mom picks her up that morning to go home.
Kelly decides to take the bus to the beach.
Kelly wanders off to the park downtown.
13.content:
Kelly could hardly sleep. She had always had dreams about having power like this. At most of her baseball games she played in, she would sit on the bench and stomp ants under her shoes. Wishing they were the people from school that always ruined every day just because they thought it was fun to torment her.

Curled up in her sleeping blanket, Kelly stared at the ceiling. All the wild ideas racing through her head wouldn't let her sleep. The digital clock on the livingroom tv said it was around two in the morning or so. Not really late for her anyway.

She lived a bit outside the city too in a small town. It was mostly farm land around her home. This too didnt help to quench her desire to squish bugs. But now it meant something. Now she could put someone who deserved it through that torture. Plus out at the farm, there wouldnt be many people around either.

Kelly nuzzled down against her pillow and finally drifted off to sleep. Ideas of what to do still flowing as she dreamed.
13.title: Sports girl from the farm

choices: Kelly barges into the barn and shrinks the intruders.
131.content:
Kelly's mom showed up very early to pick her up from Sally's. Groggy from a night of barely sleeping Kelly stumbled to the door, still wearing he nightgown.

"What's going on mom?" Kelly asked, wiping her eyes with the back of her plump hands.

"I've got to go into work early today so I had to run by now to pick you up. I'll just drop you off at home and then I have to go. Get your things ready please honey," The sweet tall and medium sized lady requested as she smiled and waved to Sally's mom.

The ride home was quiet. Kelly was still trying to piece everything together since she had only been asleep for maybe four hours.

They pulled up to the small farm and parked in the little garage. Kelly gave her mom a kiss goodbye and hopped out. Her mom backed out and sped away, leaving her daughter sulking in the open ended, old wooden garage.

"Great. Now who can I try this stupid thing on?" Kelly grumbled wandering up to their big cozy country home.

Sitting on the steps, resting her arms on her rolled up blue jeans, Kelly paused for a moment. She had heard something. Someone was in the barn!
Standing up Kelly brushed off her black tank top and started stomping off toward the old rickety barn.

As she marched down the dusty dirt path to the barn she noticed a few guys who had been sneaking around lately and messing up peoples property. With a sneer, Kelly snatched the remote from her pocket. She knew just what to do.
131.title: Barn storming

choices: One or more stop hiding and come out into the open.
They stay hidden and just make Kelly angry.
1311.content:
Shoving open the barn door Kelly cried out to the guys within, "You've just picked the wrong farm to mess with!"

Stopping, the five boys looked over to Kelly confused and then at each other. They mumbled quietly to each other before Kelly unleashed at one of them.

The effect was instant. Her remote buzzed and flung a burst of light at one of the guys and he vanished. Quickly as that burst had come, Kelly had already turned the remote on another one and fired.

Before long all five of them were miniaturized somewhere on the barns dirt floor. Kelly looked through the misty beams of sunlight coming through the cracked and split wooden walls, trying to see where they were. Wandering into the barn, she slid off her sandals, just incase she needed to move faster than her flip flops would allow.

To the nearest guy, it was horrifing. Dust puffed out from each step of Kelly's thick feet as she padded toward him. Small strands of hay crunched underfoot as she walked on. She was staring right down at him. Not knowing what to do, he turned to run toward a pile of hay nearby.

Kelly broke into a sprint, her tummy bouncing as she ran. Massive footfalls beating the hard packed earth as her big bare feet landed on either side of the tiny man.

He turned and fell backward in surprise as Kelly wiggled her toes up onto his body. "Don't run away. I thought you wanted to play in my barn! We're going to have lots of fun. Don't you like my big bare feet?"

The tiny guy struggled to get out from Kelly's feet, which he managed to do. Unfortunatly this just upset Kelly and she stomped him imediately.

"Maybe your friends will be more understanding," She mused as she turned to look around the barn. They seemed to have all scattered, frightened by this giant girl stepping on their friend.

Kelly grinned, "Silly little people. If you come out, I may be more forgiving. Otherwise my big mean toes may have to grab and tear at your tiny bodies."

Looking around frusterated, Kelly waited.
1311.title: Kellys first squish in the barn

choices: Who's next?
13111.content:
One of the guys finally came out. They were scared of death, but even more scared of the pain a giant girl could bring to him. He decided to play the odds and negotiate.

"Okay, I'm here!" he shouted up.

"Wise decision." Kelly said. "I think you'll enjoy this. It may very well be one of the best deaths you could possibly get. Squished slowly under my soft soles....."

"But, I....Please keep me?" he said nervously.

Kelly giggled. "Keep you? I'm sorry, but after a few days I'd go nuts and squish you anyway. It's best to get it over with, why would you want to delay it....." Kelly said soothingly, tapping her soft, plush foot against the dusty barn floor.

He knew he was doomed. Kelly's foot raised over him and slowly began to lower down. She wiggled it teasingly, and he couldn't help but stare. Even though it would be the instrument of his death, in an ironic twist, he admired it's perfection. Perfection that slowly pinned him to the ground. He didn't squirm of scream, he just laid there.

"Accepting your fate....mmmm...I like that. I wish everyone else was as accepting as you." The pressure of her now slightly dusty foot began to build. The tiny guy sort of rubbed against the softness, trying to enjoy every last bit of her perfect foot just before the end. Organs burst open inside his body and bones snapped as blood emerged from several orifices in his body. Even at the end, he had enough strength to kiss the bottom of her foot, hoping his death gave her pleasure.

The end came with a combination of a THUMP and a SPLAT! Kelly wiggled her foot eagerly as his stain oozed out onto the barn floor.
13111.title: Accepting fate

choices: Kelly gobbles them up
Kelly decides to play with them
131111.content:
Knowing that their fate was sealed, the other four guys decided to come out from hiding.
"okay we're here!" shouted William, the bravest of the group. As they walked towards her from their hiding places.

Kelly let out a greedy smile as she saw these little bugs make their way to her. She could do anything with them! Slaves to do her every bidding. "Oh my!" Kelly exclaimed "four little toys for my big, bare feet to play with" Scrunching her left foot for emphasis.

“Please don’t hurt us!” shouted Alex, the youngest of the group being only 15.
“Awwwww, what’s the matter little one? Do you not want to be squished under my big hungry foot?” she pouted. Stroking his body with her big toe, causing him to fall back, “mmmmm, a tasty little morsel for my soft plush foot” slowly she lowered it down upon him so that he rested under the pad of her sole. One of the other guys ran over, desperately trying to lift up her toes, resisting the pungent smell from these giant pillows. Kelly giggled at this and began wiggling them causing him to be forced under and trapped between them, as she rubs her foot back on forth over Alex, glueing him to the pad of her dirty left foot. “Oh look!” Kelly teased “I’m ignoring your friends, how rude!” with that, she slowly increased the pressure until both guys were squished.

William, and his friend Simon stood in awe at this chubby, blonde haired goddess who had just taken the life of three of their best friends for a moment of pleasure. She stood before them feet apart, toe wiggling in anticipation showing their dirty underside now and again. Her tanktop had lifted up revealing this girl’s pale white stomach and further up was her grinning, laughing face.

“So what she I do with you two?”
131111.title: Who's next?

choices: Kelly makes her way to her kitchen
Kelly goes on the hunt for more people to shrink
1311111.content:
Abruptly, Kelly's stomach let out a low rumble reminding her she had not eaten since the night before:

(Kelly POV)

With that sudden reminder, Kelly knew exactly what was going to happen to these two tasty snacks. Her belly had made its decision and they were going to satiate its needs. But which one first?

(Shrinkee POV)

An ice cold shiver ran down William and Simon as they heard her belly rumble from high above. They didnt miss her thick tongue dart out to wet her lips either. How much food must have passed through that big mouth already? But they weren't food! they were human! Albeit now on a smaller scale but surely she wouldn't! She rubbed her exposed, soft belly looking down at the pair hungrily. Her toes tapping, reminding them of a different end they might have had.

(Kelly POV)

Kelly decides to get down closer to her prey, seeing as they weren't going to go anywhere quickly. She lies down infront of them on her side, her head propped up my one hand, belly facing its food, they were what? Two inches tall? The one on the left who had first spoke out, she recognised as William. He was the older brother of a friend of hers at school! He was cute and well built and they had always got on well, too bad that he had just been reduced to food status. The other boy she didn’t recognise, he was wide eyed and looked very scared. Bless. She licked her lips sensually, mmmmmmmm they were going to taste good. There was no point rushing, no one was going to be home for hours and the look on the boys faces was priceless.

(Shrinkee POV)

Still frozen solid they watched as Kelly came down towards them, as she rested on her side her belly bubbled outwards over the barn floor. They could see her face better now, Kelly was a pretty girl, on the chubby side. But with big soft lips and a pleasant freckled, pale complexion. All the same however the boys didn’t fancy their lives ending as a mere snack to this hungry girl, as they new it would. With her eyes fixed on them, her other hand continued to stroke and swirl her stomach making the silence all the more ominous. Suddenly Simon made a run for it. William still paralyzed with fear collapsed and did not move. “Oh no you don’t” Kelly said.
(Kelly Pov)

With one the guys making a break for it, Kelly finally decided to make her move, she casually outstretched her free hand and plucked the shrinkee mid run, he hadn’t got far. “mmmm hello pudding,” Kelly purred, bringing the shrinkee to her face. “ I don’t believe we’ve met before, my names Kelly and I’m a maneater” and with that she outstretched her big tongue and dropped him in on it. Slowly he made his way into her mouth desperately clawing to get out, screaming and shouting. He almost made it getting halfway out her thick rubbery lips… only to slowly be sucked straight back in. Kelly licked the boy all over, wanting to savour his taste, the other shrinkee William had proceeded to hit her stomach, she smiled at this, I’ll deal with him later. Finally it was time for her little snack to meet its final resting place, in her belly. She swallowed.

(Simon POV)

Simon couldn’t take much more of this and ran, he wasn’t going to be eaten by this girl! He heard her say something behind him, but the door was there in front of him! If he could just… and suddenly he was no longer on the ground and then he was infront of this big girls face. “Please don’t eat me!” he shouted, but she ignored him. She said something to him, but he wasn’t listening and suddenly her big mouth yawned open and he landed on her tongue. He was on a girls tongue! It was squishy underfoot and wet, he tried to get off it, running desperately to get off as he descended into her mouth. The light closing off and he was out! But he wasn’t. Trapped between these soft lips. He was going to die! Just a snack for this hungry girl and with that he gave up. Letting his body go limp he was sucked back in. Swished around this girls mouth, he was tasted all over, clearly she was enjoying him. But finally he slid to the back and down her gullet he went.

(Kelly POV)

“mmmmm, he was yummy!” Kelly exclaimed, patting her big round stomach “yummy in my tummy! And now its your turn little one, do you like my big round belly? There’s got to be nothing better than being inside a girls stomach” She rubbed it for emphasis as William had now backed away. “Whats the matter little one? Are you scared? Soon you’ll be in her with your friend and the only way out is as a blob of mush” she giggled and rolled on to her back, rubbing her tummy sensually. Dreaming of all the fun she had had, and was going to have with this shrink way. “Well William, I think its time you slipped down my throat too…” she rolled over “William?!” He was gone.

(William POV)

After beating on the walls of this giant’s stomach he had given up, it was so soft! Like a big warm, inflatable pillow. Exhausted he collapsed away from it. The black hole of the belly button staring back at him, as big as his head and when he had been next to her stomach it rose out and over-hung him, just daring for this giantess to flatten him under it. He backed away as she taunted him, his friend was in there! In her belly like food. She rolled over, and with her eyes no longer on him, he legged it. Hiding wasn’t too hard for a shrinkee of his size, he simply ran a fair leg and dived under the thin layer of straw. He could see her stand up now, looking around angrily. Big feet padding here and there, belly wobbling with each step He shuddered at the thought of his life ending inside this monster. But she was just a girl! And she saw him as a snack!

(Kelly POV)

Drat he’d escaped, “When I find you William I’m going to eat you!” Suddenly out of the corner of her eye, she saw him. He was just a few feet infront of her two her left, on the floor under some straw. Oh William…. But she decided to play his game. “Fee-Fi Fo Fum!” Kelly stomped around the barn clawing at the straw with her big, bare, dirty feet. After 5 minutes or so she put her foot down on him, trapping him underneath, and smiling like a Cheshire cat, Kelly had caught her prey. grabbing William from her foot she held him to her belly. “Do you hear your friend in there? Mmm you guys are so tasty, but very small, I’m probably going to go eat a big meal after slurping you down, maybe shrink another little man snack. How does it feel to know your life ends in my belly?” She giggled, and with that she raised him to her mouth, and sucked him in feet first. He went straight to the back of her mouth and down to her belly. Kelly burped and sighed happily.

(William POV)

Watching carefully, he was waiting for her to move out of the way of the door so he could make a break for it. But all to suddenly he was sandwiched against the barn floor. He was under her foot! He couldn’t move under the thick, heavy sole and before he knew it he was against her belly. He didn’t want to die! Not in there! He felt his legs being sucked into her mouth through her lips. Those big soft lips. “noooooo!” William screamed as he became nothing more than a snack for a hungry girl

“I’m hungry!” Kelly exclaimed, and walked out the barn.
1311111.title: Kelly gobbles them up

choices: Now that Kelly's set an example, the others give in
They only want to hide from her even more
13112.content:
When no one responded to her call, Kelly began to get mad.

"Come out NOW! Or I'll make it very painful....I'll tear you apart with my feet!"

No one answered still.

"Fine then......." She headed in the general direction where she knew one was located. "It's time...."

The tiny person was hidden poorly in a small haystack. When he felt the mini-earthquakes approaching, he struggled to get out and run. But he was a little tangled in the hay and it was impossible to get out. Soon Kelly was standing right over him.

"Trying to escape, are we? I'll make sure you regret that!" Kelly said with an evil smirk as she stomped down on him. The soft hay cushioned the impact from killing him, but it still hurt like hell as it felt like several tons of plush bare foot slammed down into his body. He could have sworn he felt something crack.

"AUGH!" he cried out.

"Don't like it?" she said, licking her lips as she grabbed his right arm between two toes. Squeezing, she compressed it slowly. He writhed in pain until the bone was basically shattered and it was reduced to a long, bloody mess protruding from his shoulder joint.

"AAAAAH! OH GOD! LET ME GO! AAAAAAH!" He was in more pain than imaginable.

"Hehehe.....don't like my foot?" she teased, as she dropped her heel down on his legs. It wasn't enough to just crush them, she had to twist them into an even worse mess than his right arm. There were sickening, audible breaking and squishing sounds the whole time. And Kelly loved it. He was screaming his lungs out, but starting to lose conciousness. Finally, Kelly put him out of his misery (pun intended). She trapped his head between her toes, and then squeezed them shut. Darkness took him as his skull and brain were reduced to a bloody mess. She stamped down on his remains once for good measure.
13112.title: Pissed off plush girl

choices: Squished in Kelly's sandal
Splattered between both feet
131121.content:
After hearing their comrade's last screams of pain, they begrudgingly came out.

"Aww, so you finally understand that you have no chance. You want to avoid pain. Wise of you, because you may actually enjoy this." Then she noticed that there was only 2 coming out, and she counted 3 left.

"Your friend isn't as wise. I'll be sure to punish him later. Now then.......you first."

She smiled cooly down at a black haired tiny. He was trembling in fear as her bare foot softly padded down on his tiny body.

The other tiny, brown haired, watched with unusual interest as he was slowly mutilated under her foot.

"Cute little bugger....." Kelly said as she pressed on her current victim him under the ball of her foot. Soon, blood seeped out with a soft crunch once more...

The brown-haired glasses guy's eyes went big, still watching with interest.

Kelly noticed this. "Aw! You like that? Want me to do it to you next?" she said sweetly.

He nodded eagerly.

She showed off her bare, blood stained sole, which only served to excite him more. "Squish me, squish me!"

Kelly laughed. "Hehe! You really want this, don't you. You're a funny little guy. Well, if you want it so bad, then choose. How do you want to die?"
131121.title: Giving in to avoid pain

choices: Kelly leaves the barn
Kelly decides to go after that coward.....
1311211.content:
The blonde haired girl smiled down as the tiny person.

"Sure, if that's what you want." Kelly casually dangled him over her left sandal and dropped him on it. There was slight perspiration and a few stray blades of grass upon close examination of it. He could see a bit of an outline of a foot......A foot that was approaching quickly!

But he cared not. He lied down in the area where the sole was going to descend. This was his death, and it was going to be incredible. The foot slid in and covered his body with incredible weight. He stroked the soft flesh and kissed it once for good measure, as she began to walk. The first step was extremely nausiating. His whole world shifted rapidly, as the weight lifted off his shoulders, and suddenly it all came back down seemingly twice as heavy with a loud THUMP! His ribs snapped under the pressure immeadiately and his main skeletal structure seemed to groan under the weight. And that was just the first step. It was the same process, continuing on and on. To the end, he rubbed against and carressed the sole, even as he began to black out and his body began to be mishaped. It was all over as soon as a loud CRUNCH signaled his body's collapse, and Kelly's beautiful, plush foot met the sandal.
1311211.title: In Kelly's Sandal

choices: Now to find that coward.....
1311212.content:
He slowly verbalized his request.
"Please, squish me between your beautiful soles."

Kelly thought about it, and then nodded. "OK!"

Before he knew it, he was between both of her feet, and they started to close in on him slowly. He looked at the soles, which were slightly wrinkled, and very "plush". They wiggled almost as if to tease him. Yes, he was going to be squished just as he dreamed. The tiny seemed to swoon as they clamped on him and began to press.

"Oooooohhooh.." He carressed the soft flesh. It was too much. Too much......

Tighter and tighter the wrinkled soles began to press. But it wasn't enough. Soon she began to move both feet in a back and forth rubbing motion, still pressing them. It was the most wonderful feeling for a tiny guy like him. She wiggled her foot a few more times, causing things to tense up and hurt occasionally in there, but it was all worth it. He couldn't have escaped anyway....

He found himself rubbing himself up back against the flesh soon enough. It got darker and more moist in between them....They got tighter and shut out all light as the sole molded around his body. He was going to lose it any minute now.....

The pressure was too great, as bones snapped quickly. He fought through the pain to stay awake to the last moment, as he went for broke, rubbing against the soles and even making thrusting motions, until......

SPLAT! He lost it just as they sandwiched him completely into a neat stain. She smiled. "My best squish yet." She licked him off her soles to enjoy his taste.
1311212.title: Sandwiched

choices: All his organs pushed out his mouth
131122.content:
The tinies stayed hidden.

Kelly sighed and went looking where she found the first one; among the hay bales.

There, on the ground, behind the hay, a tiny poorly tried to conceal himself.

"Ah-ha!" Kelly lightly put her toe on his middle, and dragged him to the center of the room, where she knew an audience was watching. Kelly pressed her toe down, and said "that's right, little one, this toe's gonna push everything out your mouth!! Hmm, I wonder how much weight your puny little frame can take?"

To everyone watching, it was horrible. The tiny's eyes were bugging out a terrifying amount.

"... And..."
131122.title: They only want to hide from her even more

choices: Kelly grabs John and sticks him in her sandal.
Kelly just moves over one seat and sits on John.
Kelly sticks John into her jean pocket and arrives at the beach.
132.content:
The bus was empty when John had first got on. They had just drove into the main residental areas near the mall when the bus stopped to let a girl from school on. Kelly.

John didn't like Kelly much. He glanced up as the fat blonde got onto the bus and put her ticket into the raader at the front. She was wearing a black tanktop that only showed off her fat freckled arms and her blue jeans were rolled up to almost her knees, showing off her fat calves and flat ankles that lead down to her white sandaled feet. Typical attire for Kelly.

She wandered right in and surprise surprise, sat next to him. John sighed, "What do you want?"

"Aww, what's wrong nerd, upset that there wont be any book club this summer?" Dispite hating the teasing she always got at school, John and Kelly always insulted each other.

He grumbled, "Just leave me alone alright? I didn't ask you to come sit with me."

The bus lurched and began driving again, Kelly glanced up to make sure the bus drivers eyes were on the road.

"I dunno John," Kelly said with a sly grin. "You were checking me out when I got on the bus. Did you look at my feet?"

John looked over to the girl sitting next to him from just staring out the window, "Huh?"

Kelly grinned broader, pushing up her freckled cheeks. "I think you did. Wanna see?" She plopped her right ankle on her plush left thigh and slid off her white rubble sandal. Kelly spread her toes and wiggled them a little.

John watched, and then looked up at Kelly. "Why would I look at your smelly feet? Or any overweight part of you?"

"I dunno John. Maybe it's a dream of yours. Maybe you just make fun of me cause you really do think Im big. Giant even! Think you could get away if I wanted to squish you under my feet?" Kelly asked as she rubbed her thumb around on her plush sole and then looked back up at her rival.

"Are you nuts?" John went back to looking out the window.

Kelly put her foot back down and grabbed the transparent red straps of her sandal with her toes to pull it back on. She dug around in her pocket for the remote.

"Time to shut you up once and for all you bothersome bug," Kelly grumbled.

John turned to look back, but before he could finish saying, "What was that?" A flash of light blinded him.

A moment later, he was staring up at Kelly from the seat. She looked down laughing and in her right hand she had what looked like a black tv remote. He wasnt any more than an inch tall!

The bus lurched and he fell on his face. Kelly looked up gasping, more people were getting on the bus, she had to think fast.
132.title: Rivals on the bus

choices: Follow Kelly off the bus to the beach.
Stay with John and see what happens to him.
1321.content:
Kellys thick fat fingers wrap around John and she ducks down behind the seat in front of her. Quickly she stuffs John under her arch, pinning him under her sweaty soft sole against her dirty rubber sandal.

"There," she grumbles as she moves over, making sure to put her weight on the other foot as she moves over into the window seat.

John struggled against the soft wrinkles pressing down on him from above. As Kelly sat there wiggling her toes, the wrinkles compressed down on him from above. Each time it was enough to knock the air out of him. Kelly only seemed to move her foot around more as he struggled.

His tiny body seemed to make it only worse as her foot got sweatier above him. The moist plush skin rubbed down on him in waves, pressing him into the yielding footprint of Kelly's well worn sandals.

Crying for help did nothing, but he did it anyway. This horrible girl that bugged him daily was going to be his end.

Kelly had actually already lost interest in John. Not even noticing if he was still moving. Even if he fell out, someone else would just end up squishing him probably. Her eyes were already set on the beach as they pulled into the parking area.

John was banged up pretty bad but he did finally manage to slip free from under her arch, thanks to Kelly's foot being so sweaty. The bus again lurched and Kelly stood to leave, poor John laying helpless on the floor.

Kelly forgot it and...

The surfers
