Kelly stepped off the bus, carrying her device safely with her. She immediately headed off towards the beach, ready to shrink someone. The warm sand seemed inviting to her, so she kicked off her sandals and enjoyed the feeling on her soles. She could just imagine what it would be like to squish someone here, feeling their struggling body give under her massive weight as she feels the simotanious feeling of the soft sand and the squishy remains of her victim.

Kelly looked out to one side of the beach. There were a bunch of slutty looking girls improving their already unnatural looking tan. On the other hand, there was a bunch of surfer guys tossing frisbee.

Who does Kelly pick to shrink?
132111.title: Big Beach Squish?

choices: Kelly gets creative
Someone's noticed her stomping by now
1321112.content:
Kelly went over to the surfers and waved to them.

"Hello boys, can I play with you?"

They shook their heads. "Sorry, we're full."

However, Kelly didn't mean play in the frisbee game. "When I said play WITH you...I meant it!" Kelly giggled. She checked to make sure no one was especially paying attention, then she shot one of the boys with the remote, shrinking them down to 1 inch tall. Before the other surfers could react, she had shrunken all of them, and they were in danger of getting squashed by, from their perspective, a Godzilla sized chubby girl.

Without warning, Kelly's foot slammed down on the nearest of the boys. He screamed as he was basically pressed almost flat, but not all the way. Kelly twisted her foot and intentionally tried to press and squeeze him dry, causing obscene amounts of blood to spurt out from under her foot. "Mmmm, nice and squishy, just the way I like it!" She finished bleeding him dry and stomped on his body for good measure.

The rest of the boys ran off, but Kelly had other plans. She picked up the Frisbee and tossed it directly in front of them, bringing a sudden halt to their running. A few more stomps later and another of the boys met his end, getting torn in half by one of her steps, which landed so hard that it literally squished his legs off his body. He crawled futily as the only thing on his mind was survival, but he was soon put to rest as she placed her big toe on his head and crushed it, as if she were an animal killing her prey brutally.

Kelly looked down at the terrified boys. There were only 3 left. "Just stay there and it will be over soon. You might even enjoy it...."
1321112.title: Squeezed

choices: Follow the tinie's adventure in Kelly's digestive system
Follow Kelly to her way back home
13211121.content: "Such beautiful guys to enjoy and play with", giggled Kelly. The tiny men looked up in fear and were scared of what she might do to them. She took her bag off, then she unbuttoned her shirt and she stuffed the shirt into her bag. She looked curiously on the three tinies. She smiled which gave them the chills. She grabbed two tinies and threw them into her bag. She closed the bag, then stood up at her full height. The last tiny saw a enormous fat girl in a swim suit. Her pinky toe was 2 times his size, he knew that if he ran, death would be assured. She picked the little man up and went to the storage area where she can put her bag in. As she walked the little guy's head was sticking from her fist. As she walked she spotted a group of girls who caught sight of the tiny but were not sure if that was a person. One girl went up to Kelly and said "Hi, my name is Kayla, nice to meet you. Wow you got a cute pet in your hand, what is it, the suspense is killing me, I really need to know." Kelly put her hands behind her back, pulled the back of her panties open and dropped the little guy in. He flew headfirst into the crack of her buttocks. Without saying a word, Kelly quickly ran from the group of girls. This made the tiny man in her panties move to the front of her panties. She started to slow down and breathe heavily. She started giggling because the tiny was touching her g-spot. After a minute, the tiny climbed into her vagina which made Kelly go hysterical, the tiny stuck his head out, took a long deep breath and then crawled back up into her vagina. Apparently he enjoyed being in contact with her special body part. Kelly then kept on laughing and wiggling in a weird way the she landed on the floor which sealed the way out for the tiny. After the tiny ran out of breath, he tried to come out and breath but couldn't, this made him kick and move more violently then ever. Kelly burst laughing then found out that he was suffocating. She stood up, which made him fall on her panties. The tiny started gasping for breath. "Hold your breath little one, I must go into the water and remove you from my panties, I can't do it in public", Kelly said laughing. The tiny man had no other choice but to listen. He took a very big and deep breath. Kelly then jumped into the water, opened her panties, and took the tiny out. She stuck her hand in the air giving the tiny man air to breath. Kelly had enough fun for one day and was ready to go back home, she didn't want to put him in her panties or else he might get crushed. So she placed him in her mouth, closed her mouth, and walked to the storage area to get her bags. As she was walking she bumped into an old lady and tried to say I am sorry, but when she did, she swallowed the tiny man. She heard his last screams before he became a part of her meal. Kelly stood their paralyzed, then she looked at her bulging stomach, then she smiled. She quickly ran to the storage room, took her stuff, and went to the bus stop to wait for the next bus.
13211121.title: Kelly's accidental torture

choices: Shannon, a darkly dressed goth girl clad in a tube top, choker and bracelets.
Tara, a punk girl with piercings in tattered jeans and a punk band tee shirt.
132112.content:
The remote was left behind. Kelly was oblivious as everyone piled on the bus behind her and the door shut as it drove away.

Several girls, coming from a morning on the beach wandered by the remote, not playing attention to it. The two that considered sitting down were both plush like our main characters, but different. Finally one stopped and looked down. It was...
132112.title: SECRET CHARACTERS

choices: So that evening, Jeff brings his friends over for a game.
Jeff doesn't show up at all hours later into the evening.
1321121.content:
Shannon looked down kinda confused at the seat. Someone had either left behind their tv remote, or a really thick mp3 player. Not really caring either way, she scooped it up and threw herself down in the window seat.

On the ride back to the town house complex where Shannon lived, she looked the remote over in her hands. It was the stupidest thing she had ever seen. The labels and such on it seemed to imply it could make things smaller. Which of course, just isn't physically possible! Well, of course that's what Shannon thought.

Stomping off the bus, her tough grey boots, almost like work boots, clomping on the sidewalk, Shannon walked to her home. Tired out from walking down near the beach, because she had nothing else really to do, the goth was miserable. Her boots of course were way too hot, but she really didn't care. Of course, her entire black attire didn't help the heat situation much either.

Wandering into her place, the door was already open and she grimaced at the grimey entrance way. Her room mates that she had lived with for years now were always so lazy. Unfortunatly, so was Shannon, she just never let that point be made.

"Alexis! Tanya! I'm home! Is the freakin cable fixed yet?" Shannon bellowed, closing the front door. Enjoying how it made the entrace hall dark and shadowed.

A girl with blonde hair, streaked pink, ducked her head around the corner. "Whatcha yellin for dark stuff? Had fun at the beach?"

Shannon grumbled, "The guy didn't show up. I sat out on the stupid park bench for almost two hours in the sun, waiting for a stupid nerd!"

Pulling off her boots, the angry goth wandered from the wood floor in the hallway onto the soft carpet that felt good against her damp bare feet. Flopping out on the couch, next to the recliner her friend sat in.

Almost glaring, Shannon looked up her friend. Alexis was the girl who had poked her head around the corner. The blonde girl with pink streaks in her hair was actually quite regular really. An average, sorta thin sorta not build that Shannon held great envy for. Alexis liked to show it off too. Wearing only a light white tank top, and a pair of faded blue shorts. Her skin was so pale though, Shannon couldn't help but wonder which of them went outside more. She still had on her necklace too, a trinket her boyfriend had given her. Which only made Shannon feel worse to remember her friends new love.

"Ah don't let it get you down Shan Shan, the guy's probably held up in a basement somewhere, asleep after playing those role playing dice games with his friends all night. You know how they are. He's probably crazy into you because the goth thing drives him wild," Alexis offered finally.

Cuddling down onto the couch, Shannon pouted and looked over at the tv silently. After a few moments she finally asked, "So where's Tanya." Then the goth quested her plush hand out to grab a bowl of chips from the table that she started snacking on.

"Oh upstairs or around. Hey I have an idea!" Alexis said excitedly, sitting up from laying with her legs over the edge of the chair.

Shannon was almost afraid to ask, "What now?"

"Why don't you invite your friends over tonight? Well you know, whats his name and his friends. The role players! They could come by, have a game here, we all have some snacks, and he gets both things that he loves!" The crazy looking blonde was actually completly wrapped up in this idea.

Rolling her eyes Shannon rolled over and grabbed the phone, "Fine! But I'm telling you, I think the guy just doesn't like me."

"Oh and Shan, you may want to stop wearing those boots in the summer. Whew," Alexis laughed lightly and smiled at her friend almost aplogetically.

A tall brunette haired girl stumbled over to the archway leading into the dining room. Wearing a blue rock band tee shirt, covered by a grey overshirt, and her usual, rolled up light gray khaki's. "What's going on?" Tanya yawned, stumbling slightly as she stepped on some cereal left on the floor. She seemed like she just woke up.

"We're having a role playing game night for some of Shannon's friends," Alexis explained. After Tanya didn't respond much besides staring on with eyes half opened she added, "With lots of snacks, maybe we'll get a pizza!"

"Oh, hey thats cool. Has anyone seen my lil digital pet thingy? I love torturing that little thing. I'm sure there has to be a way to make them die off eventually," Tanya mumbled as she flipped a seat cushion on the couch.

Shannon held up her hand as someone answered her phonecall, "Hi! Jeff? What? You slept in? Yeah, but I wasn't there too long I guess. Hey, we were talking. If you and the guys don't have a place to role play tonight, you can stop by over here. Really? You want to? Sweet! See you this afternoon!"

Hanging up the goth fell back laughing. "See? Don't we look after our own here Tanya?" Alexis chirped up.

"Hey that's great. Cool my sandwich!" Tanya laughed as she was digging through the couch. Shannon being the biggest girl as far as weight went in the house, no one would ever know it by how much these two skinny girls ate.
1321121.title: Shannon, the dark side of the plush

choices: She grabs the remote and shrinks everyone in the kitchen.
Shannon just ignores them and curls up sniffing on the couch for now.
13211211.content:
Time passed quickly with the three girls laying around in their living room, waiting for company to arrive. Tanya called a bit early and ordered up a few pizzas for her and Alexis to go pick up.

Finally, when they were just leaving, Jeff and a bunch of his nerdy friends showed up. Shannon wasn't too impressed to see the rest of them, but she eagerly hugged Jeff a hello.

"Hey shorty, where are we setting up?" Jeff asked as he took off his backpack full of gaming rule books.

Shannon glared at his comment but she casually said, "The table in the kitchen is pretty big, probably the best place. How many people did you bring?"

"Seven, well eight including me. I kinda figured you had the room and all. Comon guys, oh and girl," Jeff said as he walked on toward the back of the town house. Shannon peered back curious to see that one of the guys had brought their wife along too. Everyone, including Shannon was only around their early twenties, but some of her friends did marry early.

Everyone set up and Shannon stood off in the wood trimmed doorway leading back through the dining room and into the living room. Most of Jeff's friends were heavy set guys, which made her feel a little better about herself. But Jeff himself was rather scrawny.

"Alright, who was I with last adventure?" Began Jeff who was leading the game it seemed.

"Rob and I had just gotten out of the castle with that thing the mage guy from town wanted us to steal when he caught us stealing from his shop," One guy explained. One of the heavy set ones, with thin blonde hair and stubble.

The girl, also a heavy set member of the group joined in, "Wasn't I finally back with the caravan? Shouldn't we wrap that up first?"

"So," the voice broke all the comments, "when do I get to roll up a character?" Shannon asked quietly.

"Shan you can't play! We're in the middle of a campaign!" Jeff laughed, "There's too much going on right now for me to just work you in."

"Well, I figured you'd make room for your girlfriend," Shannon pushed him a little with a smile, standing over his chair.

Jeff dropped his bag of dice on the table, "Is that what this is about? You thought we were dating? I've had enough of fat girls! Kelly was a hyperactive pain. Last thing I need is you getting depressed on me all the time!"

All of his friends sat there, kind of in shock at Jeffs words. Worst of all was Shannon, who's eyeliner had already began to run in ragged dark gray tears. Bursting out of the room crying, she threw herself down on the living room couch.

Back in the kitchen, Jeff's friends were telling him off quietly, encouraging him to go make up with the poor girl. Though he would have nothing to do with it of course.

Through tear filled eyes, Shannon's shivering body allowed her to look up to see the remote on the couch. If only that thing really worked.
13211211.title: Nothing worse than a goth scorned

choices: Shannon tells them what happened and asks them to join in.
Shannon freaks out and shrinks them too, still hurt and frusterated.
132112111.content:
Through tear filled eyes and a building rage, Shannon grabbed the remote and stumbled back into the kitchen.

At the sound of her heavy footsteps slapping against the thin plastic tile of the kitchen floor, Jeff snarled back, "Your little performance didn't win you the right to join in Shan."

All of his friends were looking up at her though. In her outstretched hands, Shannon held the remote like it was a pistol she had never fired. Clenched tightly in two hands.

"Get out of my house or I'm going to make you wish you did Jeff!" Shannon cried out through stifled tears.

Slamming his book on 'the dilect of elves and dwarves from asteroids under the sea' shut, Jeff stood up and turned to her. Seeing the remote for the first time he snapped back, "Whatcha gunna do? Mute me?"

Those were Jeff's last words at that height, as a bolt of electric blue energy was flung from the remote and diminished him soundlessly, besides his cry of surprise of course.

"You all knew what he was suppose to do today! You knew this wasnt about just using my house! Now you're all going to pay for Jeff's stupidity!" Was Shannon's final words as she began to feel a little better, blue light flashing out the back windows as she shrunk person after person with wild laughter.

Meanwhile Tanya and Alexis were just getting out of their car and closing the doors as they carried the pizzas up to the town house. Unaware of the chaos out back they opened the door and walked in to find Shannon on her knees on the floor, sobbing over a tiny figure that was stumbling away from her toward several others under the kitchen table.

"Now, you're all going to pay," Shannon said in an almost pouty voice, wiping her nose with her forearm.

Looking at each other, Tanya and Alexis slipped off the flip flops and slowly approached the kitchen.
132112111.title: Shannon shrinks the role players

choices: "However, maybe I oughta shrink you down so that your still bigger than them
"Lets have fun."

Alexis and Tanya entered the room, to see the situation. "What the %#& is going on here?" asked Alexis seeing the shrunken people. Shannon looked at them, her rage toning down a bit as she realises that they have seen too much now. However, they were her friends, so they probably are better off at knowing this. Rising up, she starts telling them

"Well, it was like this..."




A few minutes later, both Alexis and Tanya were looking rather surprised, both because of the shrinking device's existance and of what Jeff went to say to their friend:

"I always guessed that there was a little bit of something in him, but that was an extremely awful of him! How could he do that to you?!" said Tanya while looking at the little people, Jeff in particular. (they were gathered in a small box while Shannon told about this)

"I didn't believe it myself either. The bastard caused me cry and go like this. I don't know what I would have done had you not shown up... however, that doesn't mean I wouldn't do something with them now." Shannon told, while peeking at the shrunkees. Alexis was now seemingly thinking about the remote and what they could do with it, especially after hearing what Shannon had to tell.
She asks her a simple question:

"So... what now?" to which Shannon thinks for a moment, then...

"Well... tell you what. Since the two of you are friends of mine, I'll let you take a part in the fun. Just need to come up with a few rules. Want to come in?"

Both Alexis and Tanya eventually, after thinking about it, decided to go and try this out. Its not like this comes up everyday. Then Shannon told one more thing...

"Lets have fun," Shannon announced, looking down into the box on the coffee table. The tiny people were clawing at the smooth cardboard sides of what seemed to be an old shoebox, one that Tanya had kept photos in.

Alexis laughed, "That's the rule?" The blonde girl was grinning from ear to ear, figuring her goth friend had some devious ideas in mind.

Shannon cleared her throat, "Well, no. I dunno. I guess we shouldn't kill them. I mean, if we do that, people may ask questions. They were suppose to be coming here last night after all."

"Correction," Tanya noted, wandering into the room with a plate of cookies she was already enjoying, "They were suppose to go to one of their houses. When Shan called them, she got them on a cellphone at the mall. Everyones clueless as to where they are."

"So they're ours to do with as we please. How in the world did these idiots end up shrinking each other? I mean, you'd figure at least one would have been left. That's a pretty neat trick," Alexis noted. Then sat down next to Shannon, hands between her thighs as she giggled. "Well, what do we do with them?"

Shannon was silent for a moment. Looking into the box at the human lives she now controlled the fate of.

That was to rub in some guilt on Jeff, if he felt any that is. Either way, the other tiny people were looking at him in an angry way and thus making Shannon succeed in what she was up to.

Some of the little people were begging for mercy of course. Meanwhile, Tanya seemed to be thinking something up and caught her friends attention:

"Hey, how about a sort of a compromise? We will crush them one by one, until there are three left. Those three may have a chance to live, as long as they are willing to be shared between us as foot slaves and such. How does that sound?"

Shannon proposes a 'test' of Justin's love.
132112111121122.content:
The tiny, half inch tall tall captives had heard everything, and were freaking out, begging for mercy, screaming and crying. The girl, Melissa clung to her boyfriend, Justin. Suddenly, as the immense goth raised the box to her face, sending them all tumbling, he pulled away from her and tried a desperate gamble.

"Shannon!" he shouted as loudly as he could, "I... I've had a crush on you for so long... Please don't do this! I really like you Shannon!"

Melissa was shocked. "Justin?" she gasped, in horror.

He wanted to try to save them all, but it was a bad choice. Shannon saw that the bug sized man was willing to betray his girlfriend, the way she'd been betrayed and it made her almost ache to feel all of the wretched gang squish under her foot!
132112111121122.title: Big mistake from a little man

choices: He gives in and becomes Shannon's forever.
He backs out.
1321121111211222.content:
"Okay, I'll test your love." Shannon said. "I will let your friends live, but if, and only if you are willing to do something incredible."

"What is it? I'll do anything," he said.

"Present yourself at my feet. Acknowledge me as a goddess that you will live for forever. That means.....you must cater to my every whim, you must kiss my feet and worship me as if I were a goddess, you must love me as if I were a goddess. And if I so request it, you will die for me as if I were a goddess. Yes, you must give up your whole old life and begin anew for me, and I will release your friends. If at any time your "love" waivers, I will re-capture your friends and squish them so slowly, while you watch. And then I will torture you to death. If you can't prove your love to be true, give up now and take the quick death."

He looked up at Shannon. This was a huge choice for him. Could he really go as far as to abandon his girlfriend and give everything up just for a chance to live, even as a slave for the rest of his life?
1321121111211222.title: Test of love

choices: Shannon turns on the rest of the tinies and kills them all.
Shannon decides to wait on their death for now.
13211211112112222.content:
Justin backed away and shook his head. He realised that he couldn't betray his girlfriend, even with the threat of death. And he couldn't have lived as a slave to Shannon for the rest of his life.

In the mean while, Shannon was infuriated. "You lied to me. I knew it. You were trying to play at my heart. But I'm going to get at yours, as soon as I squish it right out of you....."

Pretty soon, Justin found himself on the floor, looking up at the giant monolith of Shannon. She gave a cruel smirk as her foot pressed down on his chest. Justin's girlfriend screamed for her to let him go, but in response, Shannon tossed her into her mouth.

"I get a double deal. A squish and a snack..." she said, as she bit down on the poor girl. It was horrifying to her as she had to endure the pain and sight of watching her body hacked to pieces by Shannon's teeth. She was then swallowed as Shannon licked her lips, the remaining pieces of the tiny SW gruesomely dissolving in her stomach.

Having finished her snack, Shannon looked down at Justin.

"I did say I'd squish your heart out..." Shannon said as she slowly pressed her big toe down on his chest. The pressure on his chest cavity increased to a breaking point. His ribs collapsed, his breath escaped him, and his vitals were literally squished right out of him, now an unrecognizable mess in the stain that was once his torso. Justin died almost immeadiately, but Shannon stomped on the mess multiple times for good measure, until there was no evidence left of his body save for a stain which she easily wiped up.
13211211112112222.title: Double deal

Shannon eats one of Jeff's firends.

Shannon, Tanya and Alexis all looked down at the tiny people and began to think. Its not that they did not have any ideas on what to do to them, it’s that they had so many ideas that they had no idea what to start off with. Then Shannon spoke up, "I wanna eat em'". Everyone in the room went silent and wide eyed at what Shannon had said. Tanya and Alexis looked in interest and the oh so small role players looked in stark fear.

Shannon looked at her victims and said, "if you are gonna make fun of my size, it seems like the perfect punishment for it. Oh and by the way Jeff, I happen to like my size. I can't go two seconds outside of this house with out having to break some dudes heart. All your insults do is annoy me. Tanya look over at Shannon and said, "Don't eat all of them Shannon. Alexis and I have things we want to do to them." Shannon replied, "I'll eat whatever and whoever I want." Seeing how serious Shannon was Tanya backed off.

1321121112.content:
Shannon, frustrated, still holding the remote, turned it onto the two newcomers.

"You, too! You've.....seen too much!" Shannon angerly said.

Alexis protested. "What are you doing? What the HELL is this?! And what is that device for?"

Shannon answered, but not with words. Action speaks louder than words, as she shrunk them to the same size as everyone else with a blue FLASH.

Tanya yelled up, "NO! You can't do this! We're innocent, we didn't do anything to you!"

Shannon replied coldly, "I don't care. Everyone involved in this is mine to do as I please with."
1321121112.title: They shouldn't have come...

choices: The role players stand up to Shannon.
The role players scatter, trying to hide from Shannon.
13211211122.content:
"I'm tired of you two, I'm tired of rejection and I'm just fed up in general! It's about time you bugs were taught a lesson," Shannon said coldly.

Her two friends had a vantage point from the dining room floor, down in the carpeted floor. Their pizza boxes had been dropped behind them. Creating not only a mess on the floor but an effective wall behind them.

Ignoring the eight role players on the tiles of the kitchen floor, Shannon turned on her friends. The goths huge feet padded forward slowly through the carpet. The black nail polish on each of her toenails hanging like curved blades over the tips of her toes.

"Still want to make fun of me for wearing my boots in the summer Alexis? Now you're really going to see what my feet are like up close!" Shannon boomed as she hovered over the miniature room mates.

"What!" Sqeaked the miniature Alexis, "Comon Tanya! She's going to squash us like bugs!"

Tanya laughed, "Shannon? Nah she wouldn't do that, she likes..." Was all the brunette had time to say before Shannons huge foot moved forward as she used her toes to knock her friend to the ground.

Trapped just under the arch of the giant goths toes, Tanya struggled with her lower body trapped under the soft yielding ball of Shannon's sole. Her hands slapped into the still slightly sticky skin that was pinning her down as she tried to push free.

"Watch Alexis, I want you to see what I'm going to do to you," Shannon said coldly as she picked her foot up again. The tiny Tanya yelped as she saw the massive wrinkled sole pass above her. Before she could react, Shannon dropped her pale foot down upon her and slowly began turning it from side to side gently.

Alexis was almost in tears, "You're going to hurt her Shan! Stop it!" Oddly, even the role players found this action to be too interesting to pass up and were looking from the kitchen doorway in complete shock and horror.

That was when Tanya felt her body begin to colapse. Tight pressure pinned her tightly into the goths soft sole and began to roll the plush flesh down over her. She coughed a little, but it hurt to. The scent was so strong and it just made her want to struggle more to get away.

"That feels really good Tanya. Struggle for me until I squish you okay? I want to feel your tiny hands clawing at my foot as you crunch!" Alexis heard Shannon say. She had never seen such a look of hatred in the goths eyes before.

Finally, Alexis couldn't take it anymore. She crawled under the giantess toes which were propped up slightly near where Tanya was and reached in to her friend. Before she could even yell to her, Shannon brought her toes, each the size of the blonde and pink haired girl, down on her back.

Crying out in pain, Alexis tried to fend off her friends now wiggling toes. "Not so much fun is it?" Shannon looked over their shoulder, "So should I crush them, or you guys?" She said to the role players.
13211211122.title: Tanya and Alexis at Shannon's feet

choices: Shannon goes for her top offender (Jeff)
Shannon decides to let them hide and make a game of it.
132112111222.content:
Shannon looked at the bunch of roleplayers, running for their lives.

"That's not very nice, is it? You're running away, not going to help at all?" Shannon bellowed down. "This just proves that you're all gutless wimps, who won't even risk their lives to save their friends', who are about to pay for your disloyalty."

Shannon lifted her foot for a brief moment. Immeadiately Tanya and Alexis made a run for it. Shannon simply watch them carefully with her eyes, then lifted her foot and brought it down as hard as she could. An audible crunch signaled their bloody demise under Shannon's sole. She wiped blood from her foot and turned on the roleplayers.

"You won't be as lucky as them to have a quick death. You are guilty of betraying your friends." She sneered at them.

Shannon quickly scooped up Jeff and stared down at him.

"It's time for you to recieve my revenge. I'm going to kill you slowly."

She smirked, satisfied with the knowledge that Jeff wasn't going to get away with insulting her.

"You stupid g.." Shannon squeezed Jeff tightly, muffling his voice.

"Don't make this worse for yourself! Now, how shall I finish you? I can end your life by sucking on you until you beg to be swallowed, or if you'd prefer I can crush you slowly underfoot. You can die like a bug, or a candy. You have....5 seconds to choose!"

Jeff looked stunned. He wanted to live! "I'm so sorry! I'm so sorry! Please let me live! I'll do whatever you want!"

Shannon suddenly looked interested. What does she do?
1321121112221.title: Jeff's proposal

choices: Shannon decides to squish the rest of them
Shannon wants to keep them alive for now
13211211122211.content:
Shannon laughed at Jeff evilly. "No deal. Your time is up. Since you decided NOT to choose, I will choose for you."

Suddenly, Jeff found himself dumped on the ground, facing Shannon's gigantic foot, raising into the air right above him. Jeff took one look at it.....and screamed. It was horrifiyingly huge, and yet so perfect. And about to crush him in a step. Jeff took off just as Shannon playfully stepped behind him.

"Mmm, that's it. Run away from me. Run and prolong your death. It's so much more fun chasing you." Shannon licked her lips and continued to pad after Jeff. Occasionally she'd nudge him from behind to push his slow moving ass faster. She could really squish him like a bug any time she wanted.

Jeff screamed as her foot seemed to grab at him, catching his arm underneath. "NOO! AAH!"

She once again licked her lips and pushed down. A sickening crunching sound signaled the mutilation of his arm, squished right off his body. "ST..TOOOOP!"

"Oooh, that's it scream......scream. Struggle to your last breath as I slowly squish you to pieces..." Shannon taunted as her perfect sole slowly pressed on his other arm. She felt frantic wriggling as she systematically snapped the bone and then smushed the remains to a paste, causing him to scream all the more.

Now his legs ended up under the ball of her foot. The soft, plushy foot twisted back and forth, slowly grinding them down. The brittle bones snapped and turned to powder under her foot, and soon they were gone as well.

"LET ME GO! PLEASE! IT HURTS! STOP! I'M SORRY!" He was crying like a baby, in such pain and bleeding so much that he was starting to pass out. Shannon wasn't going to give him the luxury of dying unconciously. She pressed her foot on him, and slowly began the end. "Time to squish. Goodbye!" The rest of his body squished rather easily, with him struggling until his body was so warped and damaged it was impossible for him to stay alive anymore.

Shannon was panting. That had actually turned her on a bit, the feeling of having a human being squished like that.
13211211122211.title: Time's Up!

choices: She's dreaming...
She wakes up later, perhaps the day after.
132112112.content:
Curling up on the couch, Shannon was in anguish, though managing to keep herself from using the remote and ending up doing something foolish at worst. She could hear people chatting in the other room, some of them suggesting get back on the game, while one or two were telling Jeff that he was being a jerk.

How much she paid attention to all the talking in the room didn't matter at the moment, since she cried herself to asleep. She just couldn't rise up from that spot tonight.

... no ones around.

Opening up her eyes, feeling dried tears on her cheeks, Shannon rises up from the couch, wondering that how on earth she got asleep like that. What she noticed was that it was morning already and people probably have left.

Then, when she looks around...
1321121122.title: In the next morning.

choices: One of the guys.
One of the girls.
13211211221.content: Shannon notices the device, which has been apparently found and even used by someone. However, the user seemed to be foolish enough to use it on him/herself. She knew this since she could see a small figure from the couch. Lifting her chunky body and walking closer she could see that shrunken person was...
13211211221.title: Someone's used the device?

choices: Tara accidentily steps on him
Tara doesn't step on him
1321122.content:
"What the hell is this?" Tara thought, as she sat down, picking up the device in her hands. It looked like a remote of some kind, but Tara had never seen anything like it before. It was grey in color and only had two large buttons on the front of it. It looked so weird.

"Well, finders keepers," she thought, as she put the device in her small purse and relaxed in her seat.

Tara was on her way home, after working the last 10 hours at a small CD/record shop in town. She loved working there, since the manager let her play whatever music she wanted, which Tara took advantage of on a regular basis. She was a big fan of punk, so for most of the time, that's all the 22 year old would play.

She smoothed her Blink-182 shirt over her small belly and looked out the window. Tara had always been kind of a big girl, but she had been lucky, in that she didn't have much belly fat. Sure she had a little, but the majority of her excess weight seemed to always go to her breasts and thighs. Still, that didn't stop people from picking on her over the years.

Tara had always kept silent about the taunting, not speaking up to defend herself, or her weight. To most people, it appeared she didn't have much of a backbone, but in reality, it was that she really didn't care what other people thought of her. Still, that didn't mean Tara didn't think about getting even with a few people. But, what could she do about it, really?

About five minutes later, the bus lurched to a stop on her street and Tara got off. She took out the remote she found on the bus and looked at it again, inspecting it further. She decide to push one of the buttons, just to see what would happen.

A little ways down the street, a younger guy was riding his bike, unaware that his life was about to be changed forever.

Tara pressed one of the buttons and watched as a white beam shot out of the remote and hit the guy. She looked up in time to see both him and his bike seem to vanish in thin air. Her eyes went wide and she ran over to where she last saw him.

Down below, on the ground, Billy Corrigan sat in shock on his bike, as the entire world grew around him. A little ways away, he saw one of his neighbors, Tara, running towards him, her footsteps booming as she got closer, shaking the ground as she ran. One of her footsteps bounced both him and his bike high in the air and Billy lay on the ground, his bicycle by his side.

Tara's footsteps were getting closer. There was no way he could escape in time. Billy cowered on the ground in the fetal position and hoped his giant neighbor didn't accidentally kill him.
1321122.title: Tara, a punk girl

choices: Give Billy to another girl walking down the street
Keep Billy herself
13211222.content:
Tara looked down where she last saw Billy and saw him cowering near his bike, his body shaking in fear. She couldn't believe the remote in her hand could make things shrink. Tara quickly put it back in her purse, before bending down to see if her shrunken neighbour was okay.

Billy saw an enormous shadow stop in front of him and he slowly opened his eyes. He screamed when he saw Tara smile sympathetically down at him, her giant fingers reaching for him. He wanted to run away but he couldn't; he was paralyzed with fear.

"It's okay," Tara said soothingly, as she picked the guy up, making sure not to hurt him in the process. She laid him in the palm of her hand and looked down at him. He appeared to be no taller than a couple of inches.

"W-what are you going to d-do to me?" the frightened guy eventually managed to ask the giantess.

"Nothing," Tara replied, feeling terrible about what she did. "This was an accident. I had no idea this would happen."

She stood to her full height again, contemplating what to do with the shrunken guy. She knew she couldn't just drop him off at his house, since his family would probably go straight to the police. She also didn't want to crush her poor neighbour under her feet, despite how much easier that would make things for her.

In the end, Tara decided to...
13211222.title: Tara doesn't step on him

choices: Stay with Billy and the girls
Say with Tara
132112221.content:
Tara saw a few girls around Billy's age walking down the street, 18 or a bit older. They both reminded her of herself when she was that age: not overweight necessarily, but a bit on the chubby side. Tara approached the two girls and smiled.

"Hello, there," the 22 year old said, feeling Billy struggle in her hand.

"Hello," one of the girls replied.

"Say, you wouldn't know a guy who rides his bike around here, would you?" Tara asked. "He's about your age, blond hair, about yay big?" She put her hand out to indicate his original height.

"Oh, yeah," the second girl, Sarah replied. "You mean Billy. He's kind of a jerk."

"Yeah," Brittney, the first girl added. "He's always calling us fattie or tubbo or something like that."

"Oh, he does, does he?" Tara said rather coyly, feeling Billy's movements suddenly stop.

"Oh, crap. This can't be good,"Billy thought to himself in the sweaty darkness of Tara's palm.

"What if I told you there was a way you two could get back at him, to pay him back for all the mean things he's said about you?"

Sarah shrugged her shoulders. "That'd be nice."

"I was hoping you'd say that." With that, Tara opened her hand and revealed the shrunken kid lying in her palm.

"Billy?" Brittney said, bringing her head closer to get a better look. "Is that really you?"

"It really is," Tara replied, watching as the other girl peered down at the frightened boy.

"Can we keep him?" Brittany asked excitedly, looking up at the punk girl.

"Why, of course you can," Tara replied, as Sarah grabbed Billy from her hand. "He's now your pet; your property. Do with him as you se fit."

Two mischievous grins glared down at Billy, as he stared up at the giant girls he used to torment.
132112221.title: Give Billy to another girl

choices: Go to the bookstore
Go to the record store
1321122212.content:
Tara smiled as she watched the two girls walk off with Billy. They were already taunting him, poking the poor guy with their giant fingers or dangling him several stories off the ground (from his perspective, anyway) by his ankles.

"Oh, this is gonna be fun," Sarah said to her friend, as they continued down the street.

Tara started walking towards her house, thinking about what she could do with the device, or who to use it on. There were numerous people from her high school she wanted to use it on, but unfortunately, most of them had moved away.

She could always use it on this one guy at the mall that always gave her a hard time. It was a bookstore Tara liked going to and everyone else there treated her with respect. But this one guy, whenever she would pass him or she would check out and he would be behind the register, he always made a snide comment about her weight or made Tara feel bad about herself in some way. If anyone deserved to be shrunk down and stepped on, it was definitely him.

Then again, Tara thought, as she opened her front door and took off her shoes, she could always use the device on this cute guy who always came into the record store. He was kinda skinny, but really buff and obviously liked the same music as her. Tara had always tried getting his attention, but nothing she did seemed to work.

"Maybe if I shrink him down to a couple of inches, that will do the trick," she thought to herself, smiling at the thought of holding the guy of her dreams in her hand.

The next day...
1321122212.title: Stay with Tara

choices: Eat Him
Sit on Him
13211222121.content:
The next day, Tara knew just what she would do. She had the day off from work so she had an idea on how to use the shrinking machine to her advantage. She rubbed her bloated belly and tapped on her navel piercing as she let out a laugh to herself. "It's about time Freddy finally got his just deserts for how he kept treating me.

Soon, Tara reaches the mall and looks up at the bookstore she visited and saw that nobody was inside except for that smug guy behind the register. He was always making her feel bad, so Tara decided that it was time to end his cruel game once and for all as she walks inside. Freddy sees her and gives an evil smile as he adjusts his glasses.

"Well, well, well," he says. "If it isn't the steel zeppelin." Then he makes some beeping noises. "Truck backing up. Truck backing up." Tara however didn't give in and instead gave Freddy an evil laugh. "As hard as it is to believe Freddy. I'm actually glad to see you." Freddy lets out a laugh. "Oh puh-lease, the only men who'd be interested in you would be whalers."

Then Tara takes out the remote and Freddy gives a scoff. "You think you can mute me. I didn't know you were fat and dumb punkopotamus. I ain't a television." However Tara activates the remote and in seconds Freddy is shrunk to half an inch tall. "Hey? What happened?" Freddy looked around on the ground before the tremors from Tara's footsteps shake him to the ground.

Tara looms her massive figure down and looks down on her insect sized antagonist as she rubs her exposed belly and gives a sinister look. "I always knew you were a planet," said Freddy. "Now change me back." The plump punk giantess just shakes her head. "Oh no," she said. "You've made fun of me long enough. Which is why I'm going to end it, once and for all."

Tara then takes the shrunken Freddy and decides to...
13211222121.title: Tara's Revenge

choices: Tara goes to shrink more people
Kelly Comes for the Remote
132112221211.content:
Suddenly Tara heard her belly growl and rubs it before she looks at the shrunken Freddy and gives a smile that causes him to shake in her hand. She then licks her lips. "Oh no," says Freddy. "Don't do it. I'm sorry, I wasn't trying to hurt your feelings, I say it to all the fat sows that come in here. Wait, that didn't! Don't eat me." But Tara holds Freddy over her head and her mouth opens wide showing her pierced tongue. "Bottoms up asshole," she said. "Now you get to be part of the body you love to mock so much."

Freddy lets out a final scream as Tara drops him into her awaiting mouth and snaps it shut. She swishes him around in her mouth and grunts in ecstasy because of his delicious taste. Freddy panics in the punk giantess's mouth and tries to get the to front to escape as the teeth close, but Tara's tongue wraps around him like a python and tosses him in the back where he falls down the esophagus, letting out a buffled scream as Tara feels the bump going down her neck with her fat fingers. Finally Freddy lands with a splash in her bloated stomach.

Freddy runs to the front and pounds the walls, making tiny bumps appear on the front of Tara's belly. "Aw," says Tara with a giggle. "How cute." "Tara!" yelled Freddy. "This isn't funny! Let me...!" That's all he can saw before the stomach acids completely dissolve him into a skeleton.

With her enemy perishing in her stomach, Tara lets out a loud burp. "That felt good." She says. Tara giggles. She had never thought of becoming a cannibal before, but now she could shrink and eat anyone who gave her trouble and she loved it.
132112221211.title: Tara's Hunger

choices: Tara joins forces with the girls
Tara shrinks Kelly and eats her
1321122212112.content:
Suddenly as Tara was pondering who to shrink and eat next, a tan skinned blonde in sandals, as fat as she is comes into the store and finds her holding the remote. "Oh there it is. Thank goodness. Sally would've killed me if I lost it." Tara just blinks. "Can I help you."

Kelly nods her head. "My name is Kelly and you just saved my life. My friend made that remote you're holding." "This shrink ray?" asked Tara. "Why?" "Well," says Kelly. "All my friends, they're like you and me." "Heavy?" "Yep. You made that remote to shrink people who made fun of us."

Tara smiles and rubs her stomach. "A noble cause if I ever heard one." Kelly let out a sigh. "So please, can I have the remote back. Sally would've been mad if she knew I lost it." Tara rubs her pierced chin and gives a smile Kelly's way. "I have a better idea."
1321122212112.title: Kelly Comes for the Remote

13212.content:
Crawling to the back of the bus, John found himself near a bunch of seats that faced inward toward each other away from the windows. The thudding footsteps of people getting on the bus shook down the hall as he tried to pull himself over the rigged rubber flooring of the bus.

He stoped and gasped at what he saw next though. Jennifer, the girl he had always desired in school stood miles above him. A tall, thin girl who looked just like he pictured the elven ranger from his novels to look like. Her long brown hair even cascaded around her slightly perky ears. She stood above him wearing a two piece light blue swimsuit with a towel over her shoulders. Water dripped down from high above as she sat down on the chair above John.

As quickly as she had sat down, Jenn's feet lifted and landed in front of John on her toes. With wide eyes John took in the sight and realized he was in trouble. Too late, Jenn's foot lifted and pinned him into a groove in the rubber floor under the ball of her foot.

This was even worse! The girl he adored was now standing on his almost broken body. John cried a little, wishing that poor innocent Jenn knew what she was doing and could help him. To be taken home and cared for by her. But she was already aimlessly talking to her friends and had no idea what she was doing to her tiny admirer.

As luck would have it, Jenn did feel something. She leaned over and started down toward John. Her foot lifted and she gasped, "Eww, a bug?"

John's heart sank as her beautiful scrunched up face voiced his doom. Her gigantic sole descended casually and rubbed John down into the floor as hard as she could.

Jenn spent the rest of the trip bouncing her toes up and down on John's remains as she chatted with her friend on the way home.
13212.title: Stomped by Jenn on the bus

Nothing much, lets hope he didn't squish into a mess or else someone might t

The last thing John noticed before the darkness was Kelly's humongous ass rising and moving up on him. If he thought it was big before...

Kelly sits on the window seat, as if not paying attention to him, although the truth was that she was concenctrating on feeling if he would move or not after a while she sat on him.

It was as if in slow motion as John saw his life flash before his eyes as that big butt descended on him until there was no more room to stand. Then no more room to be crouching. Then he was lying down as he felt that warm big bottom resting on him. The pain was great, though it being soft helped somewhat. There might be a chance...

Though she was wearing jeans, she could feel John's struggle's beneath her. Actually, she thought, if he survives for a while down there, then he may get another chance.

After a while...

...goes to the big grassy central garden area.
133.content:
Kelly decides that going to the park downtown would be a lot more fun than anything else. It's where she plays most of her sports and where she usually hunts for things to step on anyway. Why not start off on familiar turf.

The day was sunny and warm. Kelly stood at the edge of the park, carrying her white rubber sandals with transparent candy red straps in her right hand as her bare feet padded through the dew covered grass. The cool green grass felt good against her feet, getting them damp as she walked into the park. It was a hot walk over and it felt good to feel the open air against her sweaty feet.

Looking around, Kelly considered where to go. Skateboarders usually hung out near the fountain. Not that she really had a problem with them though, but who knows who may be there. Plus it was too early for most of them to be out already. Otherwise there was the main park near the central garden. People usually took morning walks there and thats where Kelly would sit and smush bugs before baseball. She usually got droped off at the park early before warm-ups even started.

So Kelly...
133.title: Barefoot in the park

choices: Kelly wanders over to squish them.
Kelly sits on a bench near the bushes and watches.
1331.content:
The warm concrete around the fountain felt good on Kelly's feet as she wandered toward it. It seemed like the perfect place to stir up some trouble. The fountain was enclosed by four huge bushes that must be at least ten feet tall, and only little paths lead away from it.

To Kelly's surprise, there were a few skateboarders at the fountain. She didnt reconize them though. They lay around the edge on the fountain, one on the ground. Each looked like a typical punk, besides the one on the ground who seemed to be goth.

Kelly really didnt have anything against them, but she figured what better way to find out if this remote actually worked. They didnt even look up as she wandered in! How pefect was that?

So, feeling a little embarassed and a little nervous, Kelly took out the remote. 'If this doesn't work I'm going to look so STUPID!' she thought, pointing the remote at one guy sitting on the edge of the fountain.

With a click the remote unleashed a short whirr and a blast of light. Instantly their friend was reduced to an inch tall. The others jumped up and looked to Kelly, but before they could even speak she began blasting away at them too! Within moments, all four of the skateboarders were shrunk.
1331.title: Shrunken skateboarders by the fountain

choices: They stay standing.
Eventually they all fall over.
13311.content:
Two of the punks and the goth gather together on the brick concrete ground. They trembled as the fat blonde girl that had just blasted them started to walk toward them. Her giant dirty bare feet smushed against the hard ground with each step. Her blue painted nails poking out over her huge toes.

High above on the edge of the fountain, their friend yelled for them to run as Kelly approached. He was about level with her plush thighs.

Kelly was huge to them. A giantess clad in a black tank top showing off her plump shoulders that were as freckled as her face, to her light blue jeans that were rolled up to almost her knees.

Trembling below, the three watched as Kellys soft feet, a light shade of pink from walking to the park and speckled with grass stains and dew, landed right before them. They couldnt even see her face for her tummy hanging over them, tucked lightly under her tanktop.

"Hello little bug," they heard from high above. They all realized she was talking to their friend on the ledge. "You and your friends are going to play a fun game with me, are you ready?"

Kellys massive body leaned over and the tiny punks below assumed she was picking up their friend. She spun around, her huge bare feet slapping against the concrete as she almost stepped on one of them. Her big butt landing hard on the cement fountain edge.

She had their friend in her hand and her eager plush hand was reaching down for them! Before they could scramble away, they were being smushed in the soft embrace of Kellys fat hand.

"Now," Kelly began, "You're going to show me how good you guys are at skateboarding. I'm going to put you on one of your skateboards along with my big bare feet. If you can stay standing while I sit here and slide it around, I may let you go. But if any of you fall," She trailed off and made a little eww expression. "Well my toes will just snap you up and mush you up good!"

So Kelly laid one of the boards down on the ground and placed the tiny skateboarders on the smooth surface in the middle. Glaring down at them, Kelly put her giant feet on either side of the board.

Scared, the punks looked back and forth from her giant bare feet. The low arches were lined with soft plush wrinkles and they had quite a strong scent. Bracing themselves, Kelly laughed high above. "Ready?"
13311.title: Between Kelly's feet and a skateboard

choices: Kelly wanders off into the grass to wipe off her feet.
Kelly puts her legs into the fountain and relaxes for a bit.
133112.content:
Within the first few slides of Kelly moving her pudgy legs back and forth, one of the punks falls over. Everyone freezes in alarm as Kelly announces "Uh oh! Looks like we have our first disqualification! You call yourself a skateboarder. That wasn't even that much motion."

Scrambling to get up, Kelly's right foot beats the tiny punk to the punch. Her eager wiggling toes descend upon him and pick him up between their clenched grasp and the very soft pad of her foot. Trying to push back against the soft wrinkled flesh does no good as Kelly holds her bare lower calf over the skateboard and drops the little guy just a bit beyond.

"I'd love to play, but your friends might get bored so..." Kelly cruely presses down with her foot. The punk struggles madly against her, confused at first as her foot lands on the ground but the soft plush sole doesn't squish him. Instead it slowly forms down around him and slowly presses out all the air. Suddenly though, the ground shifts under him as he looks out near her arch to the lays rays of light as the world blurs outside.

Kelly twists her bare foot against the ground and stamps on the punk a few times to make sure he is dead. Padding his body with the ball of her foot until she is sure.

To their horror, Kelly's foot with their friends remains smeared on the bottom lands up on the skateboard again. "Lets continue!" The cruel plush giantess says.

Kelly shifts the board back and forth with a bit more force this time, feeling eager to have more of them squirming under her sole. Her green eyes glare down at them. A soft pink tip of her tongue slides between her lips and licks them moist from the hot summer day. Her blonde hair hangs low over her shoulders.

The goth falls next, over toward Kellys left foot. Without missing a beat, she pivots her foot on its heel and rubs it down on her next victem. She feels him fighting under her tender sole and she scootches over so she can keep her barefoot on him while she continues her game with the other two.

Running out of air, the goth struggles in vain to escape from Kelly. Only to be finally trapped under her toes. Soft pillows of her wrinked sole pinning his legs as her toes wiggle eagerly, forcing him tightly against the ball of her foot. He doesnt last much longer beyond that until Kelly scrapes him off and brushes him along the rough surface of the board to the ground leaving a little smear.

The other two are crouched low, staring up scared as Kelly laughs more and more. "Think you're going to make it? I dunno." She tips her feet forward, forcing the board to arc away from her and they slide off onto the ground.

"Ha! I guess that shows you all. Amatures. Guess my feet are going to have to teach you two a lesson too! It's called practice, you should have tried some." Kelly teases as she kicks the skateboard off to one side, almost running over one of the punks under a grity plastic wheel.

High above they see Kelly, grinning down eagerly. She was a beautiful girl. Sweet face, soft skin, cute. But moreso they were looking at the dirty bare soles that were now held above them, her bare ankles almost smooth against her plush calves.

Kelly planted a bare foot on either punk and held them there. Feeling them squirm and struggle deeply against her wrinkles. It felt great but she was sure they didnt like it or the smell. She looked around the park a bit. The fountain was all alone now besides for her. Standing up she felt a soft wet pop under each foot, stopping the lovely wiggling feeling she was enjoying.

"So it works. Now what to do, what to do?" Kelly mused. Obviously loving the power she now had.
133112.title: Skate or squish under Kelly's feet

Kelly decides against it and finds more people to shrink.

Kelly wandered over to the grass around the fountain area and began wiping her feet off. While it did feel pretty cool, she enjoyed padding her feet in the damp grass to get them off.

Her mind wandered and Kelly craved more to squish. She wandered over to one of her favourite benches and sat there, staring down at the dusty ground at her feet. The odd ant wandered by but Kelly just poked at the ground with her right big toe. Missing her target and watching the ant stop, run right or left, and try to go past her foot instead of just running away.

Looking around the park, Kelly considered her options. She wanted more obviously, that much was for sure. The odd person was walking along the trail that circled the park. Most of the people were her age, but the odd few were older. Taking their daily walks.

Kelly looked down to the remote in her hands and suddenly realized there was a dial on the side. It apparently was for reversing the effects. She wondered what would happen if she used it on herself at normal height. She'd probably be at least knee high to the trees or taller. That could be fun, but she'd have to be nuts to do that. 1331121111.content:
Pulling the trigger on the device, Kelly could feel and see the effects. Slowly but surely she had to look more and more down on her as she was about to get a new higher perspective on her surroundings...

First, she had to look down on even the taller pedestrians she saw, then down on the bigger cars, like vans and such. She giggled. "You are all so adorable!" She said, her booming words extremely loud to the tiny people. Some reached for their ears, others braved the noise out of fear.
Kelly then bent forward, which gave the tiny people a very good view of her big tan breasts. They alone could smush the entire overpass flat underneath their soft weight.
But they didn't, not yet. Instead Kelly was just trying to get a better look at her tiny worshippers.

The people who let Kelly's voice make their ears ring were smart to do so, because Kelly noticed someone with his hands gripped tightly to his ears. Her cute freckled face turned into an annoyed frown, which is not something you'd want to see from someone a thousand feet tall. "Why aren't you listening to your goddess?" She said.
To the guy's horror, her finger was approaching him.
Kelly poked at the guy, her finger slamming into him with the force of a car. He fell backwards, and the people around him crawled away, hoping not to get caught in the collateral damage. "Hey!"
Her words were even louder this time, his face turned to a pained grimace, and he did not remove his hands from his ears.

Frustrated, Kelly poked again, harder this time.
Then there was a little squish. Or to the tiny people on the overpass, a horrible squelching, crunching noise as the guy's body collapsed underneath Kelly's finger.
Kelly lifted her finger. "Huh?" She said. Two red spots were all that was left of the guy. One on the overpass, one on Kelly's finger. "Oh, whoops." Then she wiped his remains off on one of her wide thighs. "He was an asshole anyways."

Then she looked at all the other people still nervously bowing and remembered what she was doing. She stood up straight, put her hands on her big hips in what she hoped was an intimidating pose, and spoke.
"With the exception of the rude little asshole, you have shown your loyalty." She boomed. "I will postpone your squishing, and you may all return to the city as my toys and subjects."
Then she thought of something. "Well, actually. You all still tried to escape, didn't you? Maybe I shouldn't let dissenters get away so easily."
Kelly smiled, which was extremely unnerving to her tiny subjects.
"Let's not wait until you all get back to the city, play session starts now! Survivors get to go back home, I promise."

This was enough for several of the people on the overpass to lose their nerve and try to run. Kelly smiled, bent forward, reached her plush hand out towards them, and...

Her massive chubby body fell down not only on the overpass, but also onto hundreds of feet of roads ahead.
Countless people could only through their car windows and cry out as either her enormous belly, boobs, thighs or cute, surprised face quickly approached them before they got squished out of existence.

When Kelly hit the ground it didn't hurt her much, because to her the ground was soft, and gave away to her weight. Still, she groaned as she rolled onto her back and sat up.
A group of about thirty people thought it would be better to escape through the trees next to the highway, where they were far less likely to be noticed.

Go unnoticed they did, at least. Kelly did not have the slightest clue that as she rolled over a group of tiny people saw her plush butt loom, then come down flattening a hundred feet of landscape before coming down on top of them.
Neither did Kelly know about the three people who briefly found themself alive under her crack before her full weight pressed down, squishing them anyway.
In fact, Kelly didn't register the squelch of a bunch of people being crushed at once at all, and neither did she ever notice the tiny splattering of blood they left behind on her ass.
In a way, you could say their plan worked.

Neil bashed his car horn again, without really expecting anything out of it. The cars weren't moving. A thousand feet tall plush girl just fell on and smashed an enormous part of the highway with the force of an earthquake, she's still only a few of her strides away, and the cars weren't moving.
In panicked haste he threw open his car door, got out, and ran as fast as he could.

That's when the quakes started again. The ground shook, then shook again, and then again.
Neil stumbled and fell onto the hard asphalt. People ran past him, as the quakes continued.
When Neil looked back, what he saw was the chubby titaness casting a shadow over him from what seemed like thousands of feet away. She was looking at him, or maybe just the whole highway, grinning. With every step the ground shook, and her breasts swayed, and doom came another few hundred feet closer.

It only took a few more steps until she was there, standing next to the highway.
Without saying a single word she lifted up a foot, and held it above the highway. Above Neil.
He could only briefly take note of the underside of her soft foot, and how it was covered in dirt, flattened cars, trees and many, many red specks before he got squished under her weight

Kelly smiled. "How dare all of you try to escape the domain of your goddess." She said, taking another step right in front of the first, crushing another swathe of highway.
"So many of you tried to get away that you all got stuck and didn't get anywhere at all! Isn't that something?"
Another step, many more people squashed underfoot.
"So now you're all first in line for the toying! You should consider that a reward. I am your goddess, after all."

Kelly laughed, and looked out at the packed highway ahead.
She had many plans for the tiny people-filled cars. She'd start with...

Ali was staring at a big toe that was a little bit taller than she was. She began to panic, not wanting to share the same fate as the other shrunken people, but was too scared to move. Ali knew if she tried to run, she would probably be killed instantly.

Suddenly, from high above, Kelly’s face appeared, peering down at the terrified Ali. Kelly bent down and roughly snatched Ali off the ground, not caring how tight her grip was, before dropping the shrunken girl unceremoniously into her other hand. It took Ali a moment to catch her breath, clutching her sore chest for a few seconds. After a quick inspection, Ali was relieved to discover no bones were broken. She then turned her attention to the billboard-sized face staring down at her.

“There you are, insect,” Kelly’s voice boomed, as her warm breath washed over her prey. Ali was no bigger than an inch and a half at this point. Kelly smiled. This was going to be fun.

“Why are you doing this to me?!” Ali asked, terrified. “I’ve done nothing to you!” She started to sob silently, not wanting to be crushed to death.

Kelly could see Ali’s lips moving, but could barely make out what she was saying. Not that she cared, anyway. “Oh, shut up, Little Miss Perfect. I’m not going to kill you. Well, at least not right away. I’m going to have a little bit of fun with you first.”

Ali was grabbed again and hoisted back in the air. Dangling from one arm in front of Kelly’s huge face, Ali looked down, contemplating how far off the ground she was at this point. Two thousand feet? Five thousand? More? She started whimpering at the thought of smacking against the pavement from such a high altitude.

“Afraid of heights, huh?” Kelly asked. Ali shook her head vigorously in response, too terrified to open her eyes. “Well, don’t you think it’s time you conquered this fear once and for all?” She let Ali go and watched as the helpless girl plummeted quickly, screaming as she fell.

Just as soon as her descent began, however, it was over, as Ali bounced against something soft and large—Kelly’s breasts. She desperately wrapped her small hands around a loose string on Kelly’s tank top, stopping her body. Her heart beating a mile a minute, Ali curled into the fetal position and began crying.

“See?” Kelly’s voice boomed from above. “I told you I wasn’t going to kill you yet. But unfortunately, I have places I have to be today and I can’t have you dangling from my top. It’s too dangerous, you know.” She plucked Ali from her top and placed her in between her breasts, before a large index finger wedged her deep into the cavernous gap.

“Don’t worry,” Ali heard Kelly’s muffled voice from above. “This is just for safe keeping.” She then felt Kelly take off, her heartbeat thudding against her body every second or so.

Kelly was going…
1331121221111.title: Shrank Ali

choices: Kelly continues punishing the little people
Kelly saves the little people for school
1331121222.content:
A mischif idea started arising in Kelly's head causing her to pick up the little citizens and through them in her pocket, the more she collected the more fun she was going to experience. The people were all crying, screaming, and even shoving each other in her pocket.

She finally reached home, knocked on the door, but no one answered. "Yes, no one is at home which means I get to do what ever I want to you, you little adorable, and easily squishable critters" she said to the scared group of tinies. She ran quickly to her room, locked the door, and set them free allowing them to roam around her room. The tinies were running frantically around her room, but because it was empty they had no place to hied which made Kelly laugh.

She took of her shirt and skirt and all there was left was a blue-green swim suit. "How do I look my little tinies", she giggled. " Allow me to demonstrate my power over you." she said. She grabbed a boy named Jack who was in her Biology class at school. He made fun of her normally and would annoy her most of the time. She placed Jack in the cleavage of her breasts and with one powerful squeeze, Jack popped allowing blood to scatter around her shirt.

She laughed at the deed she had thought was funny and scared the hell out of the others. This time, another idea overcame her. She grabbed a handful of people in her hand and lifted them up carefully. She brought her hand up to her view, opened her hand, and counted 6 little people. She stretched her bikini and shoved every one of them into her vagina. This got her very excited. She felt her womenhood grow rapidly in her.
1331121222.title: Kelly's Devious Punishments

choices: Kelly makes it to school and pranks the teachers
Kelly makes it to school and pranks the students.
13311212222.content:
Kelly decides to keep them for school and begans thinking of how to use them as pranks in school, the more she had thought of ideas, the more she giggled and laughed to herself. That night she slept peacefully with an evil smile on her face.

Kelly woke up the next morning and found no one at home. "I think mom left to work", she said. She quickly gets up from the dining table were she was eating a peanut butter sandwhich and runs to her room. After 5 minutes, she comes back downstairs with a jar full of people in them. She looks at the people then laughs. Then she puts the jar on the table and continues her breakfast. Before she put the sandwhich in her mouth. She looked back at the people, then at the sandwhich, then at the people. She opened the jar and took one girl out. Her name was Maggy and she always pranked Kelly and made her life miserable in school about how fat she is. "Well then Maggy, I see I coincidentally got you, hahaha, because you made fun of how fat I am, I will show you what this fat does to people like you", she said. She opened up her sandwhich, dropped maggie inside and closed it again. She took big bites until she reached the end in which Maggie was hiding within. Kelly finished the sandwhich with Maggie and both ended up in her mouth. Kelly's mouth begins to move up and down which means the chewing process started. Maggie got caught in it and was killed. "mmmmm, such a tastly girl,thank god I ate her," Kelly said. She grabbed her bookbag and left her house ready to begin her adventures at school.
13311212222.title: Kelly's New Routine

choices: Get her attention! Trixxy is the only one who can help them!
Get out of here! There has to be a way to get back to normal size.
13312.content:
Kelly sat down just on the far side of the fountain, enough out of the way that anyone walking by wouldn't really notice her or think she was paying attention. She wondered what would happen if someone else came by and saw the tiny sized skaters.

It didn't take long until her question was answered. A girl in black cargo pants and a camo green tank top came wandering over to the fountain with a tray full of milk shakes. One presumably for each of the shrunken guys, and one for this newcomer. She sat down frusterated on the concrete edge around the bowl of the fountain and began tying her long brown hair back in a pony tail.

"I can't believe they took off on me. They even left their boards here. This is stupid anyway, we're supposed to be practicing for band, not playing around in the park," the girl exclaimed to herself as she took out her own milk shake and started drinking.

Far below, the tiny skateboarders were froze in fear as they watched their friends titanic sneakered foot rise up high in the air as she crossed her leg over the other, and then drop down towards them only to stop what seemed like a hundred feet above, bouncing it casually as their friend rested her leg.

They all exchanged nervous glances. Trixxy was always a good friend, but she had a very short temper. Even in their obscure situation, she might even see them being shrunk as playing some kind of game on her. Taking a deep breath they watched the intricate sole of her shoe bouncing above, long dirty white laces slapping against the worn rubber treads that they could only hope to fit between to avoid being squished if their friend felt like trying to stomp them.

What could they do?
13312.title: Their skater girl friend shows up at the fountain

choices: Trixxy decides to take off her sneakers and cool her feet in the fountain.
Trixxy puts her feet down, time to climb onto her sneaker!
133121.content:
They all realize there isn't much hope of getting away across the cobblestone landscape that surrounds the fountain. If someone else didn't end up stepping on them, the girl who shrunk them might come back and do just the same.

The taller of the skater guys was picked to climb up onto Trixxy's sneaker that was still on the ground, and try to get her attention. As usual, she was wearing her shoes without socks on, so he hoped he might be able to pound on her ankle and get her attention.

It all sounded like a good plan, but as he approached the rubber sole of the building sized shoe, Trixxy moved her foot slightly, creating a huge grating sound of tiny loose stone being ground under her massive shoe. He swallowed hard and continued to move forward, feeling the longer he was shrunk the more danger he was in. Better to get her attention and feel safe knowing that someone knew they were there.

With another loud scrape, Trixxy pulled her sneaker back toward the fountain and positioned her shoe so she was resting on the ball of her foot. The tiny skateboarder gulped as she began to bounce her foot up and down while high above this girl who seemed giant size to them was slurping away on her milkshake, obliviously looking around for the shrunken skateboarders to return at any moment. He felt again that he had to hurry if he wanted to get this done.
133121.title: Nearing Trixxy's giant sneaker

choices: They go unnoticed and their friend climbs onto Trixxy's lap.
Trixxy notices some tiny figures at her feet.
1331211.content:
As the tiny skateboarder made a wild dash forwards with arms outstretched in hopes of grabbing onto her shoe, Trixxy bent down and began untying her shoe laces. This excited all three of the guys in hopes that she would see them! They jumped up and down on the spot, waving their arms and hoping Trixxy would notice.

That wasn't the case however as Trixxy pulled off her sneaker, and then her sock which she stuffed into her shoe as she tossed both aside and moved on to unlacing her other shoe. Her friend was a little more leery about approaching Trixxy's bare foot. Instead of getting knocked over by her shoe, he may end up squeezed between her toes instead.

Both of the other skateboarders urged their friend on. He looked up nervously as Trixxy tossed her other shoe aside and moved on to adjusting her pony tail. Her huge daunting toes with black nail polish were calm and still as she focused on her hair. Maybe it would be okay and he could climb up on his friend. It wouldn't be anything to climb her black cargo pants with how bulky they were.

He slowly approached her foot and gained speed with each passing moment as his confidence rose. High above Trixxy was finishing with her pony tail and looked down glumly at her feet. The other two realized this and hoped that they could be seen by her again.
1331211.title: Trixxy decides to take off her sneakers.

choices: Trixxy taps her left foot, and the boy falls inside her shoe.
His friend decide to join him on Trixxy's foot.
1331212.content:
As the group stared up at their gigantic friend's shoe, they struggled to believe the situation they found themselves in. Despite her quick temper, Trixxy was always a good friend and eager to help, especially in desperate times. Now, more than ever was one of those times, and Trixxy had no idea how easily she could remove her tiny friends from the danger she was putting them in at her feet. Her Chuck Taylors were a little dingy, but still mostly clean, only having two or three months of wear and dirt on the soles. Her right foot, the one on the ground, cast a dark shadow above them, and as she bounced her foot, the tiny boys could hardly imagine what the kind of power the shoe must have to contain such a powerful foot so easily.

But the time for speculation had passed, now was the time for action! Collectively, the three shorter members of the skateboard quartet pushed the taller, fourth member forward. "Go check it out man, see if you can get on her shoe and get her attention!" Begrudgingly, the long haired, skinny skater boy turned and began walking towards Trixxy's left foot, still on the ground and docile, neatly contained within her shoe. Ever so often, he could see her toes wiggling inside, causing the shoe to shift and move. With a shudder, he wandered around towards the side of her foot, with the rest of the foot getting taller and more intimidating as he got closer.

Once he reached his goal the sole of the shoe stood above him like a huge, dirty white wall. Despite what little use it had gotten, he could see the imperfections in it as clear as day, every scuff, scratch, mark, and tear. These all did well to give him a way up towards Trixxy's exposed ankle. With the rest of the group cheering him on from a safe distance, he grabbed the etchings in the sole and began to climb.

The climb was relatively easy, he was glad they did rock climbing in gym class a few weeks ago. Even Trixxy was relatively calm during his climb. Soon, he was boarding the black canvas material on top of the shoe, and it was a short feel steps before the curve of the shoe lowered to expose the slim ankle of the giant girl. The ankle itself protruded from her leg like a majestic carving, and after a quick jump the tiny teen pulled himself onto the lip of the mouth of the shoe, now standing face to face with a wall of flesh under Trixxy's ankle. Smiling at his success, he quick began to beat at the warm, soft skin around his friend's ankle. However, he did have to lean forward a bit to do so, there was a small gap between the shoe and her skin, where he could see down into the shoe itself.

Meanwhile...
1331212.title: Trixxy puts her feet down, time to climb onto h...

choices: in Trixxy's shake.
in Trixxy's shirt.
13312122.content:
As he continued to pound away at Trixxy's foot, the skater boy looked over at his friends. They were cheering him on. Sighing, he waved his hands, gesturing for them to come join. At first, they were hesitant, but after an obscene gesture with his right hand, followed by a disapproving look, the three other teenagers headed for Trixxy's shoe. Splitting up, two of the guys went straight for the toe of the gigantic Chuck Taylor, while a third opted to climb a loose shoe string.

Trixxy was getting impatient, but maybe even a little worried. The guys were jerks sometimes, but they didn't usually just abandon their boards like this and leave her hanging. She was no super model, but she thought of herself as being attractive, and at least two of the guys she was pretty sure had a crush on her. That alone was enough to assume they would be right back.
