If they didn't show in a minute, she'd call. Besides, these shakes were going to melt soon. Maybe that girl that kept looking up at her wanted one? She may end up giving one to her, soon.

Speaking of the shakes, she decided to lift the lid off and stir it some. Whoever made these was obviously new, or just sucked at their job...their was some shake near the middle that seemed to have less chocolate in it. Trying not to let this tiny inconvenience distract her, she uncrossed and recrossed her legs. WIthout knowing it, all four of her shrunken friends had made their way on top of her shoe. As she swung that foot into the air, one of the guys was thrown skyward. He was treated to a birds eye view of his gigantic female friend, and her displeased look, before he began to fall back down to Earth. Closing his eyes, he waited for impact, only to land...
13312122.title: All aboard, why go on foot?

choices: Continue to run towards Kelly to get changed back.
Hide in Trixxy's sock or in her shoe so she'll carry them home.
133122.content:
The three skateboarders didn't have any plans of being crushed under their friends unaware footsteps, nevermind that none of them felt they could possibly climb Trixxy to get her attention. It was that big girls fault! She'd zapped them with something and that's what shrunk them.

Looking far off towards the bushes where Kelly was hiding, the goth took off first on a strong march towards where Kelly was hiding. None of them considered that Kelly herself may be as vicious as they'd hoped their friend wouldn't be. They just thought this had to be some sort of practical joke and Kelly could return them to normal size.

The group of them continued across the cobblestone that surrounded the fountain. That was when Trixxy gave a huge exasperated sigh behind them. They only briefly looked back over their shoulders at first, but then fully turned around when they realized what was happening.

Trixxy was taking off her sneakers and mumbling about relaxing her feet in the fountain. That wouldn't be a problem besides the simple fact that she was tossing her shoes, with her sock bunched up in each, towards her tiny friends!

The three guys ran along as the left shoe fell a ways off to the side. There was no way to tell exactly where Trixxy was going to toss the next one. It seemed to hover in the air as it sailed down towards them!

Thankfully the sneaker slammed down and fell on it's side just next to the shrunken skateboarders. Trixxy swung her legs around and put her them into the fountain with a splash.

"So, do we continue on or try to hide in Trixxy's sock?" One of the guys asked.

The goth guy crossed his arms, "What are you, stupid? For one, we're tiny. It's gunna stink in there. She's been wearing sneakers all day and it's hot out. Two, so we hide in her sweaty socks. Then what? She puts her shoes back on and we get squished under her feet."

"Hold on," the other guy added in, "Trixxy's got soft feet. They may not be able to hurt us."

"That girl over there in the bushes shrunk us!" The goth guy exclaimed, "She's the one who can help us get back to normal."
133122.title: The skateboarders plan their escape.

choices: Make that last ditch effort to run for Kelly.
Time the other girls step and try to figure out where the flip flops won't land.
1331221.content:
They kept running towards Kelly. She was the only one who could change them back to normal size and the goth guy was right, getting squished in their friends sock wasn't going to help their situation. Trixxy may notice them but may not help them after all.

The path was a long one across the cobblestone circles radiating out from the fountain. Obviously Kelly didn't want to be seen by the now relaxing Trixxy but she was eager to get these three guys over to where she could get at them. Her bare feet, giant sized to the tiny skateboarders, were sunk slightly into the soft garden dirt below the bushes she hid in.

As they continued along they realized just how vulnerable they really were. At any time someone could come along and pulverize them under a careless step. It wasn't that far now to get to Kelly though. They were worried however that the plush girl wasn't just coming out from the bushes to announce what had happened. There was something sinister about the way she waited for them to come to her.

That's when they realized someone was heading towards them. A tall girl with chestnut brown hair tied back in a pony tail, wearing a pair of flip flops. The soft spongy material supported each of her steps, with her feet sinking down into the padded insole. In sheer panic they realized even if she could hear them at their size, she was wearing a massive pair of headphones! The steps continued as the three tiny skateboarders made their desperate decision on how to escape being crushed under this girls tread.
1331221.title: Continue to run towards Kelly to get changed back.

choices: Stomp them into the dirt under Kelly's feet.
Kelly toys with them at her feet or takes them with her.
13312211.content:
All three guys break out into a run as the soft squishy compressing sound of each sandal step comes closer and the grating scrape of each step off the gritty cobblestone rings in their ears. Each runs straight forward in hopes of reaching the dirt just off the path before this unaware girls sandal pulverizes them all.

High above the right sandal lifts into the air a spiraling height to the tiny skateboarders below. None of them dare more than a glance as they refocus back towards the huge jungle of a few giant bushes up ahead. Their legs burn with the exertion but they're confident they can make it. They have to make it.

The sandal comes down meer inches from their tiny bodies and all that slow motion euphoria suddenly splashes into full speed reality. Her giant step jars them with a shuddering thud, but they have no time to even think about it as the gust from her footfall sends them flying through the air.

Each of the skateboarders land in the dirt just off the cobblestone, safe from the impending doom of that girls tread as she continues along in the background. Far beyond their friend Trixxy kicks her legs in the fountain and continues to look around for her friends not knowing that they were shrunken and so close behind her.

Kelly has turned her attention to focus on them. Staring down at them the barefoot plush girl waits until they get closer into the bushes so her actions will be obscured. After all, she did feel pretty eager to feel them struggling under her feet. However the remote had worked and that's what this test was all about. Could Kelly really trust these guys to keep quiet if she returned them to regular size? This is what she wanted anyway.

The three tiny skateboarders gathered around Kelly's feet and began to jump up and down calling to her, presumably to help them. Kelly couldn't tell what they were saying at all. She knew she didn't have a choice, they couldn't be allowed to be turned back.
13312211.title: Make a last ditch effort to run for Kelly.

choices: The other two skateboarders take off leaving their friend.
They realize he's still alive and try to come up with some way to save him.
133122111.content:
The goth and one of the skateboarders were already on the move when Kelly picked up one of her massive dirty feet and held it high over the other guy in their group. In one moment hope had turned to panic as this colossal plush girl slammed her foot down upon their friend.

From his perspective, all the he could do was stare when he realized he was her target. The toes dug into the soft earth before him rose high into the air. Her foot hovered for a moment, gigantic toes wiggling as small boulders of dirt rained down from above. The muddy sole of Kelly's damp foot wrinkling with her motion. Finally, it sped down towards the helpless skateboarder who fell backwards and flug his arms up in defense.

It didn't do any good as Kelly's first stomp squished him down into the soft ground. It gave way and shoved him down into a deep footprint that compressed against his back, forcing the plush flesh from above to mould down over his body. The ball of her foot was right against his face, his legs held down by the top of the arch of her pudgy foot.

Then it was up in the air again, the skateboarder taking in a deep breath as the pressure was taken off his chest. He scrambled to get back up and out of the ditch Kelly's foot had created. A crater in the loose dirt that had held him for a moment. In his panic he finally realized he should look up to see what she was doing as he flipped over onto his knees to crawl free from the girls huge footprint. Sure enough the huge sole was wrinkling again oh so slowly and a knowing smirk was on Kelly's face. She was going to stomp him again.

This time he tucked his legs up and wrapped his arms around his chest, left shoulder facing towards the descending foot. He couldn't do anything but take the brunt of Kelly's attack again as it dug him deeper into the damp spongy garden soil. The sensation of being compressed down further than the first crushing blow was made worse by the ground bending further down forcing the skateboarder in at a diagonal angle. Kelly's toes dug in around him and pushed on his shoulders as he was forced upon his back. Two of her toes pushing hard on him shoving him further into the dirt.

Again her foot raced into the air and the skateboarder weakly tried to climb free. It was no use this time. He wasn't sure how badly he was hurt but there was no way he could muster the energy to stop her stomping onslaught. He noticed how Kelly actually looked around her foot to see how badly her pounding steps had hurt him. She was happy so her massive sole must be doing a good job he assumed. Bracing for the impact again he forced himself down into the dirt hoping that eventually the spongy ground would cushion her blows enough that they wouldn't hurt at all.

His friends were in a panic above. They were yelling at Kelly to stop but mostly transfixed on the ditch that had been created by her footfalls. It would be impossible for them to stop her. It was the goth who first realized this and met his friends gaze. They had to get out of there if they wanted to survive.
133122111.title: Stomp them into the dirt under Kelly's feet.

choices: Run to Trixxy's sneaker and hide in there.
Go to the fountain and try to get Trixxy's attention.
1331221111.content:
Realizing there's no way they can save their friend now the goth guy and the other punk decide taking off is their best option. Their friend may still be alive somewhere deep down into that footprint in the dirt, but they certainly didn't want to join him.

The punk was the first one to get a decent ways away from Kelly. He stopped and the goth guy grabbed his arm, pulling him towards Trixxy, "It's just a better option. Sure, we don't know how Trixxy will react but we sure know what this monster wants!"

Nodding in response the punk and the goth guy started to make their way back towards Trixxy. Their pace was slower now, visibly worn out by all the recent stress and physical activity. It was at least four football fields to them or more between Kelly's hiding spot and the fountain.

All of their past ideas raced through their heads as the sound of Kelly pounding their friend down into the soil could be heard thudding in the background. Surely he couldn't have survived all that. Instead of padding it was deep thuds they could hear now from each stomp. She was really pounding at the ground hard.

They looked to Trixxy's shoes and considered that option again. After all, Trixxy would have to pick up her shoes. It was that or they could wait at the edge of the fountain for her to spin back around. Hopefully she would notice them and they wouldn't have to try to hide in her shoes to get back to her place or where ever she was going.

That and there was the constant threat of someone else coming by. They were so out in the open and exposed. They'd seen what happened to their friend, at least from above, and didn't want a similar fate.

It was frusterating that Trixxy didn't realize their skateboards had been left behind. That something was wrong. She was too busy kicking her legs in the cool fountain water high above, looking at her pretty toenail polish, and slurping on her milkshake to give it a second thought. Then again why would she have a need to look around on the ground for her shrunken friends?

"You really think we won't just get crushed in her sneaker?" The goth guy asked his friend.

Shrugging the punk just looked back over his shoulder, "If we stay here, that girl is going to flatten us anyway. Unless you think Trix is going to notice us running around on the ground and not just freak out thinking we're bugs, then sure. Lets go to her."

Pausing for a long moment they looked back and forth from the overturned black sneaker with a damp rolled up white sock stuffed into it, to Trixxy who seemed to be becoming bored with playing in the water. They had a decision to make.
1331221111.title: Running away leaving their friend with Kelly.

choices: Trixxy's toes end up smushing the goth guy down against her foot.
The goth guy is knocked off and scrambles back to the punk guy.
13312211112.content:
As they made their way towards Trixxy the guys watched in awe as she lifted her legs from the fountain water, sparkling drops falling from her skin. She spun around and planted her wet feet down on the cobblestone, turning the ground dark and damp. The giant girl wiggled her toes and commented to herself that she felt better.

This was the perfect time to get her attention. She was looking down at her purple painted nails on her toes and focused on the ground in front of her. For all their tired legs were worth they dashed forward with reckless abandon.

Reaching Trixxy's feet the two guys waved their arms furiously and it startled them to realize with such a huge area, it still seemed like her eyes wern't focsed on the spot beyond her toes.

Having had enough of this, and frankly not wanting to hear more debate about hiding in Trixxy's shoes, the goth guy lunged forward and grabbed onto one of her smaller toes. He was able to pull himself up on her nail and scramble up her arching toe towards the top of her foot. The other guy held back, staring at his friends progress and too startled to hop up on the giant girls toes.

Trixxy noticed that down around in the droplettes of water on her skin, something about the size of an ant was scurrying around. Maybe a little bigger. Still she didn't pay much attention to it. Instead to the goth guys dismay, she looked up and picked up her milkshake from the edge of the fountain, taking a long slurp.

His arms fell to his side as the goth guy stared up at the girls throat so high above, eagerly gulping down her drink. Her powerful throat muscels working to consume her treat. Everything seemed horrific at this size with any casual motion of their friend. Her giant feet were intimidating, especially after they had just seen Kelly stomp one of their friends into the dirt. That throat could easily slide one of them down into her tummy that they couldn't escape from. This was horrible on so many levels. Every glance brought another idea of a horrible fate.

Dropping down, the small goth guy started pounding on Trixxy's foot to get her attention. That action was instantly regretted when instead of looking back down the huge girl raised her other foot and brought on her other toes to scratch at the spot he stood upon. Stunned by the incredible massive size of her wrinkled sole behind her army of five eager toes, he couldn't react at all.
13312211112.title: Climbing up on Trixxy's foot.

choices: Trixxy's sister shows up, Shannon a short plush goth girl.
Minutes pass but Jamie's message actually reaches Trixxy's phone!
133122111122.content:
The goth guy braced for impact as he realizes Trixxy's toes were headed right for him. He took the brunt of it square in his chest and went sailing off her foot backwards. Luckily his punk friend down below rushed in to help break his fall.

"You okay Jamie?" the punk guy asked, holding his friend up.

The goth guy, Jamie, was holding his arm across his chest and grimacing in pain, "Yeah I'm good Kyle. It hurt but not enough to break anything. I don't think at least. I've had worse falls off my skateboard."

Ahead of them Trixxy's massive toes were scratching at her foot absent mindedly as she continued drinking her milkshake high overhead.

"Got any better ideas?" Jamie asked, not wanting to risk a similar maneuver again.

Kyle glanced back at Kelly in the bushes, who seemed to be eating something she'd picked up off the ground. Turning back concerned to Jaime he shook his head no.

With a sigh Jamie looked up at Trixxy, "She's gotta notice us eventually. I'm not going in her shoes!"

"What's your deal with her shoes anyway?" Kyle asked, "Yeah, I get it, you don't wanna get squished but sheesh man, get over it."

"Trixxy's feet kinda sweat a lot," Jamie trailed off.

Kyle looked forward and the massive feet in front of them, "So? They smell fine from here."

"They were just in a fountain! They're squeaky clean of course they're fine now. Try sitting over at her house when she puts them up on your lap while she's watching TV," Jamie made a gagging face.

"Really man? Life or death here and you're complaining about how her feet smell?" Kyle questioned.

During their conversation the two of them didn't notice what was going on at all. High above Trixxy was texting someone on her cellphone. Jamie looked curiously up. Everyone was here, who could she be talking to, unless she was messaging one of them. Would that even work? Maybe there was something in the way they were shrunk that didn't affect the characteristics of their electronic signals.

That seemed pretty unbelievable but Jame took out his cellphone.

"What? What are you doing?" Kyle asked as he looked at Jamie with his arms crossed.

"It's still the same signal right? Maybe it would still work. Do signals really have size? Maybe it would just be like being a few miles down in a valley from where we were. Just further distance from the satellite," Jamie was furiously typing away on the keypad hoping for the best.

Kyle looked up, also wondering whom Trixxy was texting. He vaguely recalled her getting a message. There was only one person she'd be writing to today.
133122111122.title: Knocked down, making other plans at Trixxy's feet.

choices: Trixxy reconizes them and reacts to their new size.
Kelly comes out of the bushes distracting Trixxy.
1331221111222.content:
The guys are left in complete frusteration as they struggle to try to figure out a way to get the attention of their giant friend Trixxy. That was until another message was received after a few minutes on her cellphone.

"We've been shrunken and we're down at your feet," Trixxy read aloud. "That doesn't even make sense. What is that some kind of metaphor? Was I being too mean today guys? Too bossy? Grr!" She began to furiously text back.

Kyle looked to the goth guy Jamie, "She actually thinks we're making fun of her."

"To be fair, I guess my message could have been a bit more explanditory," Jamie admitted.

It took the weak signal of Jamie's phone a few moments to get Trixxy's rant. It's what they expected. Trixxy was telling them off for acting like she was being annoying. Jamie tried to be a bit more direct and wrote back to her.

"No really, we're literally shrunk and at your feet right now. Look down," Trixxy mumbled to herself. Instantly her eyes darted upward and looked around the park.

Jamie sighed in frusteration, "Great, she thinks we're joking around. She probably expects us to run out and tackle her the moment she looks down at her feet."

This was becomming a huge concern. Kelly was probably done with their friend by now and could make her way over to Trixxy to take care of the tiny guys before their full sized friend figured out what was going on.

After a moment however Trixxy actually did look down. Both guys gave a sigh of relief. Now hopefully she'd actually realize what she was looking at and they could be saved! It was that or worse off they'd be left behind and more than likely at Kelly's mercy. Jamie couldn't help but hope that Trixxy would take their skateboards if she left. It seemed like such an awkward thought with his life on the line, but it felt important to him.

"Alright, I'm looking down guys, what am I supposed to be seeing?" Trixxy questioned as she stared down at her feet, taking the occasional quick glance up to see if the guys were around.
1331221111222.title: Text messages from Jamie to Trixxy!

choices: Jamie scrambles into the cave Derek dug to wait out Kelly's step.
Jamie runs towards where Kelly's arch will land.
1331221112.content:
Jamie the goth guy and Kyle the punk both find themselves frozen as they watched this huge girls plush foot slam down into this enormous footprint in the dirt. At first they didn't know how to react. None of them had actually assumed this may be their fate, they'd just figured everyone would have a good laugh and Kelly would change them back to normal.

With a slow lean towards the chaos before them, the goth guy was the first to look into the footprint before them. Their friend was actually tunneling into the soft dirt and curling up away from Kelly's big foot.

"He's still alive you know," Jamie started.

Kyle glared at the goth guy, "I know he is! What are we supposed to do about it?"

To that, the goth guy had no answer. Jamie just stared into the dirt and realized that if they didn't do something soon, they'd just end up the same way. The huge wiggling toes right next to them just added to the pressure. Kelly was distracted or at least trying to find their punk friend in her footprint. This had to be done now.

Without a second thought, Jamie threw himself over the edge and ran through the mushy dirt toward his friend and began frantically clawing at the sides of Kelly's huge footprint trying to make a ramp as he pulled his punk friend free.

Behind them, Kelly was raising her foot again for another round of stomping. Ahead and above the hole they found themselves standing in, Kyle was reaching down to grab their arms and pull them free from the pit.

"Why didn't you leave me?" Derek the other punk guy who had been stuck down there asked.

Jamie shoved him hard towards Kyle, trying to get him out of the way, "I'm not leaving anyone behind! We're going to get out of here," Jamie growled.

Kyle managed to pull Derek free and the two of them went falling over out of the footprint. Jamie however was still down there right in the path of Kelly's eager toes. He turned to meet his fate has he saw the giant girls bare sole eagerly hovering over him. She was staring down between her spread toes at him with a huge grin on her face.

Jamie didn't have much of a choice. Scrambling out of the hole probably wasn't going to be an option but Kelly's toes were just going to force him harder into the ground. Even worse they could just squeeze him tightly and squish him that way.

Both of the punk guys knew there was no helping Jamie at the moment as they saw Kelly's foot lowering down back into the dirt towards him.

High above they heard, "There's no use running little guys, I'm going to squish you all under my huge bare feet!" from the giant plush girl.
1331221112.title: Trading places with their friend under Kellys foot

choices: Trixxy shows up, still barefoot, asking what Kelly is doing.
Kelly continues making sure she's squished Jamie.
13312211122.content:
Diving out of the hole Derek had dug out, Jamie bolted for the slight relief of Kelly's arch. He didn't know what he was thinking. Perhaps he could crawl out after her monsterous foot rose up out of the foot print again. He really didn't know. All he knew a huge dirty smeared foot was hovering overhead and ready to drop at any moment.

Jamie fell. He got tripped up on the soft earth, oddly probably turned into damp soil off the moisture from Kelly's huge foot. His shoe sunk in and he fell flat on his face. Pushing his arms deep into the muck he was able to turn over to see the arch above him. Then he realized his legs were still under the massive ball of the falling sole.

Struggling against the dirt Jamie squeezed his eyes shut realizing he wasn't going to get out of the way in time. With a massive thud Kelly's foot slammed down on him, pressing his legs down into the soil.

At first it didn't hurt, it just felt like an intense pressure. Then that soft sole above pushed down cruely and he felt a sharp pain and then completely numbess across his legs. Jamie looked down in fear as the plus sized girls foot raised into the air, her toes wiggling with grim satisfaction from stomping one of them once more. Dirt rained down on Jamie as he struggled to flip over and pull himself towards safty.

It was a much more problematic issue now that his legs wern't responding at all. His clothes were caked in dirt now and he was struggling against the loose earth below. Above Kelly was laughing and calling him a pathetic tiny creature as she prepared to stomp again.

Jamie knew he couldn't take much more of this onslaught and his friends were no where in sight. He felt completely alone and his only comfort was the bare sole above him, the gigantic wide foot of this horrible girl that was delighting in stepping on him and squishing him into the ground. He was at least in the clear under where her arch should land but that still didn't solve the problem at all. There was no hope of him getting back to Trixxy now.
13312211122.title: Jamie runs towards Kelly's arch landing!

choices: Kelly asks Trixxy to help her squish what's really Jamie.
Trixxy gets the remote off Kelly and checks it out.
133122111221.content:
"What are you doing?" A voice made Kelly jump with surprise. She turned her head to see a girl with brown hair tied back in a pony tail staring back at her questioningly. Dressed in a green camo tank top and black cargo pants, Kelly didn't reconize her at first. Then she realized it was the skate guys friend from the fountain.

Kelly's foot was down in the soft soil, her toes scrunching in the dirt. Jamie was trying desperately to pull himself along but he wasn't making it much of anywhere.

"I'm, trying to squish this bug," Kelly gestured down to Jamie crawling through the muck of the footprint he was trapped in.

Trixxy raised an eyebrow and looked at the plush blonde girl oddly, "You're making this much noise over a bug?"

"Hey! It's just my thing. Y'know kind of like a game. I'm Kelly," She introduced herself, shaking Trixxy's hand.

"Trixxy. So you make a game of this kinda stuff? Usually I just stomp 'em and be done with it. What's so much fun about squishing a bug?" The punk girl asked looking down at the dirt below, "What is that, some kind of worm crawling around down there?"

Kelly glanced down to Jamie. Her mind raced trying to come up with some sort of lie so she could get back to squishing the tiny people at her massive bare feet, "He's, uh, it's a rolley bug. You know, those little ones that curl up into a ball." Under her breath Kelly mused that he definitely would curl into a ball even if he was a shrunken human.

"Oh yeah, those things. I usually leave them alone. They tend to be out on the sidewalk I thought. I dunno, I don't go digging around in gardens much. Hey, is that why you're doing this? Do you work for the park gardening group or something?" Trixxy asked, noticing that her own feet were in the soft dirt of the soil the bushes around them were planted in.

Mind racing Kelly didn't want to comit to anything that would cause any confusion later, "Oh I just help out when I can. I'm not official or anything."

Trixxy bent down, her massive body looming over Jamie's tiny frightened form that had flipped over to stare up at his friend that was giantess sized to him, "So this lil' sucker won't just squish eh?"

Frowning Kelly realized she didn't know where the other two had gone, "I had three of them, but this is the only one left."

"So what's the TV remote for?" Trixxy's words sent a cold shiver down Kelly's spine. She hadn't tucked the remote back in her pocket after she got caught up in shrinking the skateboarders.

"Oh, this thing? It's just something I found. I was going to turn it into the lost and found on my way home," Her lies were running thin. Kelly had to change the topic and fast.
133122111221.title: Trixxy meets Kelly above shrunken Jamie

choices: Trixxy makes a decision about tiny Jamie at her feet and what to do with him.
Jamie makes his way over to the hole at the end of the footprint and hides.
1331221112211.content:
Kelly was still frusterated that two of the tiny guys were missing. She hadn't let any go before. Hopefully they wouldn't make it to anyone else but the blonde sporty plush girl didn't want to take that chance. That and she'd grown very tired of trying to explain herself to Trixxy.

"So hey Trix, two of these bugs seem to have snuck off and my feet seem too soft to finish this guy off, mind helping me out?" Kelly offered, wanting to just get away from the situation.

Trixxy wiggled her toes in the dirt and raised her right foot so she could look at the bottom of it, "I guess these will do the trick. Mine are pretty soft too. It's weird, I do a lot of jobs where I'm standing around all day but they always stay so smushy."

"Well give it a go, will you? See if you can make him go smushy instead," Kelly said down to poor Jamie as he looked distraught up at his huge friend Trixxy.

Of course down in Kelly's footprint, Jamie was weakly calling out to Trixxy trying to explain that he was a person and more importantly her friend. He couldn't imagine if he was even visible or just covered in so much dirt that he wasn't noticeable as a shrunken human. In his exhaustion the poor tiny goth was about ready to just give up.

"Yeah that's fine. I've got nothing else to do anyway until my friends get back. I just wanted to see what in the world was bothering you so much," Trixxy said as she wandered over and stood above Jamie, her feet sinking slightly into the soft soil.

"Good, I'll see if I can find the other two," Kelly said as she wandered off towards the grass. She figured if it was her, the last thing she'd want to do is go back to the fountain.

So Trixxy was left with her task to do for Kelly and Jamie found himself in a horrible situation at the bare feet of his friend.

"Well lil' guy, looks like you shouldn't be playing in the garden here. Kelly doesn't want you ruining anything here so I'm going to have to squash you under my big giant foot," Trixxy explained as she placed her hands on her hips and smiled down at Jamie.

There was nothing he could do. Even if he could do much more than crawl, Kelly's footprint was far too deep and smashed into the earth for him to climb out of in this state. The hole Derek had dug was still there but unlike Derek, Jamie wasn't currently hidden behind Kelly's stomping foot. Instead he was right in Trixxy's plain sight.

That was his only chance. Get there and try to hide so his friend carelessly thinks she did ask Kelly asked. Otherwise he would just have to stare up at his friend and hope for the best that she wouldn't be so cruel and would leave him alone or even better help him. If be some miracle she did help him, he could explain Kelly's intentions and save their friends. That was of course if Trixxy herself didn't end up shrunk herself.
1331221112211.title: Kelly asks Trixxy to help her squish Jamie

choices: Trixxy continues and mashes her friend into the ground.
Kelly calls to Trixxy, having found the other two.
Trixxy ends up shrunk after being zapped by Kelly.
13312211122111.content:
"Well little bug, lets see if I can squash you," Trixxy said down to Jamie as she raised her right foot and wiggled her toes, sending a cascade of the moist dirt raining down from above. Her foot was quite a bit smaller than Kelly's, at least to someone at regular size. Trixxy was a regular sized girl however and Jamie was concerned that her relatively flatter feet may be just what it would take to crush him into the dirt. Kelly's feet were after all quite chubby, especially her soles.

Jamie didn't have time to make his daring escape. All he could do was watch his friend look down at him and think he was a bug. There was no way out of the footprint Kelly had mashed into the soft dirt, and the situation had become completely hopeless.

All in one quick motion, Trixxy brought her huge foot down upon Jamie and press down. The ball of her foot shoved him to the ground and pushed him deeply into the soil. His back could feel the dirt tightening against the increasing pressure as he saw his friends foot taking over the whole area above him. The soft sole of this punk girl smushed down around his tiny body and Jamie braced for the final squish.

Instead, Trixxy's foot raised up and Jamie found himself stuck to her sweaty sole for a moment. About ten feet up in the air to his tiny size, his weight pulled him free and he twisted through the air, landing on his face this time. He took three deep breaths, checking over his body mentally and trying to see if anything was broken. Was that it? Just a little pad down and she figured she'd squashed him already? Jamie didn't dare move.

It wasn't long before the ball of Trixxy's foot was back, pressing down upon Jamie's shoulder blades and squashing his chest down this time into the dirt. He turned his head sideways and hoped he wouldn't be pressed in too far. Just as he was about to be crushed by his friend again, her foot raised up. The soil, turning to sweaty mud from her foot, peeled away as Jamie was raised into the air again.

He flipped over yet again and found himself staring up at Trixxy. He was in a slightly deeper footprint now and gasping for air. Meanwhile his friend had both her feet back on the ground. After a sigh of relief, Trixxy's smile was replaced by the huge sole of her opposite foot drifting over tiny Jamie and plunging down to try to mash him into the dirt this time.

Catching him right in the chest with a good thump, Jamie found himself staring up between Trixxy's toes at her grinning face. His tiny hands reached up to the underside of her toes and tries to pound them furiously to get the pressure removed. The dirt behind him wasn't giving way as much any more. Gritting his teeth Jamie prepared for this punishment to continue.
13312211122111.title: Trixxy makes a decision about tiny Jamie at her...

choices: Trixxy shrinks down Kelly to squish her underfoot.
Trixxy accidentally makes herself grow.
1331221112212.content:
"What is this thing anyway?" Trixxy mumbles as she grabs the remote out of Kelly's hand.

Wide eyed Kelly lunges forward, "Give that back to me right now!" she yells. But quickly as she moves, Trixxy's free hand is in Kelly's face holding her back.

"Nah, you're up to something. Lets see what this is here... bigger and smaller options? What kind of toy is this?" Trixxy laughed as she stepped back from Kelly.

"It's a shrink ray! Well a size change remote. It's a very expensive piece of scientific equipment that a friend of mine lent to me," Kelly blurted out expaserated. She didn't want to give this girl all the details but panic had gripped her seeing someone else holding the remote.

Trixxy looked at Kelly and was about to burst out laughing when slowly everything came together. The forgotten skateboards, Kelly yelling at things on the ground, and worse off whatever she was trying to squish underfoot.

"You monster! That's my friends you've been stomping!" Trixxy was furious, glaring at trembling Kelly.

"Just give it back to me! You don't know what you're doing with it," She tried again to grab it off the punk girl, but this time Trixxy brought the size remote up and pointed it right under Kelly's chin.

"Back up, now!" Trixxy growled. Bending down she dug around in the footprint Kelly had made in the dirt until she picked up the tiny thing she was trying to squish. When Trixxy realized it was Jamie laying in the palm of her hand, she couldn't take any more.

Kelly struggled to find any words to explain herself, "It's not what you think. This is just an experiment! I needed your friends to help me so I shrunk them down."

"Forget it Kelly. I came over here and now I find out you were trying to squash my friend into the ground. I don't think there's anything you can say that can make this better. Maybe it's time you see what the world is like under my bare feet instead of tormenting my friends," Trixxy smiled as she aimed the size remote at the blonde plush girl.
1331221112212.title: Trixxy gets Kelly's size remote off her

choices: Find the others
Get something (or someone) to eat
133122111222.content:
Kelly's foot lowered onto Jamie and pressed him into the soft ground. Her arch smothered him, pressing down on his face and chest while his arms pushed desperately into the spongey flesh above him to no avail. He was struggling to breathe before the giant barefoot raised upwards. With him still attached.

Kelly laughed loudly at seeing his little body sandwiched to her barefoot. She brought about her other foot, clenching him tightly between her toes, toying with him. She smeared his small frame back into the ground and used her big toe to flip in on his back. Her big toe kept him pinned, resting on his entire body.

"Well tiny. it's been fun. But i'm going to squish you now" Kelly said.

All Jamie could do was look up as the giant, wide foot raised itself upwards, it hovered, the toes wiggling and then it came down and the ball of her foot was pressed against him. Forming itself around him, the pressure built until Jamie could no longer take it. He was squished flat.

Kelly savoured the moment, rubbing her feet together to clean the stain of Jamie's body off her sole.

What should she do next
133122111222.title: Kelly continues making sure she's squished ...

choices: Kelly goes after the guy fixing his bike anyway. It's along the way.
Kelly circles around the garden to the guy near the greenhouse.
1332.content:
Padding across the damp morning grass and giving several ants a good reason to run the other way as her massive pudgy feet squished into the damp ground, Kelly wandered under several oak trees to her favourite bench.

Setting her sandals down on the bench next to her, Kelly sat down. Her feet rested on the empty dirt that surrounded the bench. Leaning forward she did what she always did and looked for the odd wandering ant. Disapointed, she slumped back when she couldn't find any.

The garden area was nice. The grass grey thick around it and several archways along the cobblestone paths were intertwined with roses. Looking around Kelly spotted a guy from school trying to fix his bike near the gardens center. Tugging at his bike chain as he kneeled next to it. Otherwise, someone else was on the far side of the garden, next to the greenhouse that sat near the middle of the park.

Padding her soft feet in the squishy mud, Kelly gently bit her lip. Either one of them would be a good start really. The guy working on his bike really didn't deserve anything, but the one near the greenhouse always shoved her around at school. He'd say stuff like, 'the hallway wasnt wide enough to walk by Kelly' and just regular fat jokes like that, only so he could run up and shove her against the wall or nearby locker.

It's what she came here for, so Kelly grabbed her Sandals and wandered toward her target.
1332.title: Kelly decides who to step on in the garden

choices: He faints.
He remains concious.
13321.content:
"Hmm... damn it! This bike's pretty much busted unless if I get those parts..." said J. Sulev in a foreign accent, a young guy with Finnish-Estonian roots and a student at the same high school as Kelly as he was trying to fix his bike. Then he heard footsteps and turned around. It was Kelly. He's never really done any pranks on her, but there was a couple of times that she may not recall as anything nice in particular. He did consider her to be actually quite pretty, even if he wasn't that much into fuller bodied girls. Kelly asks him with a strange glee:

"Having a little trouble here or what?" to which Sulev answers "Little isn't the word here. The bikes chain's finally gave up today and there are a couple of other considerable problems... aww nuts, this requires a pro on this. You wouldn't happen to have a few spare parts for this?" Sulev asks in a slight sarcastic tone, knowing that its not very likely. It was confirmed by Kelly's moving her head sideways.

Thinking of how cute he looks, since she's been having a little bit crush on him during the year he's been in school as an exhange student, she decides to ask one more question, even if it wasn't necessary...

"Say, you have got anything to do today?" Sulev's reply is that he hasn't got anything in particular. But before he could ask why, he gets hit by the ray. Not knowing how, but the word around him and Kelly are starting to get bigger and bigger. Panicking and having a certain tendency, he is known to faint easily.

So does he do that now or can he remain concious?
13321.title: That guy fixing his bike.

choices: She goes to find more...
The foreign guy's good enough. Lets go back.
133211.content:
"Aww, the little guy's all fainted. Well, I guess he'll be in for a suprise later." Kelly thinks as she picks J. Sulev's unconsious body. He was so light in her hand, and so fragile... and rather cute too. She always thought that he was a rather smart and polite a foreign guy... more so than some of the locals here.

She puts him in her bag and thinks about her next move. She could go and grab more victims/slaves/pets or settle with J. Sulev for the time being.
133211.title: Settling with J. Sulev?

choices: They talk some more.
Get into action now!
1332112.content:
"Well, he'll do at least for the time being." Kelly thinks to herself as she stuffs both Sulev and his bike in her handbag. She heads off to her home then...

Sulev has been in this country for some time, and he did expect somethign weird to happen to him, but he wasn't believing his eyes as he woke up. Kelly, that plush girl who he knows more or little, has indeed shrunk him in size. As far as he could see, he was apparently in her bedroom. And when he looked around, he could see Kelly lying on her belly, looking down at him with a cute look. He was intimitated now.

"Wha... What is this? Kelly? Is that you!?"

"Well, I shrank you. How I did it is a bit of a story in itself, but nevermind. I was on my way to find some people to shrink and..." she stopped as she figured that she might scare him off if she went further, though she was going to have fun with him anyways.

So, as Sulev was looking at her with fear and she looked at him with delight...
1332112.title: Kelly's new pet?

choices: Make him rub her feet.
Something else.
13321122.content:
Kelly just couldn't help but feel amused at her new pets reactions as he was apparentely in the verge of panic.

That blonde foreign would soon be more surprised as Kelly decided to...
13321122.title: "The first thing for you to do is..."

choices: "How about if we play a game of cat and mouse?"
Something else.
133211222.content:
"Kelly! What have you done to me?! Do I have to ask you again or..." Sulev yelled out loud at Kelly, who then slammed her hand in front of him, making him scared.

"Or what?" Kelly asks him, to which he reacts by opening his mouth as if to say something, then staying quiet and retreating a bit, not as if to run but as if to show that he got the hint. She didn't really want to hurt him or anything, but she thought it would be amusing enough to play around a bit with him like this. Then she said...
133211222.title: An outburst suppressed.

choices: Kelly spares him and keeps him as a pet.
Kelly goes for the squish.
1332112221.content:
Kelly looked down at Sulev, seemingly rather peeved at his anger.

"You seem....energetic today. So why don't we play a GAME?" she said with a harsh tone. She tapped her foot impatiently.

"What's the game?" he asked hesitantly.

"It's called Cat and Mouse. You run away........and I try to STOMP you!" Kelly said, and took a threatening step towards him. He watched as her soft foot pressed into the floor, generating an earthquake. "You don't have a choice in the matter. So run away. If you can reach the next room, I'll let you live...."

Sulev decided to be smarter and turn to run. Kelly's next footstep landed right behind him. He barely avoided it, as another deadly earthquake pounded his ears. "You should just give up though.......It'll be enjoyable getting squished into the ground by my bare foot....At least for me it will....." she taunted.

Kelly knew she had the upper hand. She had his life at her feet, literally. She could control the outcome of the game in any way she wants.
1332112221.title: Cat and Mouse

choices: She sees her boyfriend with another girl
She goes after her ex boyfriend
133212.content:
Kelly slipped on her sandals as she watched him shrink. She already knew by now exactly what was going to happen to him. She knew he had never really been nasty to her, but who cares? She just wanted to know what it felt like for someone to die under her foot and this guy is as good as any.

Sulev was very nevous as he reached three inches tall and stopped shrinking. Kelly was glaring down at him with an evil glint in her eye. He was still trying to work out what happened when he saw her toes wiggle up and down slighty in her sandal and then she lifted her foot. He was too nervous to move and before he knew it, he was staring at her patterned sole just above him.

Kelly lowered her foot slowly, she wanted this to last. She knew doing it slowly would be very painful for Sulev, but that was okay - it didn't affect her in any way. As her sandals sole touched him, she felt the lump of his body beneath her toes, where the sole of her sandal was the thinest. She pressed down as slowly as possible, felt one crunch, then another and then another. This was amazing - much better then ants.

Eventually her sandals sole met the floor, she twisted her toes on top of him to be sure he was dead and walked off without looking back.

As she walked, she felt a lump stuck under her sandal beneath her toes. She quickly glanced at her sole and noticed Sulev mangled body stuck there. "Never mind", she thought, "he'll wear off", and just carried on walking feeling the lump flatten out with each step.
133212.title: He remains concious.

choices: Kelly turns to see if the other guy is still fixing his bike.
Kelly decides to quickly move on and take a walk around the parks outer pathway.
13322.content:
There wasn't much of a choice. It was time for Kelly to push back. Moreso, to show that guy that there was a time when he wouldn't be able to squeeze out of Kellys way.

Wandering around the side of the garden, the guy fixing his bike didn't even look over as Kelly walked by. She stepped, raising her feet a little extra and landing each step on the ball of her feet as she stumbled along through the taller grass. Her rolled up blue jeans were still above the grass however.

Kelly pulled her black tank top over her tummy and marched up to the guy near the greenhouse, remote ready. He was pretty average. Dark hair, some rock band tee shirt and a ripped up pair of jeans. He smirked as he looked down at her.

"What do you think you're up to Colin?" Kelly asked, jabbing a pudgy finger into his chest and then rocking back and forth on her heels.

He laughed as her freckled cheeks blushed. "What? Do you have a crush on me or something? I guess all the times I've shoved you out of my way has just made you hot for me."

Laughing at the crush comment, Kelly let her blushing grow. This was embarassing almost in a way. Standing before someone like this, scrunching her toes in the dry mud, imagining that if this works, he would be under those feet.

"I just wanted to see if this worked actually. It's just a music remote I have. See you just hold it out and press the keys to play it and," The device shook in Kelly's hand as a blast of light hit Colin faster than her finger poked the button. Staring in disbelief, a tiny Colin now stared up from the dirt path that was around the edge of the greenhouse.

Looking around confused, Colin stared for a moment at the huge wiggling toes in front of him. Light blue toenail polish shone brightly in the sun on top of each. Kelly's soft plush sole wrinkled up against the ball of her feet as she scrunched her toes, digging them down into the mud.

Colin was frozen as she heard Kelly high above, "Time to get the little bug." Surely she didn't mean him, he thought. But suddenly Kelly's huge bare right foot swung forward and started petting at Colin. His hands reached up to block against the descending plush sole of this giant fat girl, but her foot only forced him down forward to the ground. Rubbing him around a bit against the mud on his stomach, Kelly's dirty, grass stained foot toyed with him. Like a cat batting at a bug it had found.

She didn't want to just squish him. After all, he always shoved her around. Kelly rolled him over and began moving her foot around, grinding her wrinkled sole around on his tiny frame. The damp and slightly sweaty skin above him was impossible to grab on to, or force away.

Kelly started to raise her foot and pad it down against Colin, tugging him along his back toward her. He could only stare up in disbelief, seeing the freckled face of this huge giggling giantess, enjoying his torment under her muddy feet. Then all was blocked out by the soft moist surface of her bare foot above him as it pressed down firmly and drug him through the dirt closer to being under her massive body.

Struggling was doing him no good, but Colin didn't give up. Suddenly, Kelly kicked him toward her other foot a bit. Nudging him along through the mud she took little steps inward until he was pinned under both her low arches. The rolled up cuffs of her blue jeans bounced around her upper calves as he occasionally saw up along her smooth ankles.

Kelly continued to take little steps and pet at Colin with her bare feet. Finally when he gave up struggling she began to grind the arch of her toes into him and finally pressed down with all her weight again and again, mushing him into the damp earth.

With her heart beating hard and her body slightly shaking from the rush going through her, Kelly wiggled her toes again. He was under there. Under her bare feet, so much bigger than him. Pressed into the ground under her gently increasing weight. Her hands were shaking too, holding her sandals lightly with her fingers, remote still in her right hand.

"That," Kelly began to herself, "felt incredible."
13322.title: Tugged around under Kelly's toes

choices: Kelly decides it's too risky and shrinks him.
Kelly thinks fast and comes up with a wild explanation to spare him.
133221.content:
Catching her breath, Kelly dropped her white soled flip flops to the ground. She slipped her right foot into her sandal, grasping the clear plastic candy red strap with her toes and then sliding it on. Putting them both on, Kelly stood there wiggling her toes for a moment. She started at the ground, going over what she had just done.

Absently, she turned around to see what was up with the guy fixing his bike. Kelly froze.

He was staring right at her with a disturbed look on his face. Did he see the whole thing? Or was he wondering what in the world she was trembling over steping on. Nervously she reached for the remote in her pocket.

The last guy was a jerk, but this guy was just innocent. Should she really just go after him?
133221.title: On with the flip flops, off with surprise

choices: She wanders along the gravel path around the park for more flip flop fun.
Kelly picks up her sandals again and wanders back through the grass.
1332211.content:
A flash of light later and his troubles had turned from bad to worse. Ray had just been trying to fix the chain on his bike when he'd watched some strange fat blonde girl stomping the mud over near the greenhouse. Now, his bike towered over him and an impossibly large figure was walking through the grass forest before him toward the brick path.

Ray gasped in awe as a titanic white flip flop landed harshly upon the gritty ground before him. As Kelly put her weight down onto that sandal, her foot sinking slightly into the spongy insole, tiny pebbles popped under her incredible weight.

"And what to my wandering eyes did appear," Kelly began in a mocking voice, "but some girl squishing a man, and you're next dear." Her evil smile played across her lips as she took deliberate stomps toward Ray. Kelly let her foot hover with each step for a few moments so he could see the rough grimey sole of each flip flop. She drank in the growing fear in him as her sandal slapped against her foot with each step.

Finally and casually, Kelly pinned him flat out under her right sandal. The solid surface against the brick ground was incredibly uncomfortable. The dusty scent of well worn rubber surrounded the tiny man as he grabbed at the ridges in the slightly damp sandals sole.

With a crunch, Kelly pushed down with a cruel grin. The two surfaces met as her sandal lay flat on the ground. Dragging her flip flop back across the gritty brick path, she looked up. No one was around. She didnt care about the bike. Just if anyone saw this time.

"Well, that takes care of that. I guess it's safe to say Sally's device works," Kelly mused. She then bounced up and down a bit on her sandals. "These dont work too bad either. More of a quick solution."
1332211.title: Tread on by Kelly's flip flops on the path

choices: She Fires And Gets Them All
Kelly Shrinks Two And One Get Away
13322111.content:
Kelly thinks for a few seconds and choose to see if she can find people walking on the rocky path. Just as she walk to the path she stops for a second and looks at the sole of the flip flop and then puts her foot back down and starts to walk down the path. Kelly walks about a quarter of a mile then see a small bench. She goes and sits down and as she is relaxing with her head tilted back a little and relaxs in the sun. About 5 mins later she hears some laughter off in the distance. She readys her remote and sits up.

Kelly looks around and can see 3 people near a tree and smoking."ERRR I HATE STONERS" Kelly says to her self she walks toward them and with her remote ready and with her flip flops ready to spill more blood she aims for the 3 stoners
13322111.title: The Walk Of R&R

choices: The Death of the 2 stoners
The 2 find there freind and point him out
133221111.content:
Kelly Fired the device so fast the stoners could get away. She shrunk them all to about 1/2 of an inch tall. She stood there for a moment to marvel at her fast speed. As she did she wiggled her toes in her flip flops to put the fear in the stoners. Kelly stood there and decided to take very slow step toward them so they could see the blood stained soles of the most deadly weapons in the world to them. The guy looked up at her and all pissed themselves and decide to try to find some cover and hide from the giantess that will probly end there lives with the help of her flip flops.

Kelly looked down and saw them trying to run away but she thought they couldn't get away in time so she stated to walk towards them very slowly. While She walked to them she thought to herself "WOW I love this and in just a few steps i'll be able to squish them and turn them into goo beneath my big well worn flip flops". During her walk to the druggies one of them saw what looked like a tunnel and ran for it he got there just as Kelly took her second step the other two guys were trying to run away from her but kept stubling over because they smoked too much weed. the smartest got in the tunnel and hid silently trying not to my a sound or make a move.

Kelly got to the pothead and looked down only to see where the other one went she could see him. Kelly looked down and leaned over a bit to show them how small they really were. "OK YOU DUMB *SSES YOU BETTER TELL ME WHERE THE OTHER ONE IS NOW AND I MIGHT SPARE YOUR LIVES" She said to them but they didn't knwo where he was so the cowarded in fear."THIS IS YOUR LAST CHANCE TO TELL ME OR POINT ME IN THE DIRECTION OF WHERE HE IS." As she said that she slowly saw her lifting her flip flop up and start to bring it down. To them they saw the filty what was once white wall riase up and start to lower and what they saw made them cry,piss,and crap themselves. They saw squished ants a part of a worm and the worst peices of a dead person.
133221111.title: The Last chance

choices: Kelly looks for the other stoner.
Kelly wanders off to the baseball diamond, ignoring the other.
1332211111.content:
Staring at the titanic sight before them, the two couldn't bring themselves to move. The heel of Kelly's giant flip flop slammed into the ground, raising a ridge of dirt that rolled up and gouged out of the ground as she stepped down, holding the sole at an angle above the stoners.

"LAST CHANCE, BUGS! Where did the other one go?" The huge sandle tipped to one side, bright sunlight bursting down past it on the now really confused stoners. High above, Kelly's freckled face as frowning down.

They fell over and laughed a bit. Then looked scared again. Kelly sighed, realizing this wasnt going to do any good.

"Goodbye critters, if you had time to get your senses back, you'd realize the mistake you just made," Kelly commented as her flip flop slowly lowered down upon the two tiny targets. She could barely feel them, like two little stones under her sandle.

Below, the two of them were pushing up against the grimey yet spongy surface of her flip flop. There was no way they could move it, but they kept laughing and trying to. Suddenly it rocketed off them and they caught a glimpse of Kelly's grinning face.

Her foot slammed down hard on one of the stoners as she pivoted it just in time to save the one who was now laughing histerically. He rolled over and tried to push Kelly's foot off his friend, finally pulling himself up onto her flip flop.

Raising the ball of her foot, nearest to the little guy, she stepped down lightly on his legs and tipped her foot so he fell back to the ground. Rolling around as he laughed and cried, confused by the pain.

"I tried to be nice. Now I'm going to go look for your friend and you're going to be another badge on my flip flops sole of things I've squished. Congrats!"

The guy looked up, the massive sole moved over his body, like a ship flying through the air. The ridged surface was smeared with something new that he couldn't make out in the shadows. That was before the sky that was Kelly's flip flop fell upon him, smushing him flat.
1332211111.title: Two out of three...

choices: ...Crush you all under my sandal!"
...Crush you all under my barefoot!"
13322111112.content:
Kelly sighed lightly as she lifted her plump foot up and to the side. Bending down ever so slightly a few locks of her blonde hair dropped into her freckled face as she gazed down at the bottom of her sandal. Blood spots covered the rough ridges of the sole, tiny limbs stuck deep into the grove looking more like specks of dirt than anything else. Letting her large round slightly doughy foot collide into the ground , the sole pushed out crushing the soft material of the sandal top flat as it contoured to Kelly’s foot.

“Hmm…I won’t even look for that last bug…I can go squash so many more!”

Stomping off, Kelly’s plush rolls escaped from the bottom of her form fitting shirt and pulling it down as she walked she didn’t even take notice to her foot falling down to cover up the hole the last somewhat un-buzzed stoner had crawled into. He whimpered slightly as the heavy weight crashed down but stopped before it reached his body and he saw the massive form of Kelly waltz off as he slowly pulled himself up from the hole. He gulped deeply his world still in a gentle mix of swirls and colors and looked back to where his friends had run off to. Nothing was left…save for a few blood speckles and a crushed lump of flesh and bone. Turning away from the ending spot of his former friends, The last stoner turned to look at the giant world before him. Little did he notice, the black clad girl walking towards him, her long purple mane of hair swaying with each of her massive steps the liner under her eyes done in small sharp curves around the pale plush of her cheeks and her form almost fatty. The large black solid base sole of her boot loomed over the tiny man only for a second. Engulfing him in a shadow before the thick rubber material busted his body open, spewing organs and blood and a mixture of bone and muscle onto the ground. As she took another step unaware of the life that had just ended under her last foot fall tiny bits and pieces of the last stoner remained.

Kelly came to the baseball diamond with a smirk as she held the remote tightly in her hand. She was idly playing with the dial upon the remote as she walked into the small rusted gate to the few kids playing out on the diamond. Her sandals made small dust puffs with each step, leaving a basic form of her sandal in each step. Walking up to the pitcher, he wore a simple white T-shirt with a black baseball cap and faded jeans. He stopped in mid-action of pulling his arm back as Kelly came closer.

“H-Hey! You can’t be standing that close unless you’re going to play…and from the looks of things..you couldn’t if you wanted to!”

The other kids out in the field heard the taunt and laughed to each other as they came in closer. As the small group of children gathered around their ‘leader’ Kelly smiled again without a word and charged up her ‘trigger’ finger. Then, lifting the remote up quickly she aimed and shot. However this time a new type of bolt came out, this one being of a high hue red. Shocking over and over again, the entire team of…little rascals stood before Kelly’s feet and she loomed over them, looking down she put her thick hands on her plush hips pulling her shirt down with her index and thumb’s at the same time. Then she spoke, her voice bellowing over the tiny crowd now.

“Well,Well…if it isn’t the little league team…hmmm, seems your chances of winning this year are pretty…small..”

Then Kelly cocked her head to the side and licked her bottom lip looking down…from toying with the dial she had got a new effect on shrinking people…shrinking them even more! The entire team now stood before her left sandal each ‘dot’ coming in at less than 1/8th of an inch. Kelly shook her head back and forth with how easy it would be to squash people now. Yet she wasn’t sure if she wanted to try something new now. Tapping her foot and causing a swirl of dust to her was a massive sand storm to the people at her foot as they tried to run covering little to no area to Kelly’s eye. Then she poked her bottom lip a few times before nodding down at the little bugs below.

“I have an idea! I’ll…”
13322111112.title: To the ball game...

choices: Add a new topping to a hot-dog...
Tinker with the remote for a growth effect...
133221111121.content:
Kelly smirked and took a long breath out to draw out the ending to her sentence. “Crush you all under my sandal!” Then, as the words left her lips and hit the frail tiny ears of the micro people below her. She lifted up her massive sandal clad foot, the white foam base going back to it’s normal shape as the heavy weight was lifted. The roughed up sole of the shoe loomed over the entire team of children before they all spread out running as fast as their tiny legs would take them to get away from the lowering foot.

Then, as Kelly’s foot made contract with the ground she lifted her chubby heel up and twisted back and forth making small dunes of sand to each side of her twisting. One of the kids had just made it out from under the falling sandal and as the air was pushed out from under Kelly’s forceful foot, he was swept up in the air current and landed on her big toe.

The nail itself seemed like a large city block and looking up to the mecha of Kelly above him, he felt his legs go into shock. Unable to move himself he was rolled off the toenail as Kelly moved her toes lightly with each twisting motion. Falling towards the crotch of Kelly’s toes, he was wedged in deeply between her massive toes and the skin consumed him. As his large deep colored afro was taking into the flesh his hands twitched a few times as if clawing at air.

Kelly was unaware of the kid caught between her toes and wiggling them gently she could have sworn she felt a tiny bit of moisture. Shrugging it off, She removed her foot from the former baseball team to reveal a small crater in the ground with a bunch of tiny red marks all over it. With a nod, Kelly toyed at her remote again. Maybe if she messed with it long enough on the other end of the reader…she could make herself grow!!! Heading out of the Baseball diamond, Kelly saw many more people she hated from school that she could shrink down and crush…but then she caught sight of a traveling hot-dog stand and her stomach seemed to growl on cue.

Patting her pudgy tummy lightly and looking to the few people walking back and forth Kelly lifted her free hand up to her smooth chin as she rubbed it back and forth, her foot tapping up and down crushing the remains of people even moreso under it.
133221111121.title: Guess you're out...

choices: Hmm..a nice cold soda...
A quick trip to the water fountain...
1332211111211.content:
Reaching towards the pocket which the shrinking remote what held in, Kelly patted it lightly and looking to small group of Goths and Punks hanging around near the front of the weenie cart, Kelly walked over slowly, twisting her foot out with each step grinding the remains on the bottom of her foot to nothing.

Stepping up to the group, one of them stopped talking and slowly the rest stopped and looked to Kelly as she stood at the head of the pack with a cheap looking remote in hand, one of the Goths stepped forward. Glad in all black with some emo band t-shirt on and spiked black hair with blond tips. He licked his bottom lip stuffing his hands into his overly baggy pants and cocked his head to the side.

“Can we help you porker?”

Kelly sighed lightly as if she was hurt and without another word she let the shrinking remote go off quickly, the flashes unseen by any other eyes than hers and the now shrunken Goth group. Looking down to the add of her meal, She bent down on her pudgy knees and let her elbows rest on them. Tucking the remote away, her plush hand reached forward to the screaming Goth group and plucked them all up in her somewhat sweaty soft palm. Standing back to her full height, it seemed like to the goth group miles and miles high and they all had trouble standing on such a soft surface that gave away to every step.

“Well, Looks like you guys will be enough for a single hot-dog…”

Kelly snickered to herself and then licked her bottom lip looking down to the shrunken Goths. Putting them down to her side, She went to the front of the weenie cart and ordered up one large hot-dog. Holding it in her hand she put a single trail of ketchup down the center of the dog and waltzed over to a bench off to the side behind a few tall bushes.

As she held the Goths in one hand and her food in the other, Kelly looked down to them all and then made sure they made eye contact with the hot-dog. Screaming and running in random directions in hopes of escaping one was so bold as to jump from Kelly’s palm. Landing on the bench with a solid thud to his ears he felt his legs give out and shatter under him.

Rolling onto his back in pain, he had time to watch the tight blue fabric on Kelly’s rear fall towards him. As the pressure hit his body, he felt the bench give under him slightly before it was once more solid warm and his body expanded. His chest caved and he took a final breath out as he was turned to a speck of red on Kelly’s behind. She wiggled her behind lightly getting into the bench and then held up the Goths and flipped her hand onto the side.

They tumbled down quickly and soon became engulfed in the red heavy substance of the ketchup. Coughing and spitting it out they looked up to find Kelly’s mouth growing closer and closer, the deep hole In the back of her throat seeming to widen at the thought of the food coming into her mouth.

Then taking a huge chomp out of the front of the hot-dog. Many of the Goths were taken into Kelly’s mouth. Being tossed around easily with the food, a few of them were smashed to red smears by Kelly’s mountain sized molars while others were swallowed down with the moist lump of food. Finishing up her hot-dog quickly, Kelly burped lightly holding her hand over her lips and giggling to herself.

“Now…I just need to find something to wash it down with….”
1332211111211.title: Seeing Red Again...

choices: Kelly wanders off to the baseball diamond to see if anyone is there.
Kelly gets some lunch somewhere near the park.
1332211112.content:
Kelly laughed as the two stumbled out from under her flip flop. Struggling through the grass they began to frantically search for their friend, unheard to Kelly, calling for him.

"Eric, comon man! This chicks mad at us. I think she like think's we're bugs or something. I don't know what her problem is!" One rambled on as his friend ran by and kept falling over.

Finally the confused, and basically ant sized stoners found their friend and dragged him out of the tunnel he was hiding in.

Glaring down Kelly frowned, "Now then. What do you two think I should do with your friend?" She was laughing inside because she knew with how out of it they were, they'd do anything. "How about this, you two hold him down and I'll squish him!"

Not thinking, the two stoners who hadn't hid grabbed their friends arms and held him down in the middle of a clear spot. This was working out so great, they really would do anything she said. This could be fun.

Kelly slowly slid her right foot out of her flip flop. Holding it in the air for a second she wiggled her soft toes to get the dusty dirt out of them. The guys below ducked back as her giant bare foot landed with a thud on the ground before them, the soft sole squishing out gently under her weight.

"Hold him tightly now. My big toe will get you if you get under it," Kelly remarked as she tilted her head to one side, blonde hair falling down the side of her beautiful freckled cheeks.

Kelly raised her eager big toe over her prey, positioning the dusty textured toe over the pinned tiny stoner. The two others cringed at the scent but stayed still. Her soft dirty sole wrinkled as she flexed it, positioning her foot up on her heel.

Slowly she lowered her foot down until her toe rested upon the struggling stoner that had run into the tunnel. Her eager toe wiggled as her arched foot brought it down and smushed the little guy under it, causing the two others to fall back in surprise as it hit the ground.

Grinding her toe around in the dusty spot they'd drug their friend to, Kelly did her best to wipe off her toe before she slipped her flip flop back on.

"Now, if you want to live, get running. Otherwise you'll get caught under my old flip flops. I'm sorry but this is too much fun. Don't you like them?" She tipped her one flip flop on it's side. "I love these. Wear them all around, and definately enjoy when I find something to get under them. Like you two! It's been fun."

They began to run as Kelly took tiny steps forward, pressing the grass down as she moved on toward the fleeing stoners. Quickly the walls of white rubber caught up to one and he was mushed down as Kelly trod over the area she had toed their friend. Finally, she laughed and stamped the other one out with a quick stomp of her left foot.

"That was fun, now, what else can I do?" Kelly asked herself, looking up from her smushed playthings.
1332211112.title: Betrayed and held down for Kelly's big toe

choices: Find more people to eat!
Go squish some park-goers!
13322111122.content:
Kelly headed off the the park. There was a hot-dog stand near the benches. After her last couple of squishes, she was in need of some food. Then she got a twisted idea.......

"Hi, how can I help you?" asked the clerk dude. He was the only one at his stand at the moment.

"I'd like a h....." Then she realised, she had no money on her. She decided to go through with her idea immediately. "A human being on a bun, please!" she said cutely as she zapped him with her remote.

"GAH!" He screamed as he was reduced to only 2 inches high. She went around and scooped him up. Then, casually as if he were food, stuck him on a hot dog bun and poured mustard all over him.

"OH GOD DON'T EAT ME!" he screamed. Kelly wasn't listening as her mouth opened him. He got a good look at the pearly whites that were about to chew him into pieces.....and they did. Each bite was an agonizing hell. The teeth clamped down, then ripped at him, so his legs weren't just being chopped off, they were being forcefully pulled off his body. He screamed and screamed as blood poured profusely.

"Mmmmmm, I got ketchup too!" she said with a grin, as she continued to casually bite into him. Eventually the loss of blood and mutilation of his vitals brought him to his end, as the rest of him was chewed up and swallowed with a loud GULP.

"That was tasty...........I needed that....." Kelly remarked.
13322111122.title: Human Hot-dog?

choices: A bunch of Kelly's classmates!
People shrunken by someone other than her!
133221111222.content:
Kelly looked at the park, and it's playsets. Children were running all around the place. There were a few teens enjoying the view. And of course parents watching their children. But who to SQUISH?

Kelly looked at a couple smooching on the bench. As much as she loved to squish, she didn't interfere with romance.

Then Kelly noticed something. It was....
133221111222.title: Squishing in the park

choices: "Some plush girl..."
"Someone I haven't seen before...."
1332211112222.content:
Kelly looked down in an empty sandbox. There were at least 4 shrunken people! She walked over and bent down for a closer look. "You're all shrunken....."

The tinies waved up at her. "HELP US!"

A guy, 18, named Jim, exclaimed, "That's Kelly! I know her from school!"

"Great, so she'll help out, right?" said another.

Kelly seemed puzzled. "People shrunk....and I didn't do it? That means......" Then Kelly turned her attention to the tiny people in the sandbox. "I'll worry about that later. You'll all mine...." she said, as she kicked her flip-flops off, her feet touching the soft grass outside the box. She started to walk towards them.

They didn't know what to do until........CRUNCH!

Kelly's foot landed right on one of them. His spine took most of the punishment and he was immobilized. The rest stared for a few seconds in horror as she twisted her foot and pressed him into the coarse sand. Then, slowly, sadistically, she increased the pressure until he passed out, and he was flattened into a stain.

By that time, everyone was running the hell away. Kelly just laughed and stomped after them.

"Rooooar! Kelly-zilla's gonna step on you...." Her next kill came from her leaping into the air and planting her foot right on one of the tinies. It was one of the more sickening squishes she'd done all day, causing blood to spurt all over the sand.

The last one tries to scramble away, but Kelly picked him up with her toes and dangled him over the sandbox for a bit, then slowly squeezed. His body slowly ooozed blood as he was squished like a grape and discarded.

The one Kelly had intentionally left was scared to death of her. It was Jim.

"Kelly! Why?" he said, his voice trembling. A friend he trusted was now killing them!

Kelly gently picked up Jim.

"So, who did this to you?"
1332211112222.title: Sandbox Squish

choices: Kelly considers his offer seriously.
Kelly pretends not to hear him and squishes him.
13322111122222.content:
Jim shook. "It was.......some Asian girl with black hair. She shrunk us all, took a few and left the rest here. And then you came along and..." Jim screamed at her. "Why did you kill my friends!?"

"Because it's fun! I like squishing little people. And I think you might enjoy it too. You wanna join them?" she asked.

"No way! Let me go!" he said, thrashing in her hands.

Kelly shook her head. "I'm sorry but it's just so fun to squish people. It can't be that bad from their perspective. You might even enjoy it...." Jim quickly found himself in the sand.

"PLEASE! Let me live...!" Jim protested.

"Bye.." said said, wiggling her foot and pressing it down on him. He tried to fight, but all that weight was impossible to escape. He screamed as his legs started to snap under the weight, then his ribs, then his organs started to deform. Closer and closer he got to death as the soft, yet heavy sole pressed down and twisted violently on him. He started to cough up blood and bleed immensely.

Finally he screamed at the top of his lungs in a final effort: "LET ME LIVE! I'LL BE YOUR SLAVE FOREVER!"
13322111122222.title: Kelly about to squish Jim?

choices: Someone's shrunk everyone in the park while she's been busy
One of her plush friends was watching her
133221111222222.content:
Kelly's foot continued to twist menacingly. She gave his offer a little thought though. It didn't take her long to say to herself: ("What could a little insect like him do for someone much bigger than him?")

Kelly stomped a few times. "STUPID INSECT!" Blood spurted several times as Jim's body began to hemmorhage and his mind began to grow fuzzy. She laughed sadistically as she took his arm and easily snapped it between her toes. If that wasn't enough, she ripped it off his body, then, licking her lips, casually picked it up and ate it like a candy.

His bodily fluids were oozing out of his body, a simple human like him could barely survive for less than a minute after all the injuries he's taken.

But it wasn't over for him yet. Kelly did the same to his other arm, except instead of ripping it off his body, she snapped it and then squeezed it so much it was an unrecognizable piece of flesh hanging from his body. Jim finally passed out, just as Kelly finished him off, stomping him multiple times until he finally disappeared into the sand completely.

Kelly looked up and saw...
133221111222222.title: Brutally squished

choices: He climbs under Kelly's arch on her flip flop.
He lets her go, looking for a way to get back to normal.
133221112.content:
With the guys so out of it, Kelly quickly zaps two that shrink down into the grass. Her third shot zaps a tree which groans and twists at a wild angle as the bark contracts and bends where her shot hit.

"Aww no way!" She snarled as she began to chase down the last guy.

The two others were staring up at Kelly, even more dazed and confused than before.

"This is incredible man! I feel like a bug. Staring up from the grass at that chick. Whoa, is she ever huge!" One laughed as they watched the dirty worn sole of Kellys sandle raise up and land incredibly hard in the dirt nearby. Her massive toes wiggled as her weight pressed down on that sandle, sinking into the spongy surface of her footwear.

Laughing and looking at her the other stoner commented, "Her stomach moves like water man. Like jelly or something. Thats like..." He went quiet suddenly as Kelly raised the grimy sandle of her other foot above him.
