Kelly didn't even know as her foot descended down hard on the tiny stoner. He was pressed down into the damp ground. She twisted as she let her weight drop on that foot and continued after their friend.

Down on the ground the other guy cringed at the huge sandled foot that stood before him. Looking up he saw Kelly's smooth leg, stretching up into her rolled up jeans showing off her calves that were questionably more muscle than fat from supporting her 300 pounds or so. His eyes fell to her dirty foot, twisting against the surface of the white sandle. Her foot hit the shiney red strap of the sandle and a gritty grinding sound told the stoner that his friend probably wasnt going to be okay.

Seconds were ticking by, his confused mind realized. If he was going to do something, now was the time.
133221112.title: Unknowingly squished under Kelly's flip flops

choices: The sandal stoner wanders to his friend.
The stoner from Kelly's sandal calls to his friend.
1332211121.content:
Shaking a bit to clear his mind, the tiny stoner grabbed Kelly's sandal and pulled himself up onto it. He instantly regretted this decision as the white surface, turned gray by wear and tear from Kelly's feet, dipped down and away from him.

In completly bewilderment, the confused punk grabbed onto the spongy surface with all his might, fingertips digging into the flip flops rubber sole so tightly that he stuck.

Cringing as she brought her foot on and planted it down with a bone jarring thud, Kelly ran on after the stoners friend.

The third guy had dashed into the greenhouse and was frantically looking for a place to hide. The elabourate building had cobblestone pathways all over leading around the mix of plants that covered the outer walls. A small creek even ran through the middle of the big greenhouse.

He stopped with a jolt as the door slammed open at the far end and he saw Kelly glaring at him. The blonde smiled broadly and leaned back, firing off a blast with the remote and this time hitting her target square and true.

Shrinking down to size, the stoner was left to wait as Kelly wandered over to him. Her massive sandals slapping against the stone tiled floor of the greenhouse. He looked up her body, shivering at the sight of the gigantic girl wearing rolled up jeans showing off her thick lower calves and a light black tank top.

Kelly laughed as this one actually fell to the ground and began to beg. However, looking over from his vantage point, the other stoner fell off Kelly's sandal and tried to regain his senses. He realized what had happened but was kind of hazy on what to do.
1332211121.title: Kelly chases the lone stoner into the greenhouse

choices: Kelly tells him to out run her as she slowly tries to step on him.
Kelly tells the little guy to rub her feet.
13322111212.content:
Not wanting to be caught in Kelly's sight, the stoner that had taken a ride over on her sandal called to his friend.

Looking over at the sound, the stoner that Kelly had just shrunk realized it was his friend. With slight hope he went to move over to him.

"Oh where do you think you're going? I don't think you get the game here," Kelly laughed as she saw the stoner take a step. His friend beside the sandal stayed put, giving up hope on his friend and hoping Kelly wouldn't see him.

Even after pointing at his friend, Kelly didn't look down to see the little one next to her sandaled feet. She was too wrapped up in what she wanted to do to this new one.

"First, I need to get these sandals off. They make the soles of my feet so hot at times. At least the grime on them keeps my feet from getting too sweaty sorta," Kelly explained to her new target as the other stoner stared up in disbelief.

Kelly didn't even know it, but her left foot was about to come down on the stoner that was in her sandal. He started up aimlessly at the slightly pink and definatly grimey sole of this giant plush girl. Her toes arched up as her heavy thick sole descended quickly and made contact with the sun warmed stone walkway.

She didn't even notice. Thinking maybe it was some water splashed on the stone walkway from the indoor creek that was now wet under her foot. Kelly was too into what she was going to do to the guy she was looking at to really care as a small crunching vibration tickled her foot.

"You're going to show me just how much you want to live little punk," Kelly seductively says, now really into this whole tracking down and squishing game.
13322111212.title: Unnoticed under Kelly's giant foot

choices: He flips over and hopes that Kelly won't step on him.
He tries to crawl away and Kelly drops down to eat him up.
133221112121.content:
"All you need to do is run away from this big mean giant girl! That can't be that hard right? After all I'll give you a head start," Kelly offered as she wiggled her toes eagerly.

The tiny guy after just seeing his friend get squished didn't take long to spin around and start dashing in the other direction. It didn't occur to him to dive off into the bushes and plants at the side of the walkway, he just continued on the path before the both of them. Kelly just assumed he feared that she'd just squash him the moment he tried to hide.

She laughed high above, "Is that all you've got? You're barely making it over one brick in the pathway without taking several steps. That and you need to stop stumbling!"

With a soft plap Kelly took a step forward, her huge plush sole gushing out slightly under her weight. The sound behind him caused the tiny guy to push himself harder to get away from the giant girl behind him.

"Oh comon, you're not even trying!" Kelly grumbled as she took another step forward. This time holding her foot in the air and wiggling her toes to wrinkle her sole and intimidate her prey. It worked as the guy glanced back over his shoulder and saw exactly what would step upon him if he didn't get going.

The trouble was though, he was running, as fast as he could. Completely exhausted and in a daze he kept stumbling forward and hoping for the best. Meanwhile Kelly was just edging her feet on taking small steps towards the tiny guy below.

She complained out loud, "This is getting boring! I could just squash you flat. Or maybe I'll pick you up and gobble you down! Yeah, if you're just going to be lazy with this, I may as well just get down on my hands and knees and snap you up like a cat. Maybe that would finally get you moving!"

It didn't seem to phase Kelly that the tiny guy could actually be trying his hardest. Finally he gave up and just fell down on the ground on his chest. Trying desperately to catch his breath he watched as Kelly's shadow stretched further beyond him as she wandered closer to his tiny form.

"I'll make it easy on you little guy. Flip over if you want me to just step on you and get this over now, or lay there and try to crawl away and I'll eat you all up!" Kelly happily announced to the small punk at her feet.
133221112121.title: Kelly's too fast for her prey in the greenhouse.

choices: The punk gives in
The punk runs for his life
133221112122.content:
Kelly sat down in front of the little guy.

"Go ahead, rub my feet. My soles are tired from squishing people and I could use some relief," she said, grinning.

The punk didn't want to have anything to do with Kelly. He ran for it instead of accepting her invitation.

Kelly seemed miffed. "What's wrong? Don't you want to rub my soles? They're nice and soft....Or would you prefer something more painful?" she said, wiggling her foot.

He was torn. Perhaps it wouldn't be as bad as he thought. But then again, would he rather die with his pride, or give in to Kelly?
133221112122.title: Rub offer

choices: Kelly tries shrinking an entire building now.
Kelly wants to go in the arcade....
1332211121222.content:
The little punk suddenly took off. He was not going to give in and be humiliated by giving a foot rub to this fat girl. And that would lead to his downfall.

Kelly sighed, stood up, and pinned him down under her heel. "Oh, to think I could have kept you as a pet. But you chose to get squished. Oh well....."

Kelly reached down and picked him up. "Since you disobeyed me......" Before he knew it, he was back on the ground, without his right arm. Kelly had bitten it right from his body. He screamed and tried to crawl away without his arm, but no such luck. Kelly pinned him down once again and twisted her foot cruelly on him. His vertebrae creaked and almost gave way from the immense pressure. And ironically, her foot was a wonderful, soft cushion. It was like the world's softest pillow, only the size of a house, and getting heavier. She padded her foot on him a few times for good measure, then took the weight off her other foot.

CRUNCH! In one second, the punk died from the unbearable weight. Kelly scoffed and wiped off her foot. "Hehe, another bug."
1332211121222.title: Disobedience

choices: Kelly stomps forward, ready to chase down her targets.
Kelly sits down and gathers them up to try something different.
13322112.content:
The band shell had the typical group of punks from Kelly's school hanging out around the back. Three girls and about five guys. None of which Kelly really liked. Kelly paused as she rounded the corner, damp leaves rusling under her bare feet.

It was pretty much just casual motions that Kelly went through this time. She took the remote and clicked it at all five of the guys. Each time a blast of light diminished them.

"What do you think you're doing!" One of the girls shreaked as she stomped forward.

Kelly couldn't help but laugh, "Shrinking your boy toys so I could squish them, but it looks like you've already taken care of that for me Britanny!"

The brunette felt a cold sweat roll over her as she looked down at her dirty old sneaker that had turned from black to a dark gray from being worn all the time. She slowly brought her foot up and gasped. Her boyfriend was nowhere in sight, but she could see the other four.

"No! How could you do this? You stupid cow!" Britanny cried as she dropped to her knees in the wet grass and began pawing around.

Kelly narrowed her eyes. "Oh I don't know, just was grazing through the park when I thought I'd moooove on over here and see what was up." She tipped the remote down and zapped Brit, followed quickly by her two friends with a flick of her wrist. The tv remote like device made this far too easy.
13322112.title: Kelly finds a group behind the band shell

choices: Richard tells everyone to run and tries to save Eric.
Eric is a lost cause, they all run off and forget him.
133221121.content:
"Fee fi fo fum!" Kelly laughed as she padded forward, giant grass stained soles rising up and slamming down into the muddle dew covered grass that the shrunken group was lost in.

Britanny cringed at the footstep her dirty sneaker had made and where all her friends seemed to be gathered around. None of them looking too impressed.

"Way to go squashing your boyfriend Brit!" Jill growled as she moved forward and shoved her friend.

Brit glared and shot right back, "It's not like I meant to! He just vanished! I thought she had some space gun or some junk!"

Richard split up the both of them, glaring back and forth between them, "This isn't going to help us now! Maybe you had to be tiny and staring up at that fat monster to understand it, but she's going to squish us!"

It was way too late for discussion as Kelly shoved her plush bare toes into Eric, one of the other guys just a short distance away. His hands shot up to combat the toes that were wiggling down upon him but all he managed to do was get an arm caught between them before he was forced down lightly against the ground.

"Help me! Don't just stare! She's crushing me!" Eric yelled histerically to his friends.

They all looked up at Kelly's eager smile, "What do you do?" She teased down to them. "The big mean fat girl wants you all under her big bare feet, but you want to save your friend. Do you run and forget about him as a lost cause, or do you try to get him free and hope that I won't get bored with my antics and get you all?"

Brit was on her knees in the mud crying. Richard glanced sadly over at his best friend who was under the cruel toes of Kelly's foot. What could he really do?
133221121.title: Kelly goes stomping behind the bandshell

choices: Kelly decides to hunt them down.
Kelly decides to honor Richard's sacrifice and just let them escape.
1332211211.content:
"RUN!" shouted Richard, and he dove to save Eric, grabbing onto his arms and pulling on his body. Brit was still immobilized in sorrow.

"Let it end.....please....let it end!" he said.

"This is no time to mourn! Run with the others!" Richard demanded.

Weither he listened was not Richard's concern at the moment. He yanked with all his strength, and eventually pulled Eric free.

Up above, Kelly was surprised at Richard's effort to save Eric, and let off her guard. Eric was free for the moment.

"GET AWAY!" Richard said. Eric was already running, and Richard started to run, until with a THUMP, Kelly's foot came down on him.

"I'm surprised at you. You risked your life to save your friend. I guess there is honor among you bugs after all......" she said. "But now it's squishy time!"

She pressed down for a few seconds, then lifted up her foot and stomped, once, twice, three times. The heavy weight bashed him into the ground, and turned him into a bloody stain.

"They feel so nice when they pop....." Kelly said. Suddenly, she realised that with the distraction, Richard gave his friends time to escape and scatter. This wouldn't be as easy anymore.
1332211211.title: Temporary Saviour

choices: Stay completely still and hope that Kelly doesn't notice and moves on.
Squirm with all her might and try to escape from under Kelly's foot.
13322112111.content:
Eric had quickly caught up to the group of three girls and three guys after the adrenaline from being trapped under the giant sole of their plus sized shrinker. He knew what had happened from Kelly's overpowering voice high above, and was sure he couldn't have been any help.

This was hopeless, if Kelly decided to give chase, and she certainly would, they were meerly scrambling through the grass at this girls feet. In a simple step or two she could take out the whole group of them.

Brit's sister Sara was finally the first to realize there was no escape as she skidded to a stop and turned to face their giant foe. This brought a broad smile to Kelly's face as she padded forward to stand directly over the shrunken girl. Ducking down, the sight before Sara froze her anyway as she looked in awe at the impossibly smooth motions of the mountain sized girl standing over her.

"Decided to stand up for yourself? Well that's sweet. As brave as you may think you are though, there's no way that I'm going to just let you go now." Kelly rose up to her full height. Sara's eyes struggled to see Kelly's face looking down at her, but her new tiny size made things a blur. However, the immense soft sole that now was hovering above her was visible in full detail. From the dirt smeared ball of Kelly's foot, down her plush sole and along so many wrinkles to her heel, every pattern was visible on her skin.

In almost exhaustion from what she was seeing, Sara slumped away from the huge sole and blurry vision beyond that of a giant sized plush girl grinning down at her shrunken form. Her eyes darted to her friends who were now far ahead running even further into the grass. Sara's hands grasped at the muddy ground to pull herself away from Kelly but nothing she could do would help her now.

Kelly's foot just landed with a splat on the softly muddy soil that Sara lay stunned upon.

Sara's eyes were tightly shut but slowly opened when she realized she was still okay. Kelly's huge arch lay across her shrunken body like a thick heavy blanket, pinning her to the ground. The wrinkles lay heavy across Sara and kept her from being able to squirm free. Her mind raced as she considered her options. Would Kelly really notice she hadn't squished her? This could be her way out.
13322112111.title: Kelly catches up to shrunken Sara

choices: They go back, after Britanny pleads to save Karen.
Brit agrees and is too scared to go back to Kelly.
1332211212.content:
"I knew it," Kelly growls as the tiny people at her feet run for it. "You stupid bugs don't even want to help your own friend. Nevermind when you treat other people like dirt!"

Eric struggled against Kelly's toes that were now wiggling with anticipation. The scent was pretty terrible as her grimy bare foot pushed down on him. He felt a cold shudder as Kelly began to roll him under her plush soft foot. The padded ball of her foot felt smooth but the wrinkles under the bit of her arch that she would move him under occasionally was much softer and he sunk deeply in.

Clawing at her soft winkles did no good since her foot was either sweaty, covered in dampness from the grass, or a mix of both. It was hopeless.

"He's really struggling hard! Poor Eric is still alive you know. Under my giant foot. It must be pretty gross. I've walked all over the park today. Stepped on a few other people. Ah well. You'll join him soon."

Karen, the girl at the back of the group yelped as Kelly brought her toes of her other foot down upon her, clamping her toes lightly closed and picking up the struggling girl. Eric felt everything slipping away as Kelly's plush sole closed down around him and the gooey mud ground went from moist to solid under him. In darkness, pressed to her sole, he was squished flat.

"Still going to keep going? Careful, I could squish her up at any moment. What does the crazy fat girl want you to do?" Kelly laughed, teasing them again. Karen was pleading with her friends not to go on.

Richard glared up at Kelly and roughly grabbed Brit's hand. "Come on! She's not going to let Karen go! This is just a sick game that she's loving!"
1332211212.title: Running from their friend gets Eric squished

choices: Kelly ignores them and goes after the runners
Kelly decides to hunt the others after playing with these
13322112121.content:
Karen screamed more loudly than ever and Richard forced himself to look back through the blades of grass at Kelly's scrunching toes.

"Help me! Please help meeeaaahh!" There was an audible snap as a slight flex of Kelly's big toe broke her arm.

"We can't leave her!" screamed Brit, "We've been friends with her since we were kids! We can't let that monster just kill her!"

Richard knew it was madness, that there was nothing they could do, but memories welled up in him and his heart broke at the sound of Karen's terror. The spark of nobility deep inside him blossomed, propelling him into action.

"Yeah," he said, as he began to move, "I wouldn't deserve to live if I left her now."

Kelly smiled with surprise as two of the punks began to come back. Stupid! She could see three more had paused and two carried on running.

Richard caught Brit by the arm, to stop her from running to their friend.

"Well? We're here! What do you want? Leave the girl alone!"

From this close, he couldn't even see the giantess's face, just the underside of her stomach and breasts.
13322112121.title: Lionheart

choices: Marie decides it's ok and wants to get revenge.
Marie gathers up her friends shrinking devices to break them.
14.content:
Marie laid quietly in her sleeping bag for a bit. She was quiet upset by everything and kept going over what Sally had said in her mind. Would her friends really do such mean things? Shrunken people would be so fragile. They could so easily be hurt.

On the other hand, she was sick of being picked on too. Nothing angered her more than the people from school that picked on her. Just about a week ago they tore up one of her shoujo manga books while teasing her and saying that was the only kind of romance she would ever know. It really wouldnt have mattered, besides the book was rare and autographed.

Both sides conflicted with her feelings and burned within her. She knew she had to decide before she fell asleep. Kelly had finally drifted off and Marie sat up. The digital clock on the tv said it was just after three am. Sighing she leaned forward onto her plush thighs and made her decision.
14.title: Maries inner conflict

choices: Marie dashes out, catching the bus for China town.
Marie goes over and squishes the person herself to save him the torment.
141.content:
Cuddling back up in her sleeping bag, Marie decides to trust her friends. As bad as it may seem, they have all been friends for as long as she can remember. She couldn't betray them.

The next morning over breakfast Marie sat quietly having a bowl of cereal as Kelly exploded with all her ideas.

"It's going to be great! I'm gunna be like a giant monster, stomping around and scaring them. Maybe I'll even eat some of them up. Oooh," she slaps Sallys arm even though Sally obviously is paying attention, "Just imagine what that would be like!"

Kelly leans in close and opens her mouth in front of Sally after taking a big spoonful of cereal.

"Graw. Im going to chew you up and swallow you Sally and digest you in my big bad tummy!" She sits back down laughing away.

Marie has never seen Kelly act like this before. No amount of sugar in the world has ever done this to her.

When things settle down Marie quietly says, "I was thinking of taking the bus to China town today to see if my comics are in yet."

Kelly looks confused, "Comics? Comon who needs em! There's way too much fun to be had!"

Sally perks up, "Hey yeah wait, isn't that new set you've been waiting for suppose to be in today?"

"Maybe I'll go with ya then," Kelly says with a mouthful. "If you don't mind waiting till after breakfast."

Nodding Marie goes back to her cereal, "I think that is what I may do. Either that or..." Before Marie can finish her thought the mail is delivered and Kelly leaps up to rush and get it.

Smiling across the table Sally takes a tiny person out of her backpack and drops it into Kellys cereal.

Everyone waits quietly as Kelly rushes back in and tosses the mail to Sally, "Nothing for me again!" She gasps.

When Kelly sits down she sees something in her cereal and gasps. Growling at Sally about the bugs in her house she picks it out with her plump fingers and puts it on the floor.

Marie sits there uncomfortable for a moment. Kelly begins to poke away at it. Remembering all the times Kelly tormented bugs for hours at times while waiting for her baseball games to start at the park Marie realizes the little guy is in for a world of pain.
141.title: Marie's first breakfast of her new life

choices: No they deserve to die
Yes because you delt them what they deserve
1411.content:
Marie could see the fear in the little guys eyes and she felt really sorry for him. She thinks to herself before leaving. "Um would you mind if I had that little guy for company on my trip today." she says. Kelly looks at her. "Shrink someone else." she says. "I will but I want someone now..." she says. "Well, Ok. Here." She hands the terrorfide kid to Marie. "Thank you." she says then storms out of the house.

"I little guy." she says once out of hearing range. "I don't want to die!" he screams out at her. "I am not going to hert you. I saved your life. You should thank me." she says. "So, you don't want to kill me." Marie giggles. "Why would I want to do that? I said I wanted company and what type of hostess would I be if you died." she giggles. "Ah... few thank you! I love you! Well, for saving me that is. Hi, my name is Rio." he says with great relefe. "Hi Rio, my name is Marie... I guess I probubly will be taking care of you for a while. I mean if you like." she says. "Sound good. You can make me normal again right." he says.

"Well, that is something I wont know until later. I promis I wont let them get to you." she says as she fixes her glasses. "Glad to see your a nice person." Rio says.

"Hey the bus." she says. She gets on and finds a seat. "Do you like Manga?" she asks nicely. "Ya I love Manga. Have you ever read the manga for FLCL." Rio says. "No but I saw the Anime series on TV." she giggles. "That was so funny." she says. "Ya with the eye brows guy... and what was up with the guitar being a weapon thingy." Rio says. "Ya one moment it is some sort of axe then a rocket launcher then a normal guitar. I never got that ether. Hey do you think it would be ok for me to shrink some other people... I mean people who are mean to me because I am geeky." she says.

"For revenge." Rio says. Marie nods her head. "If you don't kill them then
1411.title: Saved by Marie

choices: He's pleased
He's shocked at her mercilessness
He's turned on by her mercilessness
14111.content:
Marie shakes her head, as if to clear it. "No, they're toast!" Marie takes off her shoes and socks, flexed her toes, and stomped the pleading man. She smiles as she feels warmth bubbling up between her toes. "I can always shower later!" She winks at Rio.

How does he take it?
14111.title: No they deserve to die

choices: Marie wants to go to China town still, so everyone goes.
Marie gives in to stay for a day at Sally's.
1412.content:
Kelly continues to laugh and mock the tiny man for being in her cereal. With everyones attention on him, they dont notice Marie as she walks over and softly steps down onto the tiny man. She leans forward and feels the dampness as he squishes underfoot.

With her head down she felt Kelly's eyes upon her. "What in the world did you do that for? He deserved what we..." Kelly began.

Sally couldnt help but laugh after she explained, "I don't think Marie wanted to watch you torment a shrunken person with your clumsy poking anymore!"

With that said, Marie couldn't help but blush. They liked it. He was doomed anyway, she just sped up the process before Kelly hurt him too much.

Scrunching her toes, Marie felt the plush wrinkles of her pudgy foot compress the moist mess under it.

Kelly asked if they had anymore but Marie didn't look like she wanted to wait around anymore as she wiped off her foot with a paper towel.

"Aww comon Marie, just stick around. If Sally has a bunch we can all sit around and play with them today. It's too hot out anyway," Kelly comments.
1412.title: Squished on the kitchen floor.

choices: She storms into the living room, waking everyone and shrinks Marie.
Sally shrinks Marie from the shadows on the stairs.
142.content:
Marie gets up and fumbles to put on her glasses. She goes around and gathers up the remotes, most of which are still lying out. "It's for your own good. I won't let my friends be so evil," Marie wispered before she wandered off with them.

Sally rolled over as a light came on from the kitchen. Puzzled she sat up. Her quick thinking added up when she noticed Marie was gone and so were the remotes. Leaping up her heavy footfalls woke Cathrine and Kelly.

"What in the world is wrong with you Sally?" Cathrine questioned groggily.

Kelly just rolled back over, grunting and pulling her sleeping bag up close to her head. "This is why you go to the washroom before bed, Sally."

Sally was already dashing out into the kitchen though and sure enough, out on the old picknic table in the back yard, Marie was bashing the remotes to pieces with a hammer!

Through gritted teeth Sally slammed the back door shut behind her, "What do you think you're doing? Those things took hours to make!"

Marie looked up with teary eyes, "I can't let you hurt people with your inventions Sally, you're so smart and better than that." Her head was bowed, dark hair covering her face and her glasses shining dimly under the moonlight.

Grumbling Sally led Marie back in by her wrist and sat her down on the couch. Both Cathrine and Kelly had drifted back off to sleep.

"You wait right there! Just be glad I don't call your mother," Sally snapped as she went up to her room.

Furious she paced about in her room. There was only one thing on her mind. She didn't want to, but she knew she had to. They were friends but there was no need for this! She poured everything into those remotes.

Removing a box from under her bed, Sally removed her new prototype remote. Not only able to shrink people, but able to teleport them too by taking them into the device to be replaced later. It was her answer to be able to shrink people from further away. It didn't have any spiffy sounds or light effects either. Just a quick invisible beam that made the target vanish.

"You're so going to get it Marie," Sally grumbled as she stomped back downstairs.
142.title: Marie's betrayal, smashing the devices

choices: Let Sally have her way and they squish Marie.
Cathrine and Kelly decide who will keep Marie as a pet.
1421.content:
"Alright! You think you can just go and break everything? Everyone knowns a real scientist always keeps backups of their work!" Sally barks as she points the remote at Marie who vanishes suddenly.

The two other girls sit up when Marie suddenly vanishes. Sally stumbles over their legs and flops down on the couch.

Kelly, still out of it asks, "What did you just do Sally? Vaporized Marie?" Her sleepy voice drown down the alarm that was really behind those words.

Laying out on the couch in her night gown Sally stared up at the remote in her hands, "She's shrunk and inside here. She broke your remotes."

"No way!" Cathrine sits down on the couch next to Sally. "Marie did that? Little quiet Marie?"

Sally glowered, "Go look out on the picknic table. They're all busted. I've been working on this new one. So, we going to teach her a lesson?"

Both the girls were quiet, "You mean like... scare her?" Cathrine asked.

Sally sat up crosslegged, "Sure if you only want to keep her as a pet until I can change her back. But chances are, we'll get in trouble before then."

Cathrine looked to Kelly, who just shrugged in responce, "Don't bring me into this. You know me Sally, I'm behind you whatever you want. She is our friend though."

"Do you know how long it takes to make these things? Those four stupid remotes took me the better part of two years! Not to mention the cost," Sally stared at the floor. Sure she cared about her friends. But science was her passion. Those were her prototypes of a whole new invention and now they were gone.

"So what are we going to do?" Cathrine asked.
1421.title: The girls decide Maries fate

choices: Sally wins
Kelly wins
14211.content:
Sally smiled. "She should receive the most serious of punishments."

"You mean...." Catherine started.

"Yes. We are going to stomp her tiny little guts out. At least, one of us........" Sally said with a sadistic smile. "She'll oooze out onto the floor, her last thoughts being how much she regretted breaking my inventions........"

"You can count ME out," said Catherine stubbornly. "I'm not doing it. If you want to, that's fine, but I'd rather not be the one." she said while walking away.

Kelly took a seat next to Sally. "Okay, so one of us gets to squish her. Who does it?"

Sally seemed puzzled. "Since it was my inventions she broke, I obviously have all the reason in the world to get revenge. However, why don't we make this fair? A little game of rock-paper-scissors."

Kelly was surprised. "I haven't played that game since early grade school, but if it will solve our problem...

Sally smiled. "See, even the most simplistic child's game can solve disputes. Let's do it."
14211.title: Janken-po?

choices: Kelly agrees to take her as a pet.
Either Cath or Sally...
14212.content:
Seemingly recalling all the hard work and all with the devices, Sally starts reaching out for Marie with a little madness in her eyes: "I'm so gonna kill her!" Marie backs away as Kelly and Cath grab on to her and tell her to cool down and that she's not being herself. Cath gives a little advice for Sally:

"Stop and take a few deep breaths before doing anything else. Sure she deserves a little lesson but killing her off wouldn't be worth that in the end."

While Sally was doing that, Kelly looks at Marie and asks "So, what do we do with her? Shall one of us keep her as a pet/slave until Sally gets new devices done?" Sally thinks for a moment and says in a slightly toned down voice:

"Yeah, I can make new ones pretty fast when I think about it, maye a month or so."

"So who's gonna take her?" Asks Cath. After a while of thinking...
14212.title: Who's gonna keep her as a pet for the time bei

choices: Cath.
Sally.
142122.content:
"Sorry, I have got relatives coming to my place, so I can't really be taking care of her." Kelly said, making Marie a bit worried if she would end up with Sally... She was already thinking of what to say to her to avoid getting killed.

So which one will it be?
142122.title: Marie's gonna be Cath's or Sally's?

choices: Marie waits for Kelly to step down and hop up into her slipper.
Marie cannot avoid Kelly in time and cowers awaiting her fate.
1422.content:
Blasting her newer remote at Marie worked quickly and silently. No flashes, no big sounds, just what she wanted. The new remote did it's job. Marie vanished and Sally smiled at the orb on the remote where she knew Marie now rested. With another click she could teleport her anywhere.

"Perfect," Sally mused as she saw Kelly beginning to stir on the couch. Crouching low she fired the remote and Marie appeared in a miniature form on the floor as Sally watched eagerly from the shadows.

Grumbling to herself, Kelly slipped on her fluffy pink slippers and yawned. They had a pretty big puffy front, and no back. Stretching high and long, she yawned again and began stumbling toward the kitchen for a glass of water.

"Always so hot in this stupid house," Kelly grumbled as far below Marie saw the gigantic plastic tan soles of her friends slippers flopping down and crushing the carpet as she walked toward the tile Marie stood on. Gasping Marie was lost. She wanted to run but was so struck by the sight of the huge body of Kelly, now miles high and heading straight for her.

The slap of her slipper upon the cold tile woke Marie from her trance. One misplaced step would squish her flat! She had to do something though or eventually she would meet that fate anyway.
1422.title: Shrunken Marie in the path of Kelly's slippers

choices: Marie dashes out of there, anywhere is better than in there.
Marie stays put, if she can hold on, maybe she can get her friends attention soo
14221.content:
With a huge thud, Kelly stepped down in front of Marie. Running along the long length of the fluffy slipper, Marie grabbed the furry footware and pulled herself up.

Her eyes grew wide as all too quickly she realized her mistake. High above, Kelly's heel was lifting, carrying the slipper forward. The slipped dipped forward and Marie rolled quickly down against Kelly's soft plush sole. Tucked up against the ball of Kelly's foot, Marie struggled wildly as the step was almost completly.

With a heavy flap, Kelly stepped down hard in her tired state. Fortunatly the furry insole of the slipper and Kelly's plush feet had spared Marie this step. Even though she was pressed firmly into her friends sole, Marie waited breathlessly for the pressure to release. Cautiously she lay still as the weight was released off her chest and another slap against tiled floor told her of Kelly's next step.

Step upon step the pudgy feet nestled Marie deep into the slippers insole. Struggling back against the wrinkled surface did no good, as she just fell back into place during the next step. Finally she heard the tap turn on and Kelly stood up on her tip toes to get a glass from the cupboards. She was huge to Marie at the moment, but Kelly was still short.
14221.title: Along for the ride in Kelly's slippers

choices: Too tired, she keeps them on and Marie trapped
Her feet get hot, she slips them off next to her head
142212.content:
Marie decides to stay there with Kelly...not that she could escape. Kelly's massive weight had pushed her so far into the sole of the slipper that she couldn't even pull her finger out. Soon enough she can here the water stop from high above and a few gulping noises follow it. Kelly gets off her tip-toes and pushes her wrinkled sole back into Marie. The pressure increased, pushing Marie even deeper into Kelly's slipper. Her feet were sweating heavily from the heat she was enduring, which also increased the scent of the foot.

Kelly drank for only a few minutes before she finished and set the glass into sink and walked back, each step sending Marie face first into Kelly's soft foot. If her foot wasn't so plush, Marie would have likely died from this torture after the first step. But if she saved others from undergoing the same experience, she could deal with Kelly's massive body as long as it takes.

Kelly yawned as she entered the room where her friends were all asleep. Catherine was on her side, snoring lightly, Sally was on her back, and looked like she was worried if she wasn't asleep. But Marie was gone... oh well. She might have just gone to the bathroom, but she did have to leave in the middle of the night before for reasons she wouldn't tell. Kelly was too tired to worry about it anyway. She crawled under her warm blanket snuggled it, but remembered that she was still wearing her fluffy slippers.
142212.title: Marie stays put, if she can hold on, maybe she ...

choices: Marie pops free, tumbling forward across the kitchen floor.
She stays stuck, trying to tuck back into the groove as the slipper descends.
14222.content:
Marie covered her head and cried out as the tan ridged sole slapped down hard on the tile. The relatively clean sole of the slipper landed hard with Kelly's lazy footsteps toward her late night drink.

Slowly opening her eyes, Marie was startled by the sight of tan walls pressing her in tightly. Kelly's slipper had spared her only barely as she struggled to free herself from the groove that now had her prisoner.

Kelly was still oblivious and trudging on her way. Though Marie could not pull herself free! Kelly's gigantic slippered foot drug harshly across the floor, making the tiny girl scream in fear and minimal pain. Before it slapped down and crunched it's unknown captive, Marie gave one final push to the sides of the ridged sole.
14222.title: In the groove of Kelly's slipper

choices: Find a better way to get Kelly's attention
Forget that, run away and formulate a new plan!
142221.content:
Marie tumbled out onto the floor and made a run for it. Getting Kelly's attention now would be difficult.

Marie gets out of Kelly's path and stays in the shadows, trying to think her next move.

Sally seems to have already gone, believing Marie had been finished off..
142221.title: Escaped

142222.content:
Marie realised she couldn't get out in time. This was a very dangerous spot for her. She tried to tuck herself back in, but she found she couldn't do that either! She was stuck in a vurnurable position! The ground rushed up at her. SLAM!

It was more painful than anything she had ever felt. Kelly's overweightness didn't help, and it got heavier, heavier, and heavier, as all of the weight went onto Kelly's foot. Marie let out a final scream as her body was smushed into the floor.

As far as Sally was concerned, the traitor was dead.
142222.title: Marie's end

info.brief_description: A few chubby girls shrink people! Looking for additions to keep the ball rolling! Join in!
info.description:
Sally and her friends are always picked on because of their weight. Sally makes a device to shrink people to get revenge.

Note: I've been adding a lot more chapters lately. If you're up for adding some vore or barefoot squish stuff (the stuff I usually do) I'll be happy to try to add to any decent length additions. I've been on a roll for quite a few days now so help give me more inspiration to keep going!

Sally - White and nerdy red head, short heavy set girl with glasses. Science buff.

Cathrine - A sweet african-american girl with dark hair. Likes travel.

Kelly - Blond girl, tan, with lots of freckles. Loves sports.

Marie - Black haired girl of Asian descent. Marie has oval shaped glasses. Loves manga.

This story is for characters 18+ only. Chapters that don't follow this rule will be edited or removed.
